eng: [, 2015 China-Africa Media Leaders Summit was held on the 1st in Cape Town, South Africa. President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to extend warm congratulations to the summit. The following is the full text of the congratulatory letter:, A congratulatory letter to the 2015 China-Africa Media Leaders Summit. On the occasion of the opening of the 2015 China-Africa Media Leaders Summit, I would like to express my warm congratulations to the convening of the meeting! Sincere welcome to the media guests from all over the world! The theme of this summit is "Creating a New Era of China-Africa Media Cooperation and Win-Win". China and African media people gathered together to conduct discussions and exchange ideas, which is of great significance for consolidating and expanding China-Africa friendly cooperation. China and Africa are a community of shared destiny, and China-Africa friendly cooperation will contribute to the well-being of 2.4 billion people. In the pursuit of peace and development, China and Africa will always be reliable friends and sincere partners. China and Africa go hand in hand to help build a new type of international relations with win-win cooperation as the core, and promote the development of the global governance system in a more just and reasonable direction. , China-Africa friendship is rooted in the people. The media is a channel for China-Africa exchanges and mutual learning, and a bridge between people. In recent years, China-Africa media exchanges and cooperation have flourished. Looking to the future, the media cooperation between the two sides is vast and promising. It is hoped that the China-Africa media will use this summit as an opportunity to broaden the field of exchanges, deepen the connotation of cooperation, and make new and greater contributions to promoting China-Africa friendship to take root in the hearts of the people of both sides and the continuous blossoming of the tree of China-Africa friendship. , I wish the meeting a complete success! , President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, December 1, 2015, (Xinhua News Agency, Cape Town, December 1st), "People's Daily" (December 02, 2015, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Congratulatory letter from Xi Jinping to the 2015 China-Africa Media Leaders Summit
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-02
text: [, 2015中非媒体领袖峰会1日在南非开普敦举行。国家主席习近平发来贺信，向峰会召开表示热烈祝贺。以下是贺信全文：, 致2015中非媒体领袖峰会的贺信, 值此2015中非媒体领袖峰会开幕之际，我谨向会议的召开表示热烈的祝贺！向出席会议的各国媒体嘉宾表示诚挚的欢迎！, 这次峰会以“开创中非媒体合作共赢新时代”为主题，中国同非洲各国的媒体人士共聚一堂，开展研讨，交流思想，对巩固和扩大中非友好合作具有重要意义。, 中非是休戚与共的命运共同体，中非友好合作有助于增进24亿人民的福祉。在追求和平与发展的道路上，中非要做永远的可靠朋友和真诚伙伴。中非携手共进，有助于构建以合作共赢为核心的新型国际关系，促进全球治理体系朝着更加公正更加合理方向发展。, 中非友好根在人民。媒体是中非交流互鉴的渠道、民心相通的桥梁。近年来，中非媒体交流合作蓬勃发展。展望未来，双方媒体合作空间广阔、大有可为。希望中非媒体以这次峰会为契机，拓宽交流领域，深化合作内涵，为推动中非友好扎根双方人民心田、促进中非友谊之树不断开花结果作出新的更大的贡献。, 祝会议圆满成功！, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 2015年12月1日, （新华社开普敦12月1日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年12月02日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平致2015中非媒体领袖峰会的贺信

eng: [, Colleagues: First of all, I would like to congratulate President Erdogan. This Antalya summit has been a complete success and has released a positive signal to the G20 for the impetus of the world economy and the well-being of peoples of all countries. , China will hold the eleventh summit of the leaders of the Group of 20 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province from September 4th to 5th next year. I take this opportunity to thank all countries and international organizations for their support to China. I look forward to your colleagues attending the Hangzhou Summit. , There is a saying in China, there is paradise on the top, Suhang on the bottom. It means that Hangzhou and Suzhou are picturesque and can be called paradise on earth. Hangzhou is a historical and cultural city and a city of innovation and vitality. It is believed that the 2016 summit will present a unique charm of history and reality. During the previous communication with all parties, China deeply felt everyone's expectations for next year's summit. Based on the current situation and the expectations of all parties, China has determined the theme of the 2016 summit as "building a world economy of innovation, vitality, linkage and inclusiveness", and hopes to advance the preparations for the summit next year from four key areas. One is to innovate the growth mode, focusing on promoting reform and innovation, opening up and seizing new opportunities, and enhancing the growth potential of the world economy. The second is to improve global economic and financial governance, enhance the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries, and improve the ability of the world economy to resist risks. The third is to promote international trade and investment, give play to its role in promoting growth, and build an open world economy. The fourth is to promote inclusive and linked development, strive to implement the 2030 sustainable development agenda, eradicate poverty, and achieve common development. , We propose the above theme and focus, mainly for three considerations. (1) The world economy is basically out of the crisis, but the recovery is highly fragile, the growth momentum is insufficient, and the trends and policies of the major economies have become more differentiated. We urgently need to find new sources of growth and push the world economy to a new round of prosperity. (2) In recent years, global economic governance reforms have been slow, and international economic and trade rules have accelerated. This year’s UN Development Summit, the 10th World Trade Organization Ministerial Conference, and the Paris Conference on Climate Change have been held successively to make new plans for international development cooperation, the multilateral trading system, and global action to address climate change. We need to take coordinated action to lead the development direction of international economic cooperation. (3) The G20 is facing a shift from crisis response to a long-term governance mechanism, with issues extending from short-term issues to deep-level and long-term issues. The necessity and difficulty of coordinating macroeconomic policies and strengthening cooperation among G20 members have increased simultaneously. We need to carry forward the spirit of partnership, promote the smooth transition of the G20 and consolidate its position as the main platform for global economic governance. , Colleagues! , The G20 is the G20 of each member. During the preparation of the Hangzhou Summit, China will always maintain an open, transparent and inclusive attitude, strengthen communication and coordination with all members, and jointly maintain, build and develop the G20. , In September next year, I will welcome you by the West Lake. , thank you all! , (Xinhua News Agency, Antalya, Turkey, November 16th), "People's Daily" (November 17, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's Statement on China's Hosting of the 2016 Summit at the Working Luncheon of the G20 Leaders Summit
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-11-17
text: [, 各位同事：, 首先，我要祝贺埃尔多安总统，这次安塔利亚峰会取得圆满成功，对外释放了二十国集团为世界经济谋动力、为各国人民谋福祉的积极信号。, 中国将于明年9月4日至5日在浙江省杭州市举行二十国集团领导人第十一次峰会。借此机会，我要感谢各国和国际组织对中方的支持。期待各位同事届时出席杭州峰会。, 中国有句俗语，上有天堂，下有苏杭。意思是说，杭州和苏州风景如画，堪称人间天堂。杭州是历史文化名城，也是创新活力之城，相信2016年峰会将给大家呈现一种历史和现实交汇的独特韵味。, 在前期同各方沟通中，中方深深感受到大家对明年峰会的期待。基于当前形势和各方期待，中方把2016年峰会的主题确定为“构建创新、活力、联动、包容的世界经济”，希望从4个重点领域推进明年峰会筹备工作。一是创新增长方式，重在推进改革创新，开辟和抓住新机遇，提升世界经济增长潜力。二是完善全球经济金融治理，增强新兴市场国家和发展中国家的代表性和发言权，提高世界经济抗风险能力。三是促进国际贸易和投资，发挥其对增长的推动作用，构建开放型世界经济。四是推动包容、联动式发展，力求落实2030年可持续发展议程，消除贫困，实现共同发展。, 我们提出上述主题和重点，主要出于3方面考虑。, （一）世界经济基本走出危机，但复苏高度脆弱，增长动力不足，主要经济体走势和政策更趋分化。我们迫切需要找到新的增长源，推动世界经济走向新一轮繁荣。, （二）近年来，全球经济治理改革进展不畅，国际经济贸易规则加速演变。今年联合国发展峰会、世界贸易组织第十届部长会、气候变化巴黎大会相继举行，对国际发展合作、多边贸易体制、应对气候变化全球行动作出新的规划。我们需要采取协调一致行动，引领国际经济合作发展方向。, （三）二十国集团面临从危机应对向长效治理机制的转变，议题从短期问题向深层次和长期性问题延伸。二十国集团成员协调宏观经济政策和加强合作的必要性和难度同步增加。我们需要发扬伙伴关系精神，促使二十国集团顺利完成转变，巩固作为全球经济治理主要平台的地位。, 各位同事！, 二十国集团是每个成员的二十国集团。在杭州峰会筹备过程中，中方将始终保持开放、透明、包容姿态，同各成员加强沟通和协调，共同把二十国集团维护好、建设好、发展好。, 明年9月，我将在西湖之畔欢迎各位。, 谢谢大家！, （新华社土耳其安塔利亚11月16日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年11月17日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在二十国集团领导人峰会工作午宴上关于中国主办2016年峰会的发言

eng: [, Dear President Obama and Mrs.,, Ladies, Gentlemen, and Friends:, 　　 In this beautiful autumn season, my wife and I came to beautiful Washington with a happy mood. First of all, I want to thank President Obama for his kind invitation and warm reception. Here, I convey the sincere greetings and best wishes of the more than 1.3 billion Chinese people to the American people! , 　　 Both China and the United States are great countries, and the Chinese people and the American people are great people. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and the United States 36 years ago, relations between the two countries have always been advancing in the wind and waves, and have made historic progress. , 　　 In the summer of 2013, President Obama and I made a strategic choice to build a new relationship between China and the United States at the Annaberg Manor. Over the past two years, China and the United States have made important progress in exchanges and cooperation in various fields and have been welcomed by the people of the two countries and the people of the world. , 　　 The cooperation between China and the United States can produce one plus one greater than two. Under the new situation, the development of Sino-US relations should move at any time and follow the trend. My current visit to the United States is for peace and cooperation. We are willing to work together with the United States to promote greater development of Sino-US relations and benefit the people of the two countries and the people of the world.　　——We must adhere to the correct direction of building a new type of relationship between great powers, so that peace, respect and cooperation will always be the main theme of Sino-US relations and ensure that the relations between the two countries continue to develop along a healthy and stable track.　　——We must insist on enhancing strategic mutual trust, deepening mutual understanding, respecting each other's interests and concerns, treating differences and differences with a broad mind, and strengthening the confidence of the friendly cooperation between the two peoples. , 　　——We must adhere to the mutually beneficial and win-win cooperation concept, innovate the cooperation model, broaden the cooperation field, and bring more benefits to the people of the two countries and the people of the world through practical actions and cooperation results. , 　　——We must persist in enhancing the friendship between the people, vigorously promote the non-governmental exchanges between the two countries, encourage the social circles of the two countries to meet each other, and continually consolidate the social foundation of Sino-US relations. , 　　-We must persist in promoting world peace and development, strengthen coordination on major international and regional issues, work together to meet global challenges, and work with peoples of all countries to build a better world. , 　　 30 years ago, I visited the United States for the first time and lived in the home of American people in Muscatine, Iowa. They are so enthusiastic, sincere and friendly. We exchanged cordially and hugged tightly when we parted. This scene is still unforgettable. Three years ago, I returned to Muscatine and met my old friend again. They told me that friendship is a big deal. From these old friends, and from many American friends, I really feel the sincere feelings of the people of China and the United States who have the same heart and soul. This gives me full confidence in the future of Sino-US relations. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 things are artificial. China-US relations are standing at a new historical starting point in the 21st century. Win-win cooperation is the only correct choice for the development of Sino-US relations. Let us strengthen our faith and work together to write a new chapter in the development of Sino-US relations! , 　　 (Xinhua News Agency, Washington, September 25th), 　　 "People's Daily" (September 26, 2015, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the welcome ceremony of the South Lawn of the White House
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-09-26
text: [, 尊敬的奥巴马总统和夫人，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　在这金秋的美好时节，我和我的夫人怀着愉快的心情来到美丽的华盛顿。首先，我要感谢奥巴马总统对我的盛情邀请和热情接待。在这里，我向美国人民转达13亿多中国人民的诚挚问候和良好祝愿！, 　　中国和美国都是伟大的国家，中国人民和美国人民都是伟大的人民。36年前中美建立外交关系以来，两国关系始终乘风破浪、砥砺前行，取得了历史性进展。, 　　2013年夏天，我同奥巴马总统在安纳伯格庄园共同作出构建中美新型大国关系的战略抉择。两年多来，中美各领域交流合作取得重要进展，受到两国人民和世界人民欢迎。, 　　中美两国携手合作，可以产生一加一大于二的力量。新形势下发展中美关系，应该随时而动、顺势而为。我这次访问美国，是为和平而来，为合作而来，我们愿同美方一道努力，推动中美关系得到更大发展，更多更好造福两国人民和世界人民。, 　　——我们要坚持构建新型大国关系正确方向，使和平、尊重、合作始终成为中美关系的主旋律，确保两国关系沿着健康稳定的轨道不断向前发展。, 　　——我们要坚持增进战略互信，加深相互了解，尊重彼此利益和关切，以宽广的胸怀对待差异和分歧，坚定两国人民友好合作的信心。, 　　——我们要坚持互利共赢的合作理念，创新合作模式，拓宽合作领域，以实际行动和合作成果，给两国人民和世界人民带来更多福祉。, 　　——我们要坚持增进人民友谊，大力推进两国民间交往，鼓励两国社会各界相向而行，不断夯实中美关系的社会基础。, 　　——我们要坚持促进世界和平与发展，加强在重大国际和地区问题上的协调，合力应对全球性挑战，同各国人民一道，建设更加美好的世界。, 　　30年前，我第一次访问美国，住在艾奥瓦州马斯卡廷市的美国老百姓家中。他们是那么热情、真诚、友好。我们亲切交流，临别时紧紧拥抱，这一幕幕情景至今令我难以忘怀。3年前，我再次回到马斯卡廷市，同老朋友重逢。他们对我说，友谊是一件大事。从这些老朋友身上，从很多美国朋友身上，我真切感受到了中美两国人民心灵相通的真挚感情，这让我对中美关系的未来抱有充分的信心。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　事在人为。中美关系正站在21世纪一个新的历史起点上。合作共赢是中美关系发展的唯一正确选择。让我们坚定信念、携手合作，共同谱写中美关系发展新篇章！, 　　（新华社华盛顿9月25日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年09月26日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平在白宫南草坪欢迎仪式上的致辞

eng: [, On the occasion of the opening of the first annual meeting of the AsiaInfo Non-Governmental Forum, on behalf of the Chinese government and people, and in my own name, I extend warm congratulations to the convening of the meeting and warm welcome to all guests present . The Asian Mutual Cooperation and Trust Measures Conference (AsiaInfo) has been making unremitting efforts in establishing and implementing trust measures, enhancing dialogue among different civilizations, and promoting common development since its establishment 23 years ago. Positive progress has been made and it has become the way for Asian countries to explore Asian security governance models. Important mechanism. , In May last year, I proposed at the 4th AsiaInfo Summit in Shanghai that Asian countries should seek common, comprehensive, cooperative, sustainable security, and discuss the establishment of a new framework for regional security and cooperation. While strengthening our own cooperation, we must be firmly committed to cooperation with countries in other regions, other regions, and international organizations, and strive to achieve a win-win, multi-win, and win-win situation. As the chairman of AsiaInfo, China will work with AsiaInfo member countries and other Asian countries to commit to the above goals and make AsiaInfo play a greater role in promoting Asian security and stability. To explore the road to security in the region and promote mutual respect, mutual trust, and harmonious coexistence among different civilizations, regions, races, and religions in the Asian region. Civil forces cannot be underestimated. Former politicians, diplomats, experts and scholars, media elites, and non-governmental organizations dedicated to friendly non-governmental exchanges can all play a role in this. This is also the original intention of my proposal to establish the AsiaInfo Non-Government Forum at the AsiaInfo Summit in Shanghai last year. We need to form a non-governmental communication network to create better conditions for the widespread dissemination of AsiaInfo's security concepts, enhancing AsiaInfo's influence, and promoting regional security governance. The theme of this annual meeting is "Asia in the Next Decade: Security and Development", which aims to promote broader thinking about Asia's peace and development in the new situation. It is hoped that representatives and guests of all parties will brainstorm and communicate frankly, and contribute to the construction of a community of shared future for Asia and the promotion of peace and development in Asia! , I wish the annual meeting a complete success! , (This newspaper, Beijing, May 25th), "People's Daily" (May 26, 2015 01 edition),]
eng_title: Congratulatory Message from Chairman Xi Jinping to the First Annual Meeting of the AsiaInfo Non-Governmental Forum
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-05-26
text: [, 值此亚信非政府论坛首次年会开幕之际，我谨代表中国政府和人民，并以我个人的名义，向会议的召开致以热烈的祝贺，向出席会议的各方嘉宾表示热烈欢迎。, 亚洲相互协作与信任措施会议（亚信）成立23年来，在建立和落实信任措施、增进不同文明对话、促进共同发展等方面作出不懈努力，取得积极进展，已成为亚洲国家探索亚洲安全治理模式的重要机制。, 去年5月，我在上海亚信第四次峰会上提出，亚洲各国应当寻求共同、综合、合作、可持续安全，探讨建立地区安全与合作新架构。我们在加强自身合作的同时，要坚定致力于同其他地区国家、其他地区和国际组织的合作，努力实现双赢、多赢、共赢。中方作为亚信主席国，将同亚信成员国及其他亚洲国家一道，致力于实现上述目标，使亚信为促进亚洲安全和稳定发挥更大作用。, 探索本地区安全之路，促进亚洲地区不同文明、地域、种族、宗教互尊互信、和谐共生，民间力量不容低估。前政治家、外交家、专家学者、媒体精英、致力于民间友好交流的非政府组织等，均可为此发挥作用。这也是我在去年上海亚信峰会上倡议成立亚信非政府论坛的初衷。我们要形成民间交流网络，为广泛传播亚信安全理念、提升亚信影响力、推进地区安全治理营造更好的条件。, 本次年会以“未来十年的亚洲：安全与发展”为主题，旨在推动对新形势下亚洲和平与发展的更广泛思考。希望各方代表和嘉宾集思广益、坦诚交流，为推动构建亚洲命运共同体、推进亚洲和平与发展出计献力！, 预祝年会取得圆满成功！, （本报北京5月25日电）  , 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年05月26日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平主席致亚信非政府论坛首次年会的贺词

eng: [,, April 7, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President Xi Jinping and General Secretary of the Vietnamese Communist Party Ruan Fuzhong jointly attended the 15th China-Vietnam Youth Friendly Meeting in the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, shaking hands with the youth representatives of the two countries and taking photos . Xinhua News Agency reporter Rao Aimin,, On April 7, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President Xi Jinping and General Secretary of the Vietnamese Communist Party Central Committee Ruan Fuzhong jointly attended the 15th China-Vietnam Youth Friendly Meeting in the Great Hall of the People in Beijing Shake hands cordially and take a group photo. Xinhua News Agency reporter Rao Aimin, distinguished General Secretary Ruan Fuzhong, comrades of the Vietnamese delegation, and young friends of China and Vietnam: Good afternoon, everyone! I am very happy to meet with the youth representatives of the two countries who participated in the 15th China-Vietnam Youth Friendly Meeting in the Great Hall of the People. On behalf of the Chinese party and government, I extend a warm welcome to Vietnamese young friends! Sincere greetings to the vast number of Vietnamese youths! China and Vietnam are connected by mountains and rivers, and the peoples of the two countries have supported each other for a long time and forged deep friendship. I visited Vietnam in December 2011 and met with the youth representatives of the two countries who participated in the 12th China-Vietnam Youth Friendly Meeting. I was deeply impressed by the hundreds of young people singing the song "Vietnam-China" celebrating the traditional friendship between the two countries. I heard that some representatives have also come to the Great Hall of the People today, welcome you! At present, the Chinese people are working together to build a well-off society in an all-round way and realize the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, coordinate and promote the comprehensive construction of a well-off society, comprehensively deepen reform, comprehensively govern the country according to law, and comprehensively govern the party, and Vietnam is also pushing forward Innovative career. On the road of development, the two sides should continue to strengthen cultural exchanges and promote good-neighborly friendship so that the traditional friendship between China and Vietnam will be passed on from generation to generation between the two peoples. , "The friendship between the nations lies in the blind date of the people," and "the blind date of the people" starts with the youth. Here, I offer you three hopes. First, I hope you will be the inheritors of the traditional friendship between China and Vietnam. You are the new force for national construction, and the main force for the future development of the two countries. I hope you cherish the traditional friendship created by the older generation leaders of the two countries and the people of the two countries, so that the friendship between China and Vietnam can be carried forward among young people. Second, I hope you can be the promoter of China-Vietnam friendly cooperation. Young people are active in thinking, broad in vision, and familiar with new media tools such as the Internet. In addition to face-to-face communication, you can use the Internet and other means to enhance mutual understanding and understanding, gain a deeper understanding of each other, make more positive voices, strive to deliver positive energy, and continuously enhance mutual understanding between the two peoples and promote mutually beneficial cooperation between the two countries. Third, I hope you will be the future builders of China-Vietnam relations. To consolidate good-neighborly friendship and promote common development is the unshirkable responsibility of the youth of China and Vietnam. You must deeply understand the great significance of China-Vietnam's peaceful development and win-win cooperation, and actively build a bridge of cooperation between the two countries. For you, now, youth is used to struggle; in the future, youth is used to remember. If the youth of the two countries contribute to the friendship between China and Vietnam, they will leave very good memories of their youth. I believe that as more and more young and energetic young people like you join the Sino-Vietnamese friendship team, the cause of friendship between the two countries will be handed down and thriving! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, April 7th), "People's Daily" (April 8, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the 15th China-Vietnam Youth Friendly Meeting
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-04-08
text: [, , 4月7日，中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平和越共中央总书记阮富仲在北京人民大会堂共同出席第十五届中越青年友好会见活动，同两国青年代表亲切握手，合影留念。新华社记者饶爱民摄, , 4月7日，中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平和越共中央总书记阮富仲在北京人民大会堂共同出席第十五届中越青年友好会见活动，同两国青年代表亲切握手，合影留念。新华社记者饶爱民摄, 尊敬的阮富仲总书记，, 越南代表团的同志们，, 中越两国的青年朋友们：, 大家下午好！很高兴在人民大会堂同参加第十五届中越青年友好会见的两国青年代表见面。我代表中国党和政府，向越南青年朋友们，表示热烈的欢迎！向广大越南青年，致以诚挚的问候！, 中国和越南山水相连，两国人民长期互相支持，结下了深厚情谊。我曾经于2011年12月访问越南，并会见了参加第十二届中越青年友好会见的两国青年代表。几百名年轻人同唱歌颂两国传统友谊的歌曲《越南—中国》，给我留下了深刻印象。听说有部分代表今天也来到了人民大会堂，欢迎你们！, 当前，中国人民正在为全面建成小康社会、实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦而团结奋斗，协调推进全面建成小康社会、全面深化改革、全面依法治国、全面从严治党，越南也在全力推进革新事业。在发展道路上，双方应该继续加强人文交流、增进睦邻友好，使中越传统友谊在两国人民中代代相传。, “国之交在于民相亲”，而“民相亲”要从青年做起。在此，我向你们提出3点希望。, 一是希望大家做中越传统友谊的传承者。你们是国家建设的生力军，更是两国未来发展的主力军。希望你们珍惜两国老一辈领导人和两国人民共同缔造的传统友谊，让中越友好在青年人中发扬光大。, 二是希望大家做中越友好合作的推动者。青年人思想活跃、眼界开阔，熟悉互联网等新媒体工具。除面对面交流外，你们可以运用互联网等增进相知相识相交，深入了解对方，多发出正面声音，努力传递正能量，不断增进两国人民相互理解，推进两国互利合作。, 三是希望大家做中越关系未来的建设者。巩固睦邻友好、推动共同发展，是中越两国青年义不容辞的责任。你们要深刻认识到中越和平发展、合作共赢的重大意义，积极搭建两国合作桥梁。, 对你们来说，现在，青春是用来奋斗的；将来，青春是用来回忆的。如果两国青年为中越友好作出了贡献，就会给自己的青春留下十分美好的回忆。我相信，随着越来越多像你们这样奋发向上、朝气蓬勃的年轻人加入到中越友好队伍中，两国友好事业一定会薪火相传、兴旺发达！, 谢谢你们。, （新华社北京4月7日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年04月08日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平出席第十五届中越青年友好会见活动时的讲话

eng: [, Dear President Zuma, Dear President of the African Union, President Mugabe, Dear Presidents and Heads, Dear Chairman of the African Union Commission, Ms. Zuma,, Ladies and gentlemen, friends: Today is the two-year anniversary of Mr. Mandela’s death. At the moment when we gathered together to discuss the development of China-Africa relations, we deeply cherish Mr. Mandela. Mr. Mandela is a great politician and a great friend of the Chinese people. He has made significant contributions to the development of China-Africa relations, and the Chinese people will always remember this. , The colleagues' speeches were very exciting and left a deep impression on us. Everyone has put forward constructive opinions and suggestions on China-Africa relations and China-Africa cooperation in the next three years. I am very inspired and encouraged. , We gathered in Johannesburg to discuss China-Africa friendship. Around the theme of "China and Africa go hand in hand: win-win cooperation and common development", we comprehensively planned the development of China-Africa relations and pragmatic cooperation in various fields, and proposed a new China-Africa relationship. Positioning, depicting a new blueprint for China-Africa cooperation, and extensive and in-depth exchange of views on international and regional issues of common concern, reaching a broad consensus, injecting new and powerful impetus for the comprehensive development of China-Africa friendly cooperative relations, and expanding our scope and Wide-area, higher-level mutually beneficial cooperation provides strong spiritual guidance and political guarantees. , According to the recommendations of the Sixth Ministerial Conference of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation and the agenda of this summit, we need to jointly consider and adopt the Declaration of the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation and the China-Africa Cooperation Forum-Johannesburg Action Plan (2016-2018) )" Two summit outcome documents. This is a programmatic document that guides the development of China-Africa friendly cooperative relations. After many rounds of equal dialogue and friendly consultation between China and Africa, the wisdom of the leaders present here is condensed, and it is a concrete manifestation of the results of this summit. The Declaration focuses on the important consensus of the two sides on building a comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation between China and Africa and jointly promoting the democratization of international relations and the modernization of the governance system. It clarifies the significance of the comprehensive development of China-Africa cooperation and points out the direction for the future development of China-Africa relations. The Action Plan focuses on planning and guiding cooperation in key areas between China and Africa in the next three years, and proposes the main objectives and specific measures for cooperation. , Below, allow me to make a brief summary of this meeting. In the past two days, in a friendly and pragmatic atmosphere, we have held fruitful discussions on major topics such as deepening traditional friendship between China and Africa, promoting pragmatic cooperation, and seeking common development in a friendly and pragmatic atmosphere. First, we reviewed the extraordinary achievements of China-Africa friendly relations and pragmatic cooperation since the establishment of China-Africa Cooperation Forum 15 years ago, and looked forward to the future development vision of China-Africa friendly cooperative relations. Unanimously agreed to upgrade China-Africa relations to a comprehensive strategic partnership of partnership, determined to work together to strengthen and consolidate political equality and mutual trust, economic cooperation and win-win cooperation, civilization exchanges and mutual learning, security and mutual help, and solidarity and cooperation in international affairs. pillar". , Second, we adopted the "China-Africa Cooperation Forum Johannesburg Summit Declaration" and "China-Africa Cooperation Forum-Johannesburg Action Plan (2016-2018)". It clarified the specific goals and tasks for the future development of China-Africa relations, and proposed major measures to achieve win-win cooperation and common development. Determined to work together to comprehensively promote the implementation of the consensus and results of this summit to better benefit the people of China and Africa. Thirdly, we are determined to seize the historical opportunity of highly matching China-Africa development strategy and promote the comprehensive development of China-Africa cooperation. Focusing on the “five pillars” of China-Africa comprehensive strategic partnership, we will focus on implementing industrialization, agricultural modernization, infrastructure construction, finance, green development, trade and investment facilitation, poverty reduction and benefiting the people, public health, humanities, peace and security. "Great Cooperation Plan", constantly enriching the connotation of China-Africa comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership. Fourthly, we frankly exchanged views on major international and regional issues, determined to strengthen unity and cooperation, and safeguard the common interests of China and Africa and the overall interests of developing countries. It is unanimously believed that China and Africa are both important forces for safeguarding world peace and prosperity and promoting the development and prosperity of the world. We have reasons, responsibilities and the ability to play a greater role in international affairs in order to build a new type of international cooperation centered on win-win cooperation. Relationship to make new and greater contributions. , Dear colleagues! Over the past 60 years, especially since the establishment of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum, China-Africa relations have developed tremendously. Looking ahead, China and Africa have ushered in a new era of win-win cooperation and common development. China will continue to forge ahead with African countries in line with the true and sincere policy concept and correct concept of justice and benefit, and make unremitting efforts to achieve common development of China and Africa. , ——Despite the adjustment and evolution of the international pattern, China and Africa have equal trust and mutual trustWork together with African countries to make unremitting efforts to achieve common development between China and Africa. ——Despite the adjustment and evolution of the international pattern, the brotherly friendship between China and Africa on the basis of equality, mutual trust and mutual support will not change. China will always have the same heart and destiny with African countries and will always be a good friend, good partner and good brother of Africa. ——Despite the ups and downs of the economic situation, the fundamental purpose of China-Africa cooperation for win-win and common development will not change. China's sustainable development has brought more opportunities and broad prospects for African countries to achieve independent and sustainable development. China will closely integrate its own development with the development of Africa and seek common development between China and Africa. ——Despite the changes of social development in the times, the cooperative spirit of mutual understanding and common progress between China and Africa will not change. We must strengthen dialogue among civilizations, exchange of ideas, and cultural interaction, promote friendly exchanges between all walks of life, and ensure friendship between China and Africa from generation to generation. ——Despite the emergence of various threats and challenges, the determined will of China and Africa to be in the same boat and share the same troubles will not change. I am very happy to hear that President Zuma quoted the Chinese proverb "People are united, Taishan moved" in his speech the day before yesterday. China is willing to work closely with Africa to overcome difficulties and cope with all kinds of risks and challenges, and maintain an international environment for common development. , Dear colleagues! So far, we have successfully completed the main tasks of this summit. The summit is filled with an atmosphere of sincerity, friendship, equality, and win-win cooperation. This is a historic event in the history of China-Africa relations and has been a complete success! , This summit has many activities, many schedules and a large number of participants, and the organization work is very heavy. President Zuma personally cared about and personally guided, South Africa, as the host country, attaches great importance to and carefully implements the summit preparation and organization work. The human, material and financial resources ensured the safe and orderly conduct of the summit activities, and made outstanding contributions to the success of the summit. This is a perfect and extraordinary event, and we made history together. Now, I suggest that let us express our heartfelt thanks and high respect to President Zuma, the South African government and people, and all those who have made tremendous efforts for the success of this summit! , Taking this opportunity, I would also like to express my sincere gratitude to all colleagues who attended this forum summit. Thank you for your trust in the Chinese government and me, and for your valuable contributions to developing China-Africa relations and promoting China-Africa friendly cooperation. Let us continue to work together to jointly open a new era of win-win cooperation and common development between China and Africa, and work together to realize the beautiful dream of letting the people of China and Africa live a happy life! , (Xinhua News Agency, Johannesburg, December 5th), "People's Daily" (December 06, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Concluding speech at the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-06
text: [, 尊敬的祖马总统，, 尊敬的非盟轮值主席穆加贝总统，, 尊敬的各位元首、首脑，, 尊敬的非盟委员会主席祖马女士，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　今天是曼德拉先生逝世两周年的纪念日。在我们集聚一堂，共商中非关系发展大计的时刻，我们深切缅怀曼德拉先生。曼德拉先生是伟大的政治家，也是中国人民的伟大朋友，为中非关系发展作出了重大贡献，中国人民对此将永远铭记。, 　　各位同事的发言很精彩，给我们留下深刻印象。大家就中非关系和中非未来3年合作提出了富有建设性的意见和建议，我很受启发，也倍受鼓舞。, 　　我们聚首约翰内斯堡，共叙中非友谊，围绕“中非携手并进：合作共赢、共同发展”这一主题，对中非关系发展和各领域务实合作进行了全面规划，提出了中非关系新定位，描绘了中非合作新蓝图，并就共同关心的国际和地区问题广泛深入交换意见，达成广泛共识，为中非友好合作关系全面发展注入新的强劲动力，为我们开展更大范围、更广领域、更高层次的互利合作提供了强大的精神引领和政治保障。, 　　根据中非合作论坛第六届部长级会议的建议和本次峰会议程，我们需要共同审议通过《中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会宣言》和《中非合作论坛——约翰内斯堡行动计划（2016—2018年）》两个峰会成果文件。这是指导中非友好合作关系发展的纲领性文件，经过中非双方多轮平等对话和友好磋商，凝聚了在座各位领导人的智慧，是本次峰会成果的具体体现。《宣言》集中反映双方对构建中非全面战略合作伙伴关系及共同推动国际关系民主化和治理体系现代化的重要共识，阐明中非合作全面发展的重大意义，为中非关系未来发展指明方向。《行动计划》重在规划和指导未来3年中非重点领域合作，提出合作的主要目标和具体举措。, 　　下面，请允许我对本次会议作个简短总结。, 　　两天来，我们在友好务实的气氛中，紧紧围绕会议主题，就深化中非传统友谊、促进务实合作、谋求共同发展等重大议题进行了富有成果的讨论。, 　　第一，我们回顾了中非合作论坛成立15年来中非友好关系和务实合作取得的非凡成就，展望了中非友好合作关系的未来发展愿景。一致同意将中非关系提升为全面战略合作伙伴关系，决心共同致力于做强和夯实政治上平等互信、经济上合作共赢、文明上交流互鉴、安全上守望相助、国际事务中团结协作“五大支柱”。, 　　第二，我们通过了《中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会宣言》和《中非合作论坛——约翰内斯堡行动计划（2016—2018年）》。明确了中非关系未来发展的具体目标和任务，提出了实现合作共赢、共同发展的重大举措。决心携手努力，全面推动落实本次峰会的共识和成果，更好造福中非人民。, 　　第三，我们决心抓住中非发展战略高度契合的历史机遇，推动中非合作全面发展。围绕中非全面战略合作伙伴关系“五大支柱”，着力实施工业化、农业现代化、基础设施建设、金融、绿色发展、贸易和投资便利化、减贫惠民、公共卫生、人文、和平和安全“十大合作计划”，不断充实中非全面战略合作伙伴关系内涵。, 　　第四，我们坦诚交流了对重大国际和地区问题的看法，决心加强团结协作，维护好中非共同利益和发展中国家整体利益。一致认为，中国和非洲都是维护世界和平安宁、促进世界发展繁荣的重要力量，我们有理由、有责任、有能力在国际事务中发挥更大作用，为构建以合作共赢为核心的新型国际关系作出新的更大的贡献。, 　　尊敬的各位同事！, 　　60年来，特别是中非合作论坛成立以来，中非关系得到巨大发展。展望未来，中非迎来了合作共赢、共同发展的新时代。中方将本着真实亲诚对非政策理念和正确义利观，继续同非洲国家一道开拓进取，为实现中非共同发展而不懈努力。, 　　——任凭国际格局调整演变，中非平等互信、相互支持的兄弟情谊不会改变。中国将始终同非洲国家心连心、共命运，永远做非洲的好朋友、好伙伴、好兄弟。, 　　——任凭经济形势起伏跌宕，中非合作共赢、共同发展的根本宗旨不会改变。中国持续发展为非洲国家实现自主可持续发展带来了更多机遇和广阔前景。中国将把自身发展同非洲发展紧密结合起来，谋求中非共同发展。, 　　——任凭时代社会发展变迁，中非相互理解、共同进步的协作精神不会改变。我们要加强文明对话、理念交流、文化互动，促进各界友好交往，确保中非世代友好。, 　　——任凭出现各种威胁挑战，中非风雨同舟、患难与共的坚定意志不会改变。很高兴听到祖马总统前天在讲话中引用了中国的谚语“人心齐，泰山移”，我这里想引用中国另一句谚语“兄弟同心，其利断金”。中方愿同非方紧密团结，共克时艰，共同应对各种风险和挑战，维护好共同发展的国际环境。, 　　尊敬的各位同事！, 　　到目前为止，我们顺利完成了本次峰会的主要任务，峰会洋溢着真诚友好、平等相待、合作共赢的气氛。这是中非关系史上一次历史性的盛会，取得了圆满成功！, 　　本次峰会活动多、日程多、参加人数多，组织工作非常繁重。祖马总统亲自关心、亲自指导，南非作为东道国，对峰会筹备和组织工作高度重视、精心实施，南非总统府、国际关系与合作部、贸工部、艺文部以及安保、会务等各个方面投入大量人力物力财力，确保峰会各项活动安全、有序进行，为峰会成功作出了突出贡献。这是一次完美、非凡的盛会，我们一起创造了历史。现在，我建议，让我们以热烈的掌声，向祖马总统，向南非政府和人民，向所有为本次峰会取得成功付出巨大努力的人们，表示衷心的感谢和崇高的敬意！, 　　借此机会，我也对出席本次论坛峰会的各位同事表示诚挚的谢意。感谢你们对中国政府和我的信任，感谢你们为发展中非关系、推进中非友好合作作出的宝贵贡献。让我们继续携手努力，共同开启中非合作共赢、共同发展的新时代，共同致力于实现让中非人民都过上幸福生活的美好梦想！, 　　（新华社约翰内斯堡12月5日电）　　, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年12月06日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：在中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会上的总结讲话

eng: [, Dear President Zuma, Dear President Mugabe, Chairman of the African Union, Dear Heads of State and Government, Dear Ms. Zuma, Chairman of the African Union Commission, Dear Colleagues, Distinguished Guests, Ladies and gentlemen, friends: I am very happy to meet you in beautiful Johannesburg. The theme of the China-Africa Entrepreneurs Conference is "win-win cooperation and common development-to promote the process of integration and industrialization in Africa", which has practical significance for the inclusive and sustainable development of Africa. Here, I would like to express my warm congratulations on the success of the conference! My heartfelt thanks to friends from all walks of life who have contributed to China-Africa economic and trade cooperation for a long time! Although China and Africa are thousands of miles apart, China-Africa exchanges have a long history and the friendship between China and Africa has lasted for a long time. Today's Africa is full of vitality, and China-Africa economic and trade cooperation has reached an unprecedented level. Many Chinese entrepreneurs have gone to Africa to invest and operate, and more and more African friends have gone to China to do business. In Zhejiang Province, where I used to work, there is a small city called Yiwu, known as the "commodity capital" in the world. There are now thousands of African businessmen stationed there to engage in China-Africa trade. As of the end of 2014, China's stock of various investments in Africa reached US$101 billion, and more than 3,100 enterprises were established in Africa. In 2014, China-Africa trade volume reached US$221.9 billion. China has become a major partner in Africa in areas such as trade, investment, infrastructure construction, and economic and trade cooperation parks. At present, the world economic situation is complex and changeable, the economic recovery of developed countries is weak, the economic growth of emerging market countries is slowing down, and the risk of uncertainty and uncertainty of global economic growth is increasing. However, as the continent with the most developing countries, Africa has become a bright spot in the global economy in recent years. At present, the security situation in Africa is generally stable. Governments of all countries have taken economic development as their core task and formulated ambitious economic, industrial and infrastructure development plans. The average annual economic growth rate of the African continent is close to 5%. Africa’s ascending industrialization and urbanization process has injected new impetus into global economic growth, making Africa the fastest growing and most promising continent. Throughout the history of modern world economic development, the experience of China and many countries has proved that industrialization is the only way for a country’s economic development. China's industrialization process of one and a half centuries is full of hardships and twists and turns. As early as the middle of the 19th century, China was forced to open its doors under the impact of powerful ships and artillery and began the early industrialization known as the "Western Movement". After the reform and opening up, China entered a fast road to industrialization. In just a few decades, China has gone through hundreds of years in developed countries, built an industrial system with a complete system and huge production capacity, and has become the world’s largest manufacturing country and the world’s second largest economy. It has successfully explored An industrial road that fits China's national conditions. , Looking back on the history of China's industrialization, we deeply realize that industrialization can't work in closed doors. Industrialization in the era of economic globalization needs to make good use of both domestic and foreign markets and resources, and make full use of its own comparative advantages to achieve global resource allocation. It is necessary to fully learn from and absorb the experience of advanced countries, and choose an industrialization path suitable for one's own characteristics according to the national conditions of the country. As the region with the greatest development potential in the world, Africa can fully exert its advantages and make great achievements. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! Industrialization is the prerequisite for inclusive and sustainable development in Africa, and is the key to creating jobs, eradicating poverty and improving living standards. The road to industrialization in Africa requires African people to practice and explore. China sincerely hopes to share Chinese experience with African countries, and is willing to provide financial, technical and talent support for Africa's industrialization process. In the fields of industry, infrastructure construction, investment, and trade facilitation, China-Africa cooperation will provide more opportunities for investment and trade between the two companies, thereby enhancing the competitiveness of African industries and making up for the infrastructure gap in Africa. In modern agriculture, green development, Cooperation in poverty reduction and benefiting the people will promote the sharing of advanced technologies and the establishment of sustainable development models by Chinese and African companies, enhance their capacity for independent development, improve the level of public governance, and improve the lives of African people. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! The new situation brings new opportunities. China and Africa should inherit the glorious tradition of sincerity and friendship and carry forward the spirit of mutual assistance and cooperation. To strengthen China-Africa friendly cooperation, I make the following suggestions. , First, adhere to equal cooperation based on mutual benefit and win-win results. Both China and Africa should adhere to the principle of giving equal attention to justice and benefit, proceed from the reality of China-Africa development, consider each other's concerns, seek and expand the intersection of interests, and jointly build a community of shared destiny between China and Africa. Second, insist on open and inclusive multi-party cooperation. The world today has developed into a close connectionAnd expand the intersection of interests and jointly build a community of shared destiny between China and Africa. Second, insist on open and inclusive multi-party cooperation. The world today has developed into a closely linked whole. We stand for openness and tolerance of the global economy and resolutely oppose trade and investment protectionism. China-Africa economic and trade cooperation is open cooperation. Enterprises of other countries are welcome to join in China-Africa cooperation on the basis of mutual benefit. , Third, adhere to the ability-oriented pragmatic cooperation. China is willing to share advanced and applicable technologies with Africa without reservation, and is willing to combine China's advantageous industries with the development needs of Africa, deepen industrial cooperation, promote the improvement of the quality of African labor, create jobs, and enhance the endogenous power of African economic development. We will effectively help Africa to solve the problems of industrialized talent demand and capacity building by dispatching experts, establishing vocational training centers, and strengthening Sino-African talent training and entrepreneur exchanges. , Fourth, adhere to green and low-carbon sustainable development. Africa has rich natural resources and a superior ecological environment, and China-Africa cooperation should put sustainable development first. We will implement climate change and ecological protection projects for African countries, train professionals in the field of ecological protection for African countries, and help Africa take a green and low-carbon sustainable development path. , Fifth, adhere to the priority of priority cooperation. We will carry out overall planning and design of China-Africa comprehensive economic and trade cooperation, support the construction of farmland and water conservancy in African countries, strengthen transportation infrastructure and power security, and strongly support the development of small and medium-sized enterprises and the construction of poverty reduction and benefit projects, so that China-Africa cooperation will benefit the people. Benefit all people. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , Entrepreneurs are the main body of China-Africa economic and trade cooperation and the messenger of promoting China-Africa friendship. I sincerely hope that the vast number of Chinese and African entrepreneurs will shoulder the burden of all-round economic and trade cooperation between China and Africa, be brave in innovation, learn from each other, and work together to create a better future for the people of China and Africa! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Johannesburg, December 4th), "People's Daily" (December 05, 2015, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: work together to write a new chapter of China-Africa cooperation
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-05
text: [, 尊敬的祖马总统，, 尊敬的非洲联盟轮值主席穆加贝总统，, 尊敬的各国元首、政府首脑，, 尊敬的非盟委员会主席祖马女士，, 尊敬的各位同事，各位嘉宾，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　有机会在美丽的约翰内斯堡同大家见面，我感到十分高兴。这次中非企业家大会以“合作共赢，共同发展——助推非洲一体化和工业化进程”为主题，对非洲的包容性和可持续发展具有现实意义。在此，我谨对大会的成功召开，表示热烈的祝贺！对长期以来在中非经贸合作中作出贡献的各界朋友，表示衷心的感谢！, 　　中国和非洲虽然远隔万里，但中非交往源远流长，中非友谊历久弥坚。今天的非洲充满了生机活力，中非经贸合作达到了前所未有的高度。众多中国企业家到非洲开展投资经营，越来越多的非洲朋友去中国经商工作。在我曾经工作过的浙江省，有个小城叫义乌，号称世界“小商品之都”，现在有几千名非洲商人常驻那里，从事中非贸易。, 　　截至2014年底，中国对非洲各类投资存量达1010亿美元，在非洲建立企业3100多家；2014年，中非贸易额达到2219亿美元。中国在贸易、投资、基础设施建设、经贸合作园区等领域已经成为非洲主要合作伙伴。, 　　当前，世界经济形势复杂多变，发达国家经济复苏乏力，新兴市场国家经济增长放缓，全球经济增长不稳定不确定性风险加大。然而，非洲作为发展中国家最多的大陆，近年来成为全球经济的一个亮点。, 　　目前，非洲安全局势总体稳定，各国政府均将发展经济作为核心任务，制定了雄心勃勃的经济、产业、基础设施发展规划，非洲大陆年均经济增速接近5%。非洲方兴未艾的工业化和城市化进程为全球经济增长注入了新动力，使非洲成为增长最快和最有希望的大陆。, 　　纵观近代世界经济发展史，中国和许多国家的经验证明，工业化是一个国家经济发展的必由之路。中国一个半世纪的工业化历程充满艰辛和曲折。早在19世纪中叶，中国在列强坚船利炮撞击之下，被迫打开国门，开始了被称为“洋务运动”的早期工业化。改革开放以后，中国驶入工业化的快速路。中国用了短短几十年时间，走过了发达国家几百年的历程，建成了体系完整、产能巨大的工业体系，成为世界制造业第一大国和全球第二大经济体，成功探索出一条符合中国国情的工业化道路。, 　　回顾中国工业化历程，我们深刻认识到，搞好工业化，闭门造车不行，经济全球化时代的工业化需要利用好国内国外两个市场、两种资源，发挥好自身比较优势，实现资源全球配置。要充分借鉴和吸收先进国家的经验，根据本国国情选择适合自身特点的工业化道路。非洲作为全球发展潜力最大的地区，完全可以发挥优势，大有作为。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　工业化是非洲实现包容性和可持续发展的前提，是创造就业、消除贫困、提高生活水平的关键。非洲工业化之路，需要非洲人民去实践、去探索。中国真诚希望同非洲国家分享中国经验，愿为非洲工业化进程提供资金、技术、人才支持。在工业、基础设施建设、投资和贸易便利化等领域，中非合作将为双方企业投资和贸易提供更多机会，从而提高非洲产业竞争力，弥补非洲基础设施缺口；在现代农业、绿色发展、减贫惠民等方面的合作，将促进中非企业分享先进技术和建立可持续发展模式，增强自主发展能力，提高公共治理水平，改善非洲人民生活。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　新形势带来新机遇，中非应该继承真诚友好的光荣传统，把互助合作精神发扬光大。为加强中非友好合作，我提出以下建议。, 　　第一，坚持互利共赢的平等合作。中非双方应该坚持义利并举原则，从中非发展实际出发，相互考虑对方关切，寻找和扩大利益交集，共同打造中非命运共同体。, 　　第二，坚持开放包容的多方合作。当今世界已经发展成为密切联系的整体。我们主张全球经济开放包容，坚决反对贸易和投资保护主义。中非经贸合作是开放的合作，欢迎其他国家的企业在互利共赢基础上，加入到中非合作中来。, 　　第三，坚持能力导向的务实合作。中方愿意毫无保留地同非方分享先进适用技术，愿意将中国优势产业同非洲发展需要相结合，深化产业合作，促进非洲劳动力素质提高，创造就业，增强非洲经济发展内生动力。我们将通过派遣专家、建立职业培训中心、加强中非人才培训和企业家交流，切实帮助非洲解决工业化人才需求和能力建设问题。, 　　第四，坚持绿色低碳可持续发展。非洲拥有丰富的自然资源和优越的生态环境，中非合作要把可持续发展放在第一位。我们将为非洲国家实施应对气候变化及生态保护项目，为非洲国家培训生态保护领域专业人才，帮助非洲走绿色低碳可持续发展道路。, 　　第五，坚持基础优先的重点合作。我们将对中非全方位经贸合作进行整体规划设计，支持非洲国家农田水利建设，强化交通基础设施和动力保障，大力支持中小企业发展和减贫惠民项目建设，让中非合作造福于民，惠及全民。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　企业家是中非经贸合作的主体，是推动中非友谊的使者。我衷心希望广大中非企业家担负起中非经贸全方位合作的重担，勇于创新，互相借鉴，共同为创造中非人民的美好未来而努力！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社约翰内斯堡12月4日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年12月05日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平：携手共进，谱写中非合作新篇章

eng: [, On December 1, on the eve of his state visit to South Africa, President Xi Jinping published a signed article entitled "Making the Rainbow of Friendship and Cooperation More Dazzling" in the South African Star. The article is as follows: To make the rainbow of friendship and cooperation even more dazzling, President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, "Rainbow Country" South Africa, is a dazzling pearl inlaid on the southernmost tip of the African continent. This is a magical land with beautiful scenery, rich resources, hardworking people and diverse cultures. On this land, Mandela was born, deducing the legend of racial reconciliation that turned Gange into a jade silk. The triumphant and glorious history of the national liberation struggle here gives South Africa a unique and profound charm that attracts the world's attention. With the friendly feelings towards my close brothers, I will once again set foot on this beautiful land, pay a state visit to South Africa, and chair the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation with President Zuma. , "Aspirants, don't take mountains and seas as far away as possible." Although China and South Africa are separated by thousands of mountains and rivers, the friendship between the peoples of the two countries has lasted forever. As early as the anti-apartheid struggle of the South African people, the Chinese people firmly supported the just cause of the South African people for equality, freedom and liberation, and they shared their deep friendship with the South African people in the same breath, common destiny and heart. In 1998, China officially established diplomatic relations with New South Africa, which opened a new era of China-South Africa relations. Over the past 17 years, China-South Africa relations have developed in an all-round way, achieving a three-step jump from partnership to strategic partnership to comprehensive strategic partnership, completing the historic leap in the development of bilateral relations and becoming the most dynamic and One of the important bilateral relations. Over the past 17 years, China-South Africa friendly cooperation has grown from a small boat to a giant ship, and has continued to ride the wind and waves along the direction of mutual benefit, win-win and common development. At present, China-South Africa relations have entered the best period in history, from an unprecedented degree of political mutual trust and increasingly close international cooperation, to fruitful and pragmatic cooperation, and rich and colorful cultural and cultural exchanges, all reflecting the strategic height of China-South Africa relations. , In 2013, I came to South Africa after my first visit as the Chinese President. In the past three years, President Zuma and I have exchanged visits, held many meetings on multilateral occasions, reached a series of important consensuses on the development of China-South Africa relations under the new situation, and determined bilateral relations as the strategic fulcrum and priority of their respective foreign policies, and jointly formulated The "China-South Africa 5-10 Years Cooperation Strategic Plan" has injected strong momentum into the development of China-South Africa comprehensive strategic partnership. , China-South Africa relations have gone beyond the bilateral scope and become increasingly of strategic significance and global influence. Both China and South Africa are major developing countries and emerging market countries. They adhere to the same or similar outlooks on development, security, and international order. They have broad consensus on major international affairs and hot issues. The two sides are in the United Nations, the G20, and the BRICS countries. , International organizations such as the “four basic nations” of climate change, and multilateral mechanisms have coordinated and cooperated closely and carried out fruitful cooperation. The integration of economic and trade cooperation between the two countries has deepened. In 2014, the bilateral trade volume between China and South Africa was US$60.3 billion, a nearly 40-fold increase over the establishment of diplomatic relations. China has been South Africa’s largest trading partner for six consecutive years. China's investment in South Africa has grown from scratch and has reached US$13 billion so far. South Africa has become the country with the most Chinese investment in Africa. The home appliance industrial park, automobile, locomotive assembly plant, cement plant and other projects invested and constructed by Chinese companies in South Africa have created tens of thousands of local jobs. Hisense TVs and refrigerators have entered thousands of households in South Africa as major home appliance brands. South African companies in China The Snow Beer produced by the joint venture has also become a favorite beverage of the Chinese people. The people of the two countries have built a rainbow bridge of friendship. South Africa is an African country that has established friendly provinces and cities with China, has Confucius Institutes and classrooms, and accepts the most Chinese students. Last year and this year, China and South Africa successfully held national annual events in each other’s country, showing wonderful arts and culture and development achievements to the people of the other country, which caused strong reactions. This is the first time between China and African countries, which has created China-Africa humanities. A new chapter in communication. In the friendly relations between China and all other countries, 17 years is not long. However, with the personal promotion of China and South Africa and the sincere efforts of both sides, China-South Africa relations have developed over the past 17 years and have become a model of unity and cooperation between China and Africa and even with major developing countries. , "Being desperate for a thousand miles, to a higher level." China-South Africa relations have stood at a new historical starting point, and the two sides have a strong willingness to strengthen cooperation. We are willing to work with the South to seize opportunities and take advantage of the momentum to push China-South Africa comprehensive strategic partnership to a new level and better benefit both peoples. -China and South Africa will be strategic partners facing the future with a high degree of mutual trust. Both sides must always be strategic and long-termStepping up to a new level to better benefit the two peoples. -China and South Africa will be strategic partners facing the future with a high degree of mutual trust. The two sides must always view and develop relations between the two countries from a strategic and long-term perspective, continuously consolidate and enhance mutual political trust between the two countries, and lay a solid political foundation for the long-term and healthy development of comprehensive and pragmatic cooperation between China and South Africa. -China and South Africa should be development partners of equality, mutual benefit and win-win cooperation. We must give play to the two major advantages of political mutual trust and economic complementarity, transform China-South Africa friendship into a powerful driving force for practical cooperation between the two countries, and promote cooperation in key areas such as marine economy, production capacity, energy, infrastructure construction, human resources development, and finance. More fruitful results bring more tangible benefits to the people of the two countries. -China and South Africa should be friendly partners who know each other and exchange ideas. Friendship starts with knowing and understanding. China is willing to strengthen exchanges and cooperation with the South in the areas of tourism, culture, education, youth, women, think tanks, media and other fields. We look forward to the people of the two countries constantly closer to each other in more exchanges. We also welcome more South African friends to go to China , Take a look. -China and South Africa should be global partners that support each other and work closely together. China supports the South to play a greater role in international and regional affairs, and is willing to strengthen coordination and cooperation between the two sides in important international mechanisms and on major international issues, and jointly be a staunch defender of the interests of developing countries and world peace, stability, and prosperity. Active promoter. This year is a year of special significance in the development of China-South Africa relations and China-Africa relations. Another important agenda for my visit to South Africa this time is to host the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation with President Zuma. This year coincides with the 15th anniversary of the establishment of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum. Over the past 15 years, the China-Africa Cooperation Forum has become an important platform for China-Africa collective dialogue and an effective mechanism for promoting pragmatic cooperation. It has effectively promoted the common development of China and Africa and brought tangible benefits to the people of China and Africa. China is the largest developing country, Africa is the continent with the largest concentration of developing countries, China and Africa have always been a community of shared destiny. At present, African countries generally look forward to accelerating the process of industrialization and agricultural modernization, and are committed to achieving economic independence and independent and sustainable development. China is comprehensively deepening reforms and advancing economic restructuring, and has more mutual benefits with African countries on the basis of complementary advantages. Conditions for winning development. China-Africa development strategy is highly compatible, and China-Africa cooperation development has ushered in unprecedented historic opportunities. The China-Africa Cooperation Forum Johannesburg Summit is about to kick off. This is the second summit held in the 15 years since the Forum was established and the first China-Africa summit to be held on the African continent. The leaders of China and Africa gathered together to discuss friendship and seek cooperation. They will comprehensively plan China-Africa friendly and pragmatic cooperation in various fields in the next three years, promote the comprehensive development of China-Africa cooperation, and raise China-Africa relations to a new height. This forum summit is a milestone in the development of China-Africa relations. It will send a strong signal to the world that China and Africa go hand in hand, win-win cooperation and common development, so that the people of China and Africa and the world can see new prospects for development. At present, the international situation continues to undergo profound and complex changes, the overall strength of developing countries continues to rise, and the world will increasingly pay attention to the vibrant continent of Africa. We believe that the upcoming China-Africa Summit will promote South-South cooperation, drive North-South dialogue, and promote the development of the international governance system in a more just and reasonable direction. We look forward to the success of this historic event and the opening of a new era of win-win cooperation and common development between China and Africa. , I look forward to and firmly believe that as long as we work together, China-South Africa and China-Africa relations will surely take the lead and go further. The rainbow of friendship and cooperation between China and South Africa and China and Africa between the Asian and African continents will be more brilliant and dazzling! (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 1st), "People's Daily" (01st December, 2015 version),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in South African media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-02
text: [, 12月1日，在对南非进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在南非《星报》发表题为《让友谊、合作的彩虹更加绚丽夺目》的署名文章。文章如下：, 　　让友谊、合作的彩虹更加绚丽夺目, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平, “彩虹之国”南非，是镶嵌在非洲大陆最南端一颗耀眼的明珠。这是一片神奇的土地，风光秀美，资源富饶，人民勤劳，文化多元。在这片土地上，诞生了曼德拉，演绎了化干戈为玉帛的种族和解传奇。这里历经磨难又充满荣耀的民族解放斗争历史，赋予南非独特、深厚的魅力，吸引着世界的目光。, 怀着对亲密兄弟的友好感情，我将再次踏上这片美丽的土地，对南非进行国事访问，并同祖马总统一道主持中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会。, “志合者，不以山海为远。”中国和南非虽然远隔千山万水，但两国人民友谊历久弥坚。早在南非人民反种族隔离斗争时期，中国人民就坚定支持南非人民争取平等、自由、解放的正义事业，同南非人民同呼吸、共命运、心连心，结下了深厚情谊。, 1998年中国同新南非正式建交，开启了中南关系新纪元。17年来，中南关系全面发展，实现了从伙伴关系到战略伙伴关系、再到全面战略伙伴关系的三级跳，完成了双边关系大踏步发展的历史性跨越，成为各自对外关系中最具活力、最重要的双边关系之一。, 17年来，中南友好合作已经从一艘小船成长为巨轮，沿着互利共赢、共同发展的方向不断乘风破浪前行。当前，中南关系进入历史最好时期，从程度空前的政治互信、日益密切的国际协作，到成果丰硕的务实合作、丰富多彩的人文交流，无不体现着中南关系的战略高度。, 2013年，我就任中国国家主席后首次出访就来到南非。近3年来，我和祖马总统实现互访，在多边场合多次举行会晤，就新形势下中南关系发展达成一系列重要共识，将双边关系确定为各自对外政策战略支点和优先方向，共同制定了《中南5—10年合作战略规划》，为中南全面战略伙伴关系发展注入了强劲动力。, 中南关系已经超越双边范畴，越来越具有战略意义和全球影响。中南都是发展中大国和新兴市场国家，秉持相同或相近的发展观、安全观、国际秩序观，在重大国际事务和热点问题上有着广泛共识，双方在联合国、二十国集团、金砖国家、气候变化“基础四国”等国际组织和多边机制中密切协调和配合，开展了卓有成效的合作。, 两国经贸合作利益交融不断加深。2014年，中南双边贸易额603亿美元，较建交时增长了近40倍，中国已经连续6年成为南非最大贸易伙伴。中国对南非投资从无到有，迄今已经达到130亿美元，南非成为中国在非洲投资最多的国家。中国企业在南非投资建设的家电产业园、汽车、机车组装厂、水泥厂等项目为当地创造了上万个就业机会，海信电视、冰箱作为主要家电品牌走入南非千家万户，南非企业在华合资生产的雪花啤酒也成为深受中国人民喜爱的饮品。, 两国人民架起了友谊的彩虹之桥。南非是同中国建立友好省市、设有孔子学院和课堂、接纳中国留学生最多的非洲国家。去年和今年，中南两国分别在对方国家成功举办国家年活动，向对方国家人民展示了精彩的艺术文化和发展成就，引起强烈反响，这在中国同非洲国家中属于首次，开创了中非人文交流的新篇章。, 在中国同所有其他国家友好关系中，17年并不长。但在中南两国高层亲自推动和双方精诚努力下，中南关系历经17年发展，已经成为中国同非洲乃至同发展中大国团结合作的典范。, “欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。”中南关系已经站在新的历史起点上，双方加强合作的意愿强烈。我们愿同南方一道，抓住机遇，乘势而上，推动中南全面战略伙伴关系不断迈上新台阶，更好造福两国人民。, ——中南要做面向未来、高度互信的战略伙伴。双方要始终从战略高度和长远角度看待和发展两国关系，不断巩固和增进两国政治互信，为中南全面务实合作的长期健康发展奠定坚实政治基础。, ——中南要做平等互利、合作共赢的发展伙伴。我们要发挥政治互信和经济互补两大优势，将中南友好更多转化为两国务实合作的强大动力，推动海洋经济、产能、能源、基础设施建设、人力资源开发、金融等重点领域合作结出更多硕果，为两国人民带来更多实实在在的利益。, ——中南要做相知相亲、交流互鉴的友好伙伴。友谊从认识和理解开始。中方愿同南方加强旅游、文化、教育、青年、妇女、智库、媒体等领域交流合作，期待两国人民在更多的往来中不断拉近彼此距离，也欢迎更多南非朋友到中国走一走、看一看。, ——中南要做相互支持、密切协作的全球伙伴。中方支持南方在国际和地区事务中发挥更大作用，愿加强双方在重要国际机制中以及重大国际问题上的协调和合作，共同做广大发展中国家利益的坚定维护者和世界和平、稳定、繁荣的积极促进者。, 今年是中南关系、也是中非关系发展进程中具有特殊意义的年份。我这次访问南非的另一项重要日程，是同祖马总统一道主持中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会。今年恰逢中非合作论坛成立15周年。15年来，中非合作论坛已经成为中非集体对话的重要平台和促进务实合作的有效机制，有力促进了中非共同发展，给中非人民带来了实实在在的利益。, 中国是最大的发展中国家，非洲是发展中国家最集中的大陆，中国和非洲历来是命运共同体。当前，非洲各国普遍期待加快工业化和农业现代化进程，致力于实现经济独立和自主可持续发展，中国正在全面深化改革，推进经济结构调整，具备了更多同非洲国家在优势互补基础上实现互利共赢发展的条件。中非发展战略高度契合，中非合作发展迎来了前所未有的历史性机遇。, 中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会即将拉开帷幕，这是论坛成立15年来举行的第二次峰会，也是首次在非洲大陆举行的中非峰会。中非领导人汇聚一堂，共叙友谊、共谋合作，将全面规划中非未来3年各领域友好务实合作，推动中非合作全面发展，将中非关系提升到新的高度。这次论坛峰会是中非关系发展的里程碑，将向世界发出中非携手并进、合作共赢、共同发展的强烈信号，让中非和世界人民看到发展的新前景。, 当前，国际形势继续发生深刻复杂变化，发展中国家整体力量不断上升，世界将关注的目光越来越投向非洲这个生机勃勃的大陆。我们相信，即将举行的中非峰会将促进南南合作，带动南北对话，推动国际治理体系向更加公正合理方向发展。我们期待这一历史性盛会取得圆满成功，开启中非合作共赢、共同发展的新时代。, 我期待并坚信，只要我们携手努力，中南、中非关系必将百尺竿头、更进一步，跨越在亚非大陆之间的中南、中非友谊和合作的彩虹，必将更加绚丽夺目！（新华社北京12月1日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年12月02日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在南非媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, On November 30, on the eve of a state visit to Zimbabwe, President Xi Jinping published a signed article entitled "Let China and Tianjin Friendship Bloom a More Brilliant Bloom" in the Herald of Zimbabwe. The article is as follows: Let China-Tsinjin Friendship Bloom More Brilliantly, President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, at the invitation of President Robert Gabriel Mugabe, I will pay a state visit to Zimbabwe from December 1st to 2nd. This is my first visit to Zimbabwe, and I am looking forward to this trip. , Although I have not yet embarked on the land of Zimbabwe, I am no stranger to this beautiful country and the people here. Here has a long history, splendid civilization, beautiful scenery, rich products, and more industrious, intelligent, brave and strong people. The people of Zimbabwe have always cherished national independence and defended national dignity, and are committed to the joint self-improvement of the African continent. Just like the stone sculpture "Zimbabwe Bird" in the Great Zimbabwe ruins, it has never changed its character after years and wind and rain. The headwind is exactly the motivating force for birds to fly and fly higher. Although China and Zimbabwe are thousands of miles away, the traditional friendship that connects the two peoples is deep and strong. During the struggle for national liberation in Zimbabwe, the two peoples fought side by side and forged an unforgettable friendship. I heard that many Zimbabwean freedom fighters who had been trained by the Chinese in China and in Nachingwe camp in Tanzania still hummed songs such as "Three Disciplines and Eight Attentions", which made me very moved. On April 18, 1980, the day Zimbabwe became independent, China and Zimbabwe established diplomatic relations. Over the past 35 years, the Chinese people and the Zimbabwean people have been in the same boat, their friendship has lasted forever, and their cooperation has been fruitful. Last August, President Mugabe successfully paid a state visit to China. Both China and Tianjin agreed to make the two countries a good partner, good friend and good brother who treat each other on an equal footing, support each other, benefit each other and achieve common development. This consensus is of great significance for leading the development of China-Tianjin relations. At present, China is the fourth largest trading partner and the largest source of investment in Zimbabwe. Projects such as the expansion of the Victoria Falls Airport, the expansion of the Kariba South Bank Hydropower Station, and the "Mobile One Network" telecommunications transformation and other projects financed and undertaken by China will provide important assistance for Zimbabwe to improve its infrastructure. China-Tianjin friendship has also taken root in the hearts of the two peoples. As far as I know, there is a mother group called "Love of Africa" ​​among the overseas Chinese living in Zimbabwe, and there is a "Father Cheng" known to local children even with the license plate number. They have been sending care and warmth to the local orphans for many years. They have written the "present tense" of Sino-Tianjin friendship with practical actions, and also cultivated the "future tense" of Sino-Tianjin friendship. , Last year, President Mugabe presented a pair of lion cubs to the Chinese people on behalf of the people of Zimbabwe during his visit to China and has now officially settled in the Shanghai Wildlife Park. They are named "jinjin" and "fifi". In Chinese, it is homophonic with "Zimbabwe" and "Africa", which implies friendship between China and Zimbabwe. They have become messengers of Sino-Tianjin friendship and are loved by the Chinese people, especially children. The extraordinary development of Sino-Tianjin relations shows that Sino-Tianjin friendship stems from the cultural traditions of sincerity, friendship and loyalty between the two countries, from the basic principles of foreign relations that the two countries jointly follow, such as independence and mutual respect, and from the economic development of the two countries. 1. The common mission to improve people's livelihood. Although the international situation continues to undergo profound and complex changes, consolidating relations with a large number of African countries, including Zimbabwe, has always been the cornerstone of China’s diplomacy and will never change. China will continue to uphold the true and sincere policy concept of Africa and a correct view of justice and benefit, go hand in hand with Zimbabwe and other African friendly countries, and make the path of mutual benefit and common development between China and Africa wider and better. At present, the Chinese people are working hard to achieve the goal of "two hundred years" and the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Zimbabwe is actively promoting the "Sustainable Economic and Social Transformation Plan" and is committed to achieving economic independence and independent and sustainable development. I look forward to through this visit, in-depth exchanges with President Mugabe and friends from all walks of life in Zimbabwe, to enhance friendship between the two countries, explore new opportunities for cooperation in various fields, and bring more benefits to the people of the two countries. ——We should continue to understand and support each other on issues involving each other’s core interests and major concerns. China firmly supports Zimbabwe’s safeguarding of national sovereignty, security and development interests and Zimbabwe’s choice of development path according to its own national conditions. , ——We must closely link the development strategies of the two countries, transform the complementary advantages of the economy into more tangible results of cooperation, and strengthendevelopment route. -We must closely link the development strategies of the two countries, transform the complementary economic advantages into more tangible results of cooperation, strengthen the exchange of development ideas, and promote the improvement of pragmatic cooperation. ——We should strengthen humanities exchanges, strengthen cooperation in the fields of education, culture, health, tourism, youth, think tanks, and media, consolidate the friendly public opinion and social foundation of the two countries, and let the friendship between China and Tianjin pass from generation to generation. -We must strengthen international cooperation and safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of developing countries. China appreciates Zimbabwe's important contribution to maintaining African unity and promoting African development as the African Union's rotating presidency. After concluding his visit to Zimbabwe, President Mugabe and I will travel to South Africa to attend the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation. This is the second summit held in the 15 years since the establishment of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum and the first China-Africa summit held on the African continent. There is a proverb in Zimbabwe called "a wood fire is not well cooked and szaza", and the Chinese often say that "all people gather firewood with high flames". I look forward to meeting with leaders of African countries at the China-Africa Cooperation Forum Summit to discuss friendship and seek cooperation, raise China-Africa unity to a new height, and create a bright future for China-Africa friendly cooperation. In Harare in November, the fiery red phoenix blossoms full of branches, bringing people enthusiasm, hope and strength. I believe that with the careful cultivation of the people of China and Tianjin, the flower of friendship between China and Tianjin will surely bloom more brilliantly! (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 30th), Note: Sadza (Sadza) means white cornmeal in the official Zimbabwe Shona language, and is a favorite staple food of the Zimbabwean people. "A wood fire is not well-cooked, Zaza" is a Sauna proverb, the original text is "Chikuni chimwe hachikodzi sadza.", "People's Daily" (December 01, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in Zimbabwe media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-01
text: [, 11月30日，在对津巴布韦进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在津巴布韦《先驱报》发表题为《让中津友谊绽放出更加绚丽的芳华》的署名文章。文章如下：, 让中津友谊绽放出更加绚丽的芳华, 中华人民共和国主席  习近平, 应罗伯特·加布里埃尔·穆加贝总统邀请，我将于12月1日至2日对津巴布韦进行国事访问。这是我首次访问津巴布韦，我对此行充满期待。, 尽管尚未踏上津巴布韦的土地，但我对这个美丽国家和这里的人民并不陌生。这里有悠久的历史、灿烂的文明、秀丽的风景、丰饶的物产，更有勤劳智慧、勇敢坚强的人民。, 津巴布韦人民一贯珍视国家独立、捍卫民族尊严，致力于非洲大陆的联合自强。正如大津巴布韦遗址中的石雕“津巴布韦鸟”，历经岁月和风雨打磨始终不改本色。逆风，恰恰是激励鸟儿展翅翱翔、越飞越高的动力。, 中国和津巴布韦虽然远隔万里，但联结两国人民的传统友谊深厚而牢固。在津巴布韦民族解放斗争时期，两国人民并肩战斗，结下了难忘的战友情。我听说，许多当年在中国国内和坦桑尼亚纳钦圭阿营地接受中方培训的津巴布韦自由战士，至今仍会哼唱《三大纪律、八项注意》等歌曲，这令我非常感动。, 1980年4月18日津巴布韦独立当天，中津两国就建立了外交关系。35年来，中国人民和津巴布韦人民风雨同舟，友谊历久弥坚，合作硕果累累。去年8月，穆加贝总统成功对中国进行国事访问。中津双方一致同意将两国打造成为平等相待、相互支持、互利共赢、共同发展的好伙伴、好朋友、好兄弟。这一共识对引领中津关系发展具有重要意义。, 目前，中国是津巴布韦第四大贸易伙伴和第一大投资来源国。中方融资并承担的维多利亚瀑布市机场扩建、卡里巴南岸水电站扩建、“移动壹网”电信改造等项目，将为津巴布韦改善基础设施提供重要助力。, 中津友好也在两国人民心中生根发芽。据我了解，旅居津巴布韦的华侨中间有一个名为“非爱不可”（Love of Africa）的妈妈团体，还有一位连车牌号都被当地孩子熟知的“程爸爸”（Father Cheng）。他们多年如一日给当地孤儿送去关爱和温暖，用实际行动书写着中津友好的“现在时”，也培育着中津友好的“将来时”。, 去年，穆加贝总统访华时代表津巴布韦人民赠送给中国人民1对小狮子，现已正式落户上海野生动物园。它们被命名为“津津”和“菲菲”。在中文中同“津巴布韦”和“非洲”谐音，寓意中津和中非友好。它们已经成为中津友谊的使者，受到中国人民特别是小朋友们的喜爱。, 中津关系不平凡的发展历程表明，中津友谊源于两国真诚友好、重情守义的文化传统，源于两国共同遵循的独立自主、相互尊重等对外关系基本原则，源于两国发展经济、改善民生的共同使命。, 尽管国际形势不断发生深刻复杂变化，但巩固同包括津巴布韦在内的广大非洲国家关系始终是中国外交的基石，永远不会改变。中国将继续秉持真实亲诚的对非政策理念和正确义利观，同津巴布韦以及其他非洲友好国家携手并进，把中非互利共赢、共同发展的道路走得更宽更好。, 当前，中国人民正在为实现“两个一百年”奋斗目标、实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦而努力奋斗。津巴布韦正在积极推进“可持续经济社会转型计划”，致力于实现经济独立和自主可持续发展。我期待通过这次访问，同穆加贝总统和津巴布韦各界朋友深入交流，增进两国友好，探讨各领域合作新机遇，为两国人民带来更多福祉。, ——我们要继续在涉及彼此核心利益和重大关切问题上相互理解和支持，中方坚定支持津方维护国家主权、安全、发展利益，坚定支持津巴布韦根据自身国情选择发展道路。, ——我们要把两国发展战略紧密对接起来，将经济互补优势转化为更多实实在在的合作成果，加强发展理念交流，推动务实合作提高水平。, ——我们要密切人文交流，加强教育、文化、卫生、旅游、青年、智库、媒体等领域合作，巩固两国友好民意和社会基础，让中津友谊代代相传。, ——我们要加强国际协作，维护发展中国家正当权益。中方赞赏津巴布韦作为非盟轮值主席国为维护非洲团结和促进非洲发展所作的重要贡献。, 在结束对津巴布韦访问之后，我和穆加贝总统将前往南非出席中非合作论坛约翰内斯堡峰会。这是中非合作论坛成立15年来举行的第二次峰会，也是首次在非洲大陆举行的中非峰会。, 津巴布韦有句谚语叫做“一根柴火煮不熟萨杂”，中国人也常说“众人拾柴火焰高”。我期待着在中非合作论坛峰会上同非洲国家领导人共聚一堂，共叙友谊，共谋合作，将中非团结提升到新的高度，共创中非友好合作美好未来。, 11月的哈拉雷，火红的凤凰花开满枝头，带给人们以热情、希望、力量。我相信，在中津两国人民悉心培育下，中津友谊之花一定会绽放出更加绚丽的色彩！（新华社北京11月30日电）, 注：萨杂（Sadza）在津巴布韦官方语言绍纳语中意为白玉米面，是津巴布韦人民喜爱的主食。“一根柴火煮不熟萨杂”为绍纳族谚语，原文为“Chikuni chimwe hachikodzi sadza。”, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年12月01日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在津巴布韦媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, Mr. Chairman, colleagues: In November last year, we gathered in Beijing to jointly paint a blueprint for the development of the Asia-Pacific region. After a lapse of one year, we met again, the goal is still to deepen Asia-Pacific cooperation and promote the common development of Asia-Pacific. The Philippines has done a lot of work to prepare for this informal meeting of APEC leaders. We are grateful for this. Two days ago, the leaders of the Group of 20 gathered in Antalya to work together for the world economy. Everyone generally believes that there is still much uncertainty in the world economy, but we have reason to be confident in the prospects. , Asia Pacific is the epitome of the world. In the context of weak world economic recovery, weak demand, and divergent trends, the Asia-Pacific economy is also facing various challenges such as an unstable growth foundation, the conversion of old and new power, and incomplete structural adjustments. However, the Asia-Pacific economy is still the locomotive that drives the world economy. We should base ourselves on the present and the future, use the important platform of APEC to promote win-win cooperation, and let Asia-Pacific continue to lead global growth. -We must focus on the long-term and improve the strategic framework for Asia-Pacific medium- and long-term cooperation. The ancient Chinese sages said: "If you don't stand up, there is nothing that can't happen in the world." People can't do without ideals, and cooperation can't lack direction. Asia-Pacific cooperation must face the future, lead the future, plan generously and shape the overall pattern. , In the past period, we have been making efforts in this direction. Last year, we launched the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Zone process and formulated a blueprint for connectivity. This year, we continue to work on formulating strategic frameworks and action plans in multiple areas. We must maintain the strategic, forward-looking and aggressive nature of cooperation and determine the goals, measures and timetables in key areas. China has submitted a progress report on the implementation of the outcome of the Beijing Conference to this meeting. We hope that each member will put the consensus reached by the leaders on the priority of all work. -We must reform and innovate and seek new growth drivers for the Asia-Pacific economy. At present, in the face of the new situation and new challenges, only reform and innovation can work together to twist the valve of the Asia-Pacific economy and unleash powerful power. , We must promote the transformation of development mode and the adjustment of economic structure. It is necessary to accelerate the pace of innovation and make the water of economic rivers alive, flowing continuously. China is in favor of formulating and implementing the "Service Industry Cooperation Framework" and supporting small and medium-sized enterprises to participate in the global market. We must also implement the Strategic Blueprint for Promoting the Development and Cooperation of Global Value Chains to enhance the economic growth of gold. Urbanization, the Internet economy, and the blue economy are all areas of cooperation with great potential. It is necessary to expand and deepen cooperation between all parties, release positive effects, and create new economic growth points. I would like to announce that China will host the first APEC Urbanization High-level Forum next year to build an exchange and cooperation platform for Asia-Pacific urbanization cooperation. -We must promote integration and create an open Asia-Pacific economy. APEC should play a leading and coordinating role, strengthen the regional trade agreement information exchange mechanism, promote the coordinated development of regional trade agreements, and build an institutionalized platform for the Asia-Pacific open economy. , We must speed up the process and establish the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area as soon as possible. To complete the joint strategic study on schedule, draw conclusions and recommendations that are in line with the long-term interests of all parties, and make solid preparations for moving to the next stage of work. In advancing the process of regional trade agreements, all parties must maintain openness and tolerance, seek win-win cooperation, and maintain the multilateral trading system. We will continue to provide strong guidance for ending the Doha Round negotiations and promote the achievement of a balanced, meaningful, and development-oriented outcome at the 10th WTO Ministerial Conference. , ——We need to take action to turn the consensus into results. "What you see is not what you know, what you don't know is what you do." The blueprint for interconnection adopted by the Beijing Conference is of great significance for solving the bottleneck of Asia-Pacific development, and we must continue to vigorously promote it. The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank is an important supporting platform for regional interconnection. China and relevant countries are stepping up preparations. The bank is expected to be officially established before the end of this year, and the reserve project for alternative projects has also started. The Silk Road Economic Belt proposed by China and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road are steadily advancing. All parties have established priority cooperation areas focusing on economic corridors, and the Silk Road Fund’s project operations have been launched. China is willing to continue to contribute to strengthening the capacity building of APEC. Last year, China announced that it would donate US$10 million to APEC and provide 1,500 training places for developing members. At present, China has provided the first US$2.8 million to complete nearly 1,000 training sessions. Under the new situation in which Asia-Pacific has become more closely connected with the world and interests are increasingly integrated, it is of great significance to strengthen cooperation between APEC and other international mechanisms. Last year, China hosted the informal meeting of APEC leaders with 20 countriesCooperation between APEC and other international mechanisms is of great significance. Last year, China, as the host country of the APEC Economic Leaders’ Informal Meeting, fully coordinated with Australia, the host country of the G20 Leaders’ Summit, to achieve synergy between the two mechanisms. Next year, China and Peru will host the G20 summit and the APEC informal meeting of leaders, respectively. We are willing to strengthen collaboration with Peru and all parties to ensure the success of these two important meetings. , Colleagues! , The future of Asia-Pacific belongs to every member of the big family. Last year, we jointly advocated mutual trust, tolerance, cooperation and win-win in Beijing, and established the guiding principles of the Asia-Pacific partnership. This is a profound summary of past cooperation and a solemn commitment to future cooperation, which has important guiding significance. China will deepen mutually beneficial cooperation and interconnection with Asia-Pacific countries and maintain a peaceful and stable development environment. China has put forward proposals for the "13th Five-Year Plan", and we will vigorously promote innovative development, coordinated development, green development, open development, and shared development. China is determined, confident, and capable of promoting sustained and healthy economic development, creating more opportunities for the Asia-Pacific and bringing more well-being. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Manila, November 19th), "People's Daily" (November 20, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Deepen partnership to promote Asia-Pacific prosperity
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-11-20
