text: [, 主席先生，, 各位同事：, 去年11月，我们齐聚北京，共同描绘亚太发展蓝图。时隔一年，我们再次聚首，目标仍然是深化亚太合作，推动亚太共同发展。菲律宾为筹备这次亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议做了大量工作，我们对此表示感谢。, 两天前，二十国集团领导人相聚安塔利亚，一起为世界经济把脉。大家普遍认为，世界经济仍然存在较多不确定性，但我们有理由对前景充满信心。, 亚太是世界的缩影。在世界经济复苏乏力、需求疲弱、走势分化的形势下，亚太经济也面临增长基础不稳、新旧动力转换、结构调整不彻底等种种挑战，但亚太仍然是拉动世界经济的火车头。我们应该立足当前、面向未来，运用亚太经合组织这一重要平台，推进合作共赢，让亚太继续引领全球增长。, ——我们要着眼长远，完善亚太中长期合作战略架构。中国古代先贤说：“志不立，天下无可成之事。”人不能没有理想，合作不能缺少方向。亚太合作要面向未来、引领未来，谋划大手笔、塑造大格局。, 过去一个时期，我们一直朝着这个方向作出努力。去年，我们启动亚太自由贸易区进程，制定互联互通蓝图。今年，我们继续致力于在多个领域制定战略框架和行动计划。我们要保持合作的战略性、前瞻性、进取性，确定重点领域的目标、举措、时间表。中方向本次会议提交了北京会议成果落实进展报告，我们希望每个成员都把落实领导人达成的共识置于各项工作的优先位置。, ——我们要改革创新，为亚太经济寻求新的增长动力。当前，面对新形势新挑战，唯有让改革和创新两只手一起发力，方能拧动亚太经济的阀门、释放强大动力。, 我们要推进发展方式转变、经济结构调整。要加快创新步伐，让经济河流的水活起来，源源不断流淌。中方赞成制定和实施《服务业合作框架》，支持中小微企业参与全球市场。我们也要落实好《促进全球价值链发展合作战略蓝图》，增强经济增长含金量。城镇化、互联网经济、蓝色经济都是具有巨大潜力的合作领域，要扩大和深化各方合作，释放积极效能，打造新的经济增长点。我愿宣布，中国将于明年主办首届亚太经合组织城镇化高层论坛，为亚太城镇化合作搭建交流合作平台。, ——我们要推进一体化，打造开放型亚太经济。亚太经合组织要发挥引领和协调作用，强化区域贸易协定信息交流机制，促进区域贸易协定协调发展，为亚太开放型经济搭建制度化平台。, 我们要加快进程，尽早建成亚太自由贸易区。要如期完成联合战略研究，得出符合各方长远利益的结论和建议，为转入下一阶段工作做好扎实准备。各方在推进区域贸易协定进程中，要保持开放包容，谋求合作共赢，维护多边贸易体制。我们要继续为结束多哈回合谈判提供强有力指导，推动世界贸易组织第十届部长级会议达成平衡、有意义、符合发展内涵的成果。, ——我们要采取行动，把共识转化为成果。“见之不若知之，知之不若行之。”北京会议通过的互联互通蓝图，对解决亚太发展瓶颈性问题具有十分重要的意义，要继续大力推进。亚洲基础设施投资银行是区域互联互通的重要支撑平台，中国及有关国家正在加紧筹建，银行预计于今年年底前正式成立，备选项目储备工作也已经启动。中方倡议的丝绸之路经济带和21世纪海上丝绸之路正在稳步推进，各方已经确立以经济走廊为重点的优先合作领域，丝路基金的项目运营已经启动。, 中方愿继续为加强亚太经合组织能力建设作出贡献。去年中方宣布将向亚太经合组织捐款1000万美元并为发展中成员提供1500个培训名额。目前，中方已经提供首笔280万美元，完成近千人次的培训。, 在亚太与世界联系更加紧密、利益日益融合的新形势下，加强亚太经合组织同其他国际机制合作具有重要意义。去年，中国作为亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议东道国同二十国集团领导人峰会东道国澳大利亚充分协调，实现了两大机制协同。明年，中国和秘鲁将分别担任二十国集团峰会和亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议东道国。我们愿同秘鲁和各方加强协作，确保这两场重要会议取得成功。, 各位同事！, 亚太的未来属于大家庭每个成员。去年，我们在北京共同倡导互信、包容、合作、共赢，确立了亚太伙伴关系的指导原则。这是对以往合作的深刻总结，也是对未来合作的郑重承诺，具有重要指导意义。, 中国将深化同亚太国家的互利合作和互联互通，维护和平稳定的发展环境。中国已经提出了“十三五”规划建议，我们将大力推进创新发展、协调发展、绿色发展、开放发展、共享发展。中国有决心、有信心、有能力推动经济持续健康发展，为亚太创造更多机遇、带来更多福祉。, 谢谢大家。, （新华社马尼拉11月19日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年11月20日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：深化伙伴关系 共促亚太繁荣

eng: [, Dear President Putin, Dear Prime Minister Modi, Dear President Zuma, Dear President Rousseff, Dear Colleagues:, Nice to see you again. Thank you President Putin for hosting today’s meeting. After the Ufa meeting, our five countries have actively implemented various results, strengthened mutual communication and coordination, and jointly made new progress in promoting cooperation among BRICS countries. At the same time, new changes have taken place in the international situation, the world economy has been recovering slowly, geopolitical issues have become more prominent, and global challenges have emerged from time to time. Against this backdrop, the BRICS countries are also facing some new developments. First, there are more complex and difficult factors in the external environment, insufficient global total demand, intensified macroeconomic policy differentiation in various countries, and increased uncertainty in world economic growth. Second, affected by internal and external factors, the economic growth of the BRICS countries generally slowed down, and development entered an adjustment period. The third is that the voice of the declining BRICS countries has not stopped. , Real gold is not afraid of fire. The significance and value of a partner lies not only in the prosperity of the Chinese Communist Party in prosperity, but also in advancing together in adversity. As long as we strengthen our confidence and strengthen coordination, our cooperation will definitely be able to ride the wind and waves, through the clouds and fog, so that the world will have a new understanding of the quality of the BRICS countries. , To play a better role in the BRICS countries, I would like to make the following suggestions. (1) Create a favorable external development environment and jointly improve global economic governance. Recently, the causes of fluctuations in the stock and currency markets of various countries and global energy resource prices are complex, which is a transmission effect of the deep-seated impact of the international financial crisis. Therefore, we should guide all parties to form reasonable expectations for the development of the BRICS countries. It should be noted that although the economic growth rate of the BRICS countries has slowed down, emerging market countries have contributed more than 50% to world economic growth and are still an important engine of world economic growth. Looking ahead, the global economic recovery still needs the stamina and momentum of emerging market countries. We should strengthen cooperation within the framework of the G20, push all parties to increase macroeconomic policy coordination, focus on preventing short-term financial risks, and avoid currency wars and trade wars. At the same time, we must also take precautions to accelerate the construction of the BRICS New Development Bank and emergency reserve arrangements and work together to maintain international financial stability. Therefore, we should strengthen coordination and cooperation within the mechanisms of the International Monetary Fund, the World Bank, and the World Trade Organization, and strive to enhance the representation and voice of developing countries and emerging market countries in the international governance system. A few days ago, the International Monetary Fund has completed the SDR review report, which clearly pointed out that the RMB meets the free-use standard and recommended that the RMB be included in the SDR currency basket. The Chinese side welcomes this and looks forward to the BRICS countries' continued support for the RMB to enter the basket. This will help improve the international monetary system and maintain global financial stability. It will be a win-win result. (2) Speak on major international and regional issues and jointly address various global challenges. The world today is still not peaceful, regional conflicts and hotspot issues are far from being resolved, and the harm caused by terrorism is more prominent. The series of terrorist attacks in Paris once again showed that the energy and harm of terrorist forces cannot be underestimated, and terrorism has become the most serious and urgent security challenge we are currently facing. The international community must join hands to further strengthen anti-terrorism cooperation in accordance with the purposes and principles of the Charter of the United Nations and other generally recognized basic norms of international relations. Special attention should be paid to both the symptoms and the root cause, and no double standards. The BRICS countries should carry out extensive cooperation in the areas of counter-terrorism experience exchange, intelligence sharing, clue verification, and law enforcement cooperation. At present, the problem of refugees in Europe is outstanding. The root cause lies in regional instability and uneven development. The solution is to seek peace and achieve development. Recently, the parties concerned have held two successive foreign ministers’ meetings on Syria, and reached many important consensuses on achieving a comprehensive ceasefire, initiating the political process, establishing a transition management mechanism, and holding general elections. We must do a good job in implementing the process of political transition under the auspices of the United Nations to maintain this hard-won momentum. (3) Promote mutually beneficial and win-win international development cooperation and jointly advocate a new type of global development partnership. This year is the International Year of Development. Two months ago, I attended the UN Development Summit with my colleagues. I feel that many developing countries care about BRICS cooperation and look forward to their role in development issues and South-South cooperation. We should work with the vast number of developing countries to push developed countries to honour their commitments and fulfill their obligations, and work hard to establish a more diversified, open, pragmatic and effective new global development partnership. We should combine the implementation of the 2030 sustainable development agenda, exchange development ideas with developing countries, share development experience, and deepen South-South cooperation. We must not only implement sustainable 2030Sustainable development agenda, exchange development ideas with developing countries, share development experience, and deepen South-South cooperation. We must not only be the leader in implementing the 2030 sustainable development agenda, but also help other developing countries implement the agenda. (4) Join hands to promote economic optimization and upgrading and jointly achieve long-term development. The BRICS countries are entering the ranks of middle-income countries one after another, facing the same or similar tasks. Our development model must change from relying on factor input to relying on labor productivity improvement, the development concept should change from focusing on speed to focusing on quality and efficiency, the economic structure must change from relatively unitary to balanced and reasonable, and economic growth must rely on export mainly to expand domestic demand. change. These four changes have provided us with new cooperation space and opportunities. We should combine the implementation of the BRICS economic partnership strategy adopted at the Ufa meeting, and work together to create a value chain and a large market for shared benefits. With the deepening of structural adjustments and reforms, China has increasingly become a consumer product market and a country that produces capacity and capital. We hope to share development opportunities with other BRICS countries and improve the level of economic cooperation. , Colleagues! , The Antalya Summit of the G20 leaders is the next very important meeting in today’s world landscape and situation. We must support and echo each other and further promote the G20’s transition from a crisis response mechanism to a long-term governance mechanism. Focus on cyclical policies and simultaneously promote structural reforms. We must build an open world economy and oppose trade protectionism. It is necessary to promote all parties to adopt responsible macroeconomic policies, avoid negative spillover effects, and jointly expand global total demand. China will hold the eleventh summit of the leaders of the G20 next year. China thanks the BRICS member countries for their invaluable support in organizing the meeting in China, and regards hosting the G20 leaders' summit next year as an important opportunity to promote cooperation among the BRICS countries. Next year, India will also assume the presidency of the BRICS countries. China will fully support India in hosting the meeting of leaders of the BRICS countries next year. It is hoped that these two important events will echo each other, complement each other, and jointly contribute to the promotion of world economic development and the deepening of BRICS cooperation under the new situation. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Antalya, Turkey, November 15th), "People's Daily" (November 16, 2015, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Open up opportunities to meet challenges
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-11-16
text: [, 尊敬的普京总统，, 尊敬的莫迪总理，, 尊敬的祖马总统，, 尊敬的罗塞夫总统，, 各位同事：, 　　很高兴再次见到各位同事。感谢普京总统主持今天的会晤。乌法会晤后，我们五国积极落实各项成果，加强相互沟通和协调，共同推动金砖国家合作取得了新进展。, 　　同时，国际形势发生新变化，世界经济复苏缓慢，地缘政治问题较前突出，全球性挑战不时涌现。在这个大背景下，金砖国家发展也面临一些新情况。一是外部环境中复杂和困难因素增多，全球总需求不足，各国宏观经济政策分化加剧，世界经济增长不确定性加大。二是受内外因素影响，金砖国家经济增长普遍放缓，发展进入调整期。三是国际上唱衰金砖国家的声音并未停止。, 　　真金不怕火炼。伙伴的意义和价值，不仅在于顺境中共襄盛举，更在于逆境时携手前行。只要我们坚定信心、加强协调，我们的合作就一定能乘风破浪、穿云破雾，让世界对金砖国家的成色有新的认识。, 　　对金砖国家更好发挥作用，我愿提出以下建议。, 　　（一）塑造有利外部发展环境，共同完善全球经济治理。近期，各国股市汇市及全球能源资源价格波动成因复杂，是国际金融危机深层次影响的传导效应。, 　　我们应该引导各方对金砖国家发展形成合理预期。要看到金砖国家经济增速虽然有所放缓，但新兴市场国家对世界经济增长的贡献超过50%，仍然是世界经济增长的重要引擎。展望未来，全球经济复苏仍然需要新兴市场国家提供后劲和动力。我们应该在二十国集团框架内加强合作，推动各方加大宏观经济政策协调力度，重点防范短期金融风险，避免货币战、贸易战。同时，我们也要未雨绸缪，加快推进金砖国家新开发银行和应急储备安排的机制建设，共同维护国际金融稳定。, 　　我们应该加强在国际货币基金组织、世界银行、世界贸易组织等机制内的协调和配合，着力提升发展中国家和新兴市场国家在国际治理体系中的代表性和发言权。日前，国际货币基金组织已经完成特别提款权审查报告，明确指出人民币满足可自由使用标准，建议将人民币纳入特别提款权货币篮子。中方对此表示欢迎，也期待金砖国家继续支持人民币“入篮”。这有利于完善国际货币体系，维护全球金融稳定，将是一个共赢的结果。, 　　（二）就重大国际和地区问题发声，共同应对各种全球性挑战。当今世界仍然不太平，地区冲突和热点问题远未解决，恐怖主义带来的危害更加突出。发生在巴黎的系列恐怖袭击事件再次表明，恐怖势力的能量和危害不容低估，恐怖主义已成为我们当前面临的最严峻和急迫的安全挑战。国际社会必须携起手来，按照联合国宪章宗旨和原则以及其他公认的国际关系基本准则，进一步加强反恐合作，特别要注重标本兼治，不搞双重标准。金砖国家应该在反恐经验交流、情报分享、线索核查、执法合作等领域开展广泛合作。, 　　当前，欧洲难民问题突出，其根源在于地区不稳定和发展不平衡，解决的出路在于谋求和平、实现发展。近期，有关各方接连召开了两次叙利亚问题外长会议，在实现全面停火、启动政治进程、成立过渡管理机制、举行大选等方面达成了不少重要共识。我们要抓好落实，在联合国主持下，开启政治过渡进程，保持这一来之不易的势头。, 　　（三）推动互利共赢的国际发展合作，共同倡导新型全球发展伙伴关系。今年是国际发展年。两个月前，我同各位同事一道出席了联合国发展峰会。我感到很多发展中国家关心金砖国家合作，期待金砖国家在发展问题和南南合作方面发挥作用。, 　　我们应该同广大发展中国家一道，推动发达国家兑现承诺、履行义务，为建立更加多元开放、务实有效的新型全球发展伙伴关系而努力。我们应该结合落实2030年可持续发展议程，同发展中国家交流发展理念，分享发展经验，深化南南合作。我们不但要做执行2030年可持续发展议程的领跑者，而且要帮助其他发展中国家落实议程。, 　　（四）携手推进经济优化升级，共同实现长远发展。金砖国家正在相继进入中等收入国家行列，面临着相同或相似的任务。我们的发展模式要从依靠要素投入向依靠劳动生产率提高转变，发展理念要从侧重速度向注重质量和效益转变，经济结构要从相对单一向均衡合理转变，经济增长要从主要依靠出口向扩大内需转变。这四大转变为我们提供了新的合作空间和合作机遇。我们应该结合落实乌法会晤通过的金砖国家经济伙伴战略，携手打造利益共享的价值链和大市场。, 　　伴随结构调整和改革深化，中国越来越成为消费品市场和产能、资本输出国。我们希望同其他金砖国家共享发展机遇，提高经济合作水平。, 　　各位同事！, 　　二十国集团领导人安塔利亚峰会是当今世界格局和形势下一次非常重要的会议，我们要相互支持和呼应，进一步推动二十国集团从危机应对机制向长效治理机制转变，既注重周期性政策，也同步推动结构性改革。要建设开放型世界经济，反对贸易保护主义。要推动各方均采取负责任的宏观经济政策，力避负面外溢效应，共同扩大全球总需求。, 　　中国将于明年举办二十国集团领导人第十一次峰会。中方感谢金砖成员国对中国办会的宝贵支持，将主办明年二十国集团领导人峰会视为推动金砖国家合作的重要机遇。, 　　明年，印度也将接任金砖国家主席国，中方会全力支持印方主办好明年金砖国家领导人会晤。希望这两场重要活动能够相互呼应，相得益彰，共同在新形势下为推动世界经济发展和深化金砖国家合作作出贡献。, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社土耳其安塔利亚11月15日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年11月16日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平：开拓机遇  应对挑战

eng: [, November 6th, on a state visit to Singapore, President Xi Jinping published a signed article in Singapore’s Straits Times and Lianhe Zaobao, entitled "Inheriting the Future and Creating a Better Future for China-New Zealand Relations". The article is as follows:, inheriting the past and creating a bright future for China-Singapore relations, President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China, at the invitation of Singapore’s President Mr. Chen Qingyan, with the friendly feelings for the Singaporean people and good wishes for the development of relations between the two countries, I will soon conduct state affairs in Singapore access. , I am no stranger to Singapore, the garden country, and have visited here many times. Singapore is full of vigorous development vitality, unique natural scenery and exquisite urban landscape blending, the people live and work in peace, warmth and friendliness, I am impressed every time. My visit coincides with the 50th anniversary of the founding of Singapore and the 25th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Singapore, which is more important. In the 50 years since the founding of the People's Republic of China, the Singaporean government and people have adapted to local conditions, forged ahead, pioneered and innovated, embarked on a unique development path, achieved economic prosperity, social stability, ethnic harmony, and played a unique and important role in international and regional affairs. The role. Singapore’s development achievements not only bring well-being to its own people, but also enlighten the development of other Asian countries. It is believed that under the leadership of this government, Singapore will achieve greater achievements in the process of nation building. In the 25 years since China and New Zealand established diplomatic relations, the two countries have helped each other, supported each other, and learned from each other, which has promoted the development of their respective countries. Over the past 25 years, China-Singapore relations have achieved leapfrog development. China is Singapore’s largest trading partner, and the bilateral trade volume reached 79.74 billion U.S. dollars last year, which is 28 times that of the initial establishment of diplomatic relations. Singapore was one of the earliest countries to participate in China's opening up, and it is currently China's largest source of investment and an important offshore RMB trading center. Following the successful cooperation between the two major projects of Suzhou Industrial Park and Tianjin Eco-City in China, the third intergovernmental cooperation project is coming. The pragmatic cooperation in the fields of finance, science and technology, environmental protection, education and culture, social governance, law enforcement and security in the two countries has been further promoted with fruitful results. It is not an accident of history that China-Singapore relations have developed tremendously. First, thanks to the leaders of the two countries always view and plan the development of the relationship between the two countries from a strategic and long-term perspective, and point out the way forward, which provides a strong guarantee for China-Singapore relations to keep on the fast track of development no matter how the international situation changes. . The second is to benefit from the strategic direction of both sides to closely follow China's development, to meet Singapore's unique advantages and development needs, to comply with the trend of the times in the development of relations between China and ASEAN countries, to continue to develop pragmatic and inclusive cooperation, and carefully build cooperative flagship projects to promote economic and trade , Investment, finance, science and technology, humanities and other practical cooperation in various fields blossomed. The third is to benefit from the continuous innovation consciousness and pioneering thinking of the two sides to collaborate and collaborate to incubate social governance, food safety, modern service industry, interconnection and other new areas of cooperation that meet the needs of the development strategies of the two countries. The development of new relationships provides an endless source of motivation. , Fan Yi's way, go with the times. Today, China-Singapore relations are at a new historical starting point. We must continue to build on the future and create a better tomorrow for China-Singapore relations. Taking this opportunity, I would like to share three suggestions for developing China-New Zealand relations. , ——We must continue to do top-level design. It is necessary to inherit the strategic planning and the “heirloom” of Sino-Singaporean relations led by high-level leaders, maintain the momentum of close high-level exchanges, enhance political mutual trust, strengthen strategic communication, adhere to mutual understanding and respect each other, and constantly strengthen the political foundation of bilateral relations. , ——We want to deepen and expand pragmatic cooperation. China is taking the initiative to lead the new normal of economic development, stepping up the formulation of the "13th Five-Year Plan", deepening reforms, expanding opening up, implementing innovation-driven development strategies, and adjusting and optimizing the economic structure. Singapore is preparing a five-year plan for "scientific research, innovation and enterprises" to implement a new round of economic development. The two sides should step up their joint development strategies, expand common interests, solidly promote cooperation projects, explore new growth points for cooperation, and promote pragmatic cooperation to upgrade quality. ——We want to cooperate closely in regional and international affairs. China is committed to maintaining and developing good-neighborly friendship and mutually beneficial cooperation with neighboring countries, adhering to the concept of sincere and gracious surrounding diplomacy, deeply promoting the construction of the “Belt and Road”, and building a closer China-ASEAN Community of Destiny and Asia. Singapore is an important ASEAN country. Since this year, it has taken over as the coordinator of China-ASEAN relations and has important influence on the regional and international arenas. The two parties should work together to promote various cooperation initiatives, focus on development cooperation, and be a promoter of regional integration, a promoter of peaceful development in Asia, and a contributor to the well-being of the people of the world. , I look forward toDiscussion, focusing on development cooperation, being a promoter of regional integration, a promoter of peaceful development in Asia, and a contributor to the well-being of the people of the world. , I look forward to having an in-depth exchange of views with the Singaporean leaders on the above ideas and suggestions to push China-Singapore relations to a higher level. "The friendship is solemn and the gold is similar." China is willing to work with Singapore to inherit and develop the cause of China-Singapore friendship created and elaborated by leaders of the older generation, to move forward hand in hand, so that China-Singapore friendship is as vibrant as the rain trees planted in Singapore. Vigorous and leafy. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 6th), "People's Daily" (November 07, 2015, 02 edition),]

text: [, 11月6日，在对新加坡进行国事访问之际，国家主席习近平在新加坡《海峡时报》和《联合早报》发表题为《承前启后 继往开来 共创中新关系美好未来》的署名文章。文章如下：, 承前启后 继往开来 共创中新关系美好未来, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 应新加坡总统陈庆炎先生邀请，带着对新加坡人民的友好感情和发展两国关系的良好愿望，我即将对新加坡进行国事访问。, 我对新加坡这个花园之国并不陌生，多次来这里访问。新加坡充满着蓬勃的发展生机，独特的自然风光和精致的都市景观交融，人民安居乐业、热情友好，每次都给我留下了深刻印象。我这次访问，恰逢新加坡建国50周年和中新建交25周年，更具重要意义。, 建国50年来，新加坡政府和人民因地制宜，锐意进取，开拓创新，走出了一条独具特色的发展之路，实现了经济繁荣、社会稳定、族群和睦，在国际和地区事务中发挥着独特而重要的作用。新加坡的发展成就不仅给本国人民带来了福祉，也对亚洲其他国家的发展富有启迪。相信在本届政府带领下，新加坡在国家建设进程中将取得更大成就。, 中新建交25年来，两国相互帮助、相互支持、相互借鉴，推动了各自国家的发展。25年来，中新关系实现了跨越式发展。中国是新加坡最大贸易伙伴，去年双边贸易额达到797.4亿美元，是建交初期的28倍。新加坡是最早参与中国对外开放的国家之一，目前是中国最大投资来源国、重要的人民币离岸交易中心。继中国苏州工业园区、天津生态城两大项目成功合作之后，第三个政府间合作项目呼之欲出。两国金融、科技环保、教育文化、社会治理、执法安全等领域务实合作深入推进，成果丰硕。, 中新关系得到长足发展，不是历史的偶然。, 一是得益于两国领导人始终从战略高度和长远角度看待和规划两国关系发展，指明前进方向，这为无论国际风云如何变幻，中新关系始终走在发展快车道上提供了坚强保障。, 二是得益于双方紧扣中国发展的战略方向，契合新加坡的独特优势和发展需求，顺应中国和东盟国家关系发展的时代潮流，不断开拓务实、包容合作，精心打造合作旗舰项目，推动经贸、投资、金融、科技、人文等各领域务实合作全面开花。, 三是得益于双方以不断创新意识和开拓思维共谋合作，孵化出社会治理、食品安全、现代服务业、互联互通等具有时代特点、符合两国发展战略需求的合作新领域，为中新关系发展提供了源源不竭的动力。, 凡益之道，与时偕行。今天，中新关系又站在新的历史起点，我们要继往开来，共创中新关系更加美好的明天。借此机会，我愿分享对发展中新关系的3点建议。, ——我们要继续做好顶层设计。要把战略规划和高层引领的中新关系“传家宝”继承下来，保持高层密切交往势头，增强政治互信，加强战略沟通，坚持相互理解、彼此尊重，不断夯实两国关系政治基础。, ——我们要深化拓展务实合作。中国正在主动引领经济发展新常态，抓紧制定“十三五”规划，深化改革，扩大开放，实施创新驱动发展战略，调整优化经济结构。新加坡正在拟定“科研、创新和企业”五年计划，实施新一轮经济发展。双方要加紧对接发展战略，扩大共同利益，扎实推进合作项目，发掘合作新增长点，推动务实合作提质升级。, ——我们要密切地区和国际事务中的合作。中国致力于维护和发展同周边国家的睦邻友好和互利合作，秉持亲诚惠容的周边外交理念，深入推进“一带一路”建设，推动建设更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体和亚洲命运共同体。新加坡是东盟重要国家，今年起接任中国—东盟关系协调国，在地区和国际舞台上具有重要影响力。双方应该携手推进各项合作倡议，聚焦发展合作，做地区一体化的推动者、亚洲和平发展的促进者以及世界人民福祉的贡献者。, 我期待就以上想法和建议同新加坡领导人深入交换意见，推动中新关系更上一层楼。“交情郑重金相似。”中方愿同新方一道，传承和发展老一辈领导人共同缔造和精心培育的中新友好事业，携手向前，让中新友谊如新加坡遍植的雨树一样生机勃勃、枝繁叶茂。（新华社北京11月6日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年11月07日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在新加坡媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, November 5, on a state visit to Vietnam, Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China, published a signed article entitled "Working Together to Create a Better Tomorrow in China-Vietnam Relations" in the Vietnam People's Daily. The article is as follows: To join hands in creating a better tomorrow for China-Vietnam relations, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People’s Republic of China Xi Jinping, at the invitation of General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China Ruan Fuzhong and President Zhang Jinchuang, I will soon pay a state visit to Vietnam. This is a visit to the neighbor's house and a visit to the gay house. I am very happy. , My current visit to Vietnam is the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Vietnam. Speaking of China and Vietnam, when it comes to Sino-Vietnamese relations, we all think of the well-known song "Vietnam-China, mountains and mountains, water and water" familiar to the people of the two countries. Listen to the roosters singing." As friendly neighbors connected by mountains and rivers, the friendship between the people of China and Vietnam has a long history. Since modern times, the people of China and Vietnam have supported each other and shared difficulties in the struggle for national independence and national liberation, leaving many good stories. The great leader of the Vietnamese people, Chairman Ho Chi Minh, once founded the "Vietnamese Youth Revolutionary Comrades Association" in China and guided the development of the Vietnamese revolutionary activities. "Brothers" and other popular poems. In response to President Ho Chi Minh’s call, the well-known Vietnamese general flooded actively participated in the Chinese revolution and participated in the Long March of the Red Army, becoming the only foreign general in the founding generals of New China and the rare "two-state general" in the world. China once fully supported Vietnam in its national liberation struggle. The main research achievement of artemisinin by Chinese scientist Tu Youyou, who won the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine this year, is derived from the anti-malarial drug research carried out by China in the 1960s to support Vietnam. There are too many such stories, and they are still widely praised among the people of both countries. In the new era, China and Vietnam, as two countries with the same ideals and convictions and connected futures and destinies, help each other and support each other in the cause of socialist construction. The bilateral relations have become increasingly rich in connotation, their common interests have become broader, and pragmatic cooperation has achieved fruitful results. China and Vietnam have established a comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership and established a number of cooperation mechanisms such as the Bilateral Cooperation Steering Committee to promote significant achievements in cooperation in the areas of economy, trade and humanities. China has been Vietnam’s largest trading partner for 11 consecutive years. Vietnam has become China’s second largest trading partner in ASEAN, and bilateral trade volume is expected to achieve the goal of 100 billion US dollars in advance. Last year, there were more than 3 million people between the two countries, and there were 71 weekly flights between China and Vietnam. What is even more commendable is that China and Vietnam have resolved the demarcation of the land and the Beibu Gulf through friendly consultations, laying a solid foundation for the stability and common development of the border areas of the two countries. These achievements fully prove that consolidating China-Vietnam friendship and deepening mutually beneficial cooperation are in the fundamental interests of the two countries and bring benefits to the two peoples. They are conducive to the respective development and stability of the two countries and are conducive to regional peace and prosperity. At present, both China and Vietnam are in a critical period of reform and development. The Chinese people are working in accordance with the strategic layout of building a well-off society in an all-round way, deepening reforms in an all-round way, ruling the country in accordance with the law, and ruling the party strictly, and working together to achieve the goal of "two hundred years" and the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation . Vietnam is preparing for the twelfth National Congress of the Communist Party of Vietnam, and is stepping up the building of a modern socialist country that is prosperous, strong, democratic, fair, and civilized. Against this background, developing Sino-Vietnamese friendship and deepening mutually beneficial cooperation is not only an important mission entrusted to us by history, but also a common demand for advancing the construction of their respective countries, which is in line with the strategic interests of both parties. As a good neighbor, good friend, good comrade and good partner, China wishes the Vietnamese Communist Party to successfully convene the 12th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. China will adhere to the neighboring diplomatic policy of being good neighbors and neighbors, and adhering to the concept of sincere and gracious neighboring diplomacy. We are committed to building a community of shared future for Asia and promoting the continued healthy and stable development of China-Vietnam relations in the new period. -We must keep the overall situation in mind, take a long-term perspective, and grasp the correct direction for the development of Sino-Vietnamese relations. China is willing to maintain high-level exchanges with Vietnam in a flexible and diverse manner, strengthen strategic communication, exchange views on Sino-Vietnamese relations and major issues of mutual interest in a timely manner, and consolidate the political foundation of bilateral relations. -We must persist in mutual learning, strengthen cooperation, and achieve common development and prosperity. Both sides should continue to play the overall coordination role of the Bilateral Cooperation Steering Committee, and jointly promote the construction of the “Belt and Road” and “Two Corridors and One Circle” through the realization of the development strategy of the two countries.The coordinating role of the Steering Committee on Border Cooperation, through the realization of the development strategy of the two countries, jointly promote the construction of the "Belt and Road" and "two corridors and one circle", expand production capacity cooperation, strengthen infrastructure interconnection cooperation, and achieve mutual benefit and win-win cooperation. Chinese people bring more welfare. -We must persist in expanding exchanges, enhancing understanding, and consolidating the basis of public opinion in bilateral relations. The development of Sino-Vietnamese relations is inseparable from the understanding and support of the two peoples. China will, as always, support and encourage the two countries to strengthen cultural exchanges, expand non-governmental friendly exchanges, and carry out various friendly exchange activities such as youth friendly meetings, youth festivals, and people's forums, so that China-Vietnam friendship will be passed on from generation to generation. ——We must insist on mutual understanding, friendly consultations, and properly handle existing problems. Both sides should make good use of government border negotiations and other mechanisms, and on the basis of drawing on the successful experience of demarcation of land borders and Beibu Gulf, insist on seeking a basic and long-term solution to the maritime issue acceptable to both sides through dialogue and consultation. In this process, the two sides should work together to maintain maritime stability, actively explore maritime cooperation, and create good conditions for the development of bilateral relations. , China has an old saying: "If you do your best, you can do everything; if you do all the wisdom, you can do everything." There is a saying in Vietnam: "One tree cannot be a forest, and three trees can form a mountain." I look forward to During the visit, he conducted in-depth communication with Vietnamese leaders to plan the direction of the development of Sino-Vietnamese relations in the future, so as to make China-Vietnam relations stable and far-reaching. I believe that as long as China and Vietnam go hand in hand and strengthen cooperation, they will surely create a better tomorrow for China-Vietnam relations and realize the common development and prosperity of China and Vietnam. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 5th), "People's Daily" (November 06, 2015 version 01),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping published a signed article in the Vietnamese media: Join hands to create a better tomorrow for Sino-Vietnamese relations

text: [, 11月5日，在对越南进行国事访问之际，中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平在越南《人民报》发表题为《携手开创中越关系的美好明天》的署名文章。文章如下：, 携手开创中越关系的美好明天, 中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 应越共中央总书记阮富仲和国家主席张晋创邀请，我即将对越南进行国事访问。这是到邻居家串门、到同志家作客，我感到十分高兴。, 我这次到访越南，时值中越建交65周年。提起中国和越南，说到中越关系，我们都会想起那首两国民众耳熟能详的歌曲“越南—中国，山连山、水连水”，“共饮一江水，早相见、晚相望，清晨共听雄鸡高唱”。作为山水相连的友好邻邦，中越两国人民友谊源远流长。, 近代以来，中越两国人民在争取国家独立和民族解放斗争中相互支持、患难与共，留下许多佳话。越南人民的伟大领袖胡志明主席曾经在华创立“越南青年革命同志会”并指导开展越南革命活动，足迹遍布中国大江南北，同中国军民结下深厚战斗情谊，写下了“越中情谊深，同志加兄弟”等脍炙人口的诗句。越南著名将领洪水响应胡志明主席号召，积极投身中国革命，参加红军二万五千里长征，成为新中国开国将领中唯一的外籍将军和世界上少有的“两国将军”。中国曾经全力支持越南开展民族解放斗争。今年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖的中国科学家屠呦呦的主要研究成果青蒿素，就是源于上世纪60年代中国为支援越南而开展的抗疟疾药物研究。这样的故事不胜枚举，至今仍然在两国民众中广为传颂。, 进入新时期，中越作为理想信念相同、前途命运相连的两个国家，在社会主义建设事业中相互帮助、相互支持，双边关系内涵日益丰富，共同利益更趋广泛，务实合作成果丰硕。中越两国建立了全面战略合作伙伴关系，成立了双边合作指导委员会等多个合作机制，推动经贸、人文等领域合作取得显著成效。中国连续11年是越南最大贸易伙伴，越南成为中国在东盟内第二大贸易伙伴，双边贸易额有望提前实现1000亿美元的目标。去年两国人员往来超过300万人次，每周往返于中越之间的航班达71个。, 更难能可贵的是，中越双方通过友好协商解决了陆地和北部湾划界问题，为两国边境地区稳定安宁和共同发展奠定了坚实基础。这些成果充分证明，巩固中越友好、深化互利合作符合两国根本利益，给两国人民带来了福祉，有利于两国各自发展和稳定，有利于地区和平与繁荣。, 当前，中越两国都处在改革发展的关键时期。中国人民正在按照全面建成小康社会、全面深化改革、全面依法治国、全面从严治党的战略布局，齐心协力为实现“两个一百年”奋斗目标、实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦而奋斗。越南正在筹备越南共产党第十二次全国代表大会，加紧推进民富、国强、民主、公平、文明的社会主义现代化国家建设。在这一背景下，发展中越友好、深化互利合作，不仅是历史赋予我们的重要使命，也是推进各自国家建设的共同需求，符合双方战略利益。, 作为好邻居、好朋友、好同志、好伙伴，中方祝愿越南共产党成功召开十二大，坚定支持越南走符合本国特色的社会主义道路，全面推进革新事业。中方将坚持与邻为善、以邻为伴的周边外交方针，秉持亲诚惠容的周边外交理念，致力于建设亚洲命运共同体，推动中越关系在新时期持续健康稳定向前发展。, ——我们要坚持着眼大局，立足长远，把握中越关系发展的正确方向。中方愿同越方通过灵活多样的方式保持高层交往，加强战略沟通，及时就中越关系和双方共同关心的重大问题交换意见，夯实双边关系的政治基础。, ——我们要坚持相互学习，加强合作，实现共同发展繁荣。双方要继续发挥双边合作指导委员会的统筹协调作用，通过实现两国发展战略对接，共同推进“一带一路”和“两廊一圈”建设，扩大产能合作，加强基础设施互联互通合作，实现互利共赢，给两国人民带来更多福祉。, ——我们要坚持扩大交往，增进了解，巩固双边关系民意基础。中越关系发展离不开两国人民理解和支持。中方将一如既往支持和鼓励两国加强人文交流，扩大民间友好往来，通过开展青年友好会见、青年大联欢、人民论坛等形式多样的友好交流活动，使中越友好事业世代相传。, ——我们要坚持相互理解，友好协商，妥善处理存在问题。双方要用好政府边界谈判等机制，在借鉴陆地边界和北部湾划界成功经验基础上，坚持通过对话协商，寻求双方均能接受的海上问题基本和长久解决办法。在这一过程中，双方要共同维护海上稳定，积极探讨开展海上合作，为两国关系发展创造良好条件。, 中国有句古语：“积力之所举，则无不胜也；众智之所为，则无不成也。”越南有句俗语：“独木难成林，三树聚成山。”我期待着访问期间同越南领导人进行深入沟通，规划今后一个时期中越关系发展方向，使中越关系行稳致远。相信只要中越携手共进，加强合作，必将开创中越关系更加美好的明天，实现中越两国共同发展繁荣。（新华社北京11月5日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年11月06日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在越南媒体发表署名文章：携手开创中越关系的美好明天

eng: [, Dear Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon, Dear Director of Mlambo-Nuka, Dear Colleagues, Ladies and Gentlemen, Friends:, 70th Anniversary of the United Nations, 20th Anniversary of the World Women’s Congress in Beijing On this occasion, we are holding a global women’s summit here, and it is of great significance to reaffirm our commitment and seek for the future in order to promote gender equality and women’s development. Women are the creators of material and spiritual civilization, and an important force to promote social development and progress. Without women, there would be no human beings, and there would be no society. The pursuit of equality between men and women is great. Throughout history, without women's liberation and progress, there would be no human liberation and progress. In order to realize the lofty ideal of equality between men and women, mankind has gone through an uneven and extraordinary course. From the birth of the world’s first declaration of women’s rights more than 200 years ago, to the establishment of the International Women’s Day on March 8, to the establishment of the United Nations Commission on the Status of Women, to the adoption of the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women, every step of women’s career development All have promoted the progress of human civilization. 20 years ago, in Beijing, the Fourth World Conference on Women adopted the "Beijing Declaration" and "Programme of Action" to reach strategic goals and policy frameworks that promote equality between men and women and guarantee women's rights. Today, the spirit proclaimed by the Beijing World Conference on Women has produced positive changes in the world. The pursuit of equality between men and women in various countries has been increasingly strengthened, women’s development actions have become more diversified, and the environment for women’s survival and development has been continuously optimized. The UN Women has done a lot of work, which deserves full recognition. After continuous efforts, many previously unreachable dreams have become a reality: 143 countries around the world have passed legislation clearly stipulating equality between men and women. There is no legal obstacle to women’s participation in political and economic activities. Women’s access to education, freedom of marriage, freedom of occupation, etc. Has become a social consensus. At the same time, looking around the world, the development level of women in various countries and regions is still uneven. The rights, opportunities, and resources of men and women are still unequal. The society’s awareness of women’s potential, talents, and contributions is still insufficient. Now more than half of the 800 million poor people in the world are women. Whenever wars and epidemics strike, women often bear the brunt. In the face of terror and violence, women are also greatly affected. To this day, various forms of discrimination against women still exist, and abuses and even devastation of women occur from time to time. , The facts show that to achieve equality between men and women, we also need to make great efforts. We must make unremitting efforts to open up a broad road for the development of women's cause. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , We have just adopted the post-2015 development agenda, and the gender perspective has been integrated into all areas of the new development agenda. Let us carry forward the spirit of the Beijing World Women’s Congress and reaffirm our commitment to accelerate action to promote equality between men and women and the overall development of women. First, promote the simultaneous development of women and economic society. Development is inseparable from women, and development must benefit all people, including women. We need to formulate a more scientific and rational development strategy. We must not only consider national conditions, gender differences, and special needs of women, to ensure women’s equal sharing of development results, but also innovate policy measures to stimulate women’s potential and promote women’s participation in economic and social development. China's practice has proved that promoting women's participation in social and economic activities can effectively improve the status of women, and can greatly enhance social productivity and economic vitality. Second, actively protect women's rights and interests. Women’s rights and interests are basic human rights. We must incorporate the protection of women’s rights and interests into laws and regulations, raise it to the will of the state, and internalize it into a code of social conduct. It is necessary to enhance women's ability to participate in political and economic activities, improve women's participation in decision-making and management, and enable women to become leaders in politics, business, and academia. We must guarantee women’s basic medical and health services, and pay particular attention to the health needs of rural women, disabled women, migrant women, middle-aged and elderly women, and ethnic minority women. We must take measures to ensure that all girls can go to school and go to school safely, develop vocational education and lifelong education for women, and help them adapt to changes in society and the job market. , Third, strive to build a harmonious and inclusive social culture. Men and women share a world, and eliminating discrimination and prejudice against women will make society more inclusive and dynamic. We must strive to eliminate all forms of violence against women, including domestic violence. We must take equality between men and women as the core and break down backward concepts and stereotypes that hinder women’s development. I appreciate Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon's "He for Her" initiative and hope more and more men will participate. Fourth, create an international environment conducive to women’s development. Women and children are the biggest victims of all factors of peace and restlessness. We must strengthen the concept of peaceful development and win-win cooperation, cherish peace more, actively maintain peace, and let everyThe biggest victim of all factors of peace and restlessness. We must strengthen the philosophy of peaceful development and win-win cooperation, cherish peace more, actively maintain peace, and let every woman and child be bathed in happy and peaceful sunlight. , Women's organizations of various countries should strengthen exchanges, enhance friendship, develop together, and make progress together. To continue to carry out international development cooperation in the field of women, developed countries should increase financial and technical assistance to developing countries and narrow the development gap between women in various countries. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! In the process of the Chinese people's pursuit of a better life, every woman has the opportunity to make her life come true and her dreams come true. China will be more active in implementing the basic national policy of equality between men and women, giving play to the role of women in "half the sky", and supporting women in making contributions and realizing their ideals and dreams in life. Chinese women will continue to promote the development of the world women’s movement through their own development and make greater contributions to the cause of equality between men and women around the world. To support the global women’s cause and the work of the UN Women’s Agency, China will donate US$10 million to the UN Women’s Agency to support the implementation of the “Beijing Declaration” and “Programme of Action” and the implementation of the relevant goals of the post-2015 development agenda. In the next five years, China will help developing countries implement 100 "Maternal and Child Health Projects" and send medical expert groups to carry out patrolling activities; implement 100 "Happy Campus Projects" to provide school assistance to poor girls and increase girls' enrollment rate; Invite 30,000 women from developing countries to come to China for training, and train 100,000 female professional technicians for developing countries locally. Under the relevant fund established by China in cooperation with the United Nations, special projects will be carried out to support the capacity building of women in developing countries. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , Let us work together to accelerate action and build a better world for all women and all people! , I wish the summit a complete success! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, United Nations, September 27th),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the Global Women's Summit
source-date: 来源：人民网-人民日报          发布时间：2015-09-28
text: [, 尊敬的潘基文秘书长，, 尊敬的姆兰博—努卡主任，, 尊敬的各位同事，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 在联合国成立70周年、北京世界妇女大会召开20周年之际，我们在这里举行全球妇女峰会，为促进男女平等和妇女发展重申承诺、共谋未来，意义重大。, 妇女是物质文明和精神文明的创造者，是推动社会发展和进步的重要力量。没有妇女，就没有人类，就没有社会。, 追求男女平等的事业是伟大的。纵观历史，没有妇女解放和进步，就没有人类解放和进步。为实现男女平等的崇高理想，人类走过了不平坦、不平凡的历程。从200多年前世界第一份妇女权利宣言诞生，到“三八”国际劳动妇女节的设立，到联合国成立妇女地位委员会，到通过《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》，妇女事业发展的每一步都推动了人类文明进步。, 20年前，在北京，第四次世界妇女大会通过了《北京宣言》和《行动纲领》，达成促进男女平等、保障妇女权利的战略目标和政策框架。今天，北京世界妇女大会所宣示的精神，在世界催生了积极变化。各国追求男女平等共识日益强化，推动妇女发展行动更趋多样化，妇女生存发展环境不断优化。联合国妇女署做了大量工作，值得充分肯定。, 经过持续不断努力，许多以前遥不可及的梦想已经成为现实：全球143个国家通过立法明确规定男女平等，妇女参与政治经济活动在法律上已经没有障碍，妇女接受教育、婚姻自由、职业自由等已经成为社会共识。, 同时，环顾世界，各国各地区妇女发展水平仍然不平衡，男女权利、机会、资源分配仍然不平等，社会对妇女潜能、才干、贡献的认识仍然不充分。现在全球8亿贫困人口中，一半以上是妇女。每当战乱和疫病来袭，妇女往往首当其冲。面对恐怖和暴力肆虐，妇女也深受其害。时至今日，针对妇女的各种形式歧视依然存在，虐待甚至摧残妇女的事情时有发生。, 事实表明，实现男女平等，还需要我们付出巨大努力。我们要不懈努力，为妇女事业发展开辟广阔道路。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 我们刚刚通过2015年后发展议程，性别视角已纳入新发展议程各个领域。让我们发扬北京世界妇女大会精神，重申承诺，为促进男女平等和妇女全面发展加速行动。, 第一，推动妇女和经济社会同步发展。发展离不开妇女，发展要惠及包括妇女在内的全体人民。我们要制定更加科学合理的发展战略，既要考虑各国国情、性别差异、妇女特殊需求，确保妇女平等分享发展成果，又要创新政策手段，激发妇女潜力，推动广大妇女参与经济社会发展。中国实践证明，推动妇女参加社会和经济活动，能有效提高妇女地位，也能极大提升社会生产力和经济活力。, 第二，积极保障妇女权益。妇女权益是基本人权。我们要把保障妇女权益系统纳入法律法规，上升为国家意志，内化为社会行为规范。要增强妇女参与政治经济活动能力，提高妇女参与决策管理水平，使妇女成为政界、商界、学界的领军人物。我们要保障妇女基本医疗卫生服务，特别是要关注农村妇女、残疾妇女、流动妇女、中老年妇女、少数族裔妇女的健康需求。我们要采取措施确保所有女童上得起学和安全上学，发展面向妇女的职业教育和终身教育，帮助她们适应社会和就业市场变化。, 第三，努力构建和谐包容的社会文化。男女共有一个世界，消除对妇女的歧视和偏见，将使社会更加包容和更有活力。我们要努力消除一切形式针对妇女的暴力，包括家庭暴力。我们要以男女平等为核心，打破有碍妇女发展的落后观念和陈规旧俗。我赞赏潘基文秘书长发起的“他为她”倡议，希望越来越多男性参与进来。, 第四，创造有利于妇女发展的国际环境。妇女和儿童是一切不和平不安宁因素的最大受害者。我们要坚定和平发展和合作共赢理念，倍加珍惜和平，积极维护和平，让每个妇女和儿童都沐浴在幸福安宁的阳光里。, 各国妇女团体应该加强交流，增进友谊，共同发展，共同进步。要继续开展妇女领域国际发展合作，发达国家要加大对发展中国家的资金和技术援助，缩小各国妇女发展差距。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 在中国人民追求美好生活的过程中，每一位妇女都有人生出彩和梦想成真的机会。中国将更加积极贯彻男女平等基本国策，发挥妇女“半边天”作用，支持妇女建功立业、实现人生理想和梦想。中国妇女也将通过自身发展不断促进世界妇女运动发展，为全球男女平等事业作出更大贡献。, 为支持全球妇女事业和联合国妇女署工作，中国将向妇女署捐款1000万美元，用于支持落实《北京宣言》和《行动纲领》，落实2015年后发展议程相关目标。在今后5年内，中国将帮助发展中国家实施100个“妇幼健康工程”，派遣医疗专家小组开展巡医活动；实施100个“快乐校园工程”，向贫困女童提供就学资助，提高女童入学率；邀请3万名发展中国家妇女来华参加培训，并在当地为发展中国家培训10万名女性职业技术人员。在中国同联合国合作设立的有关基金项下，将专门开展支持发展中国家妇女能力建设的项目。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 让我们携手努力，加速行动，共建共享一个对所有妇女、对所有人更加美好的世界！, 预祝峰会圆满成功！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社联合国9月27日电）, ]
title: 习近平在全球妇女峰会上的讲话

eng: [, Mr. Chairman, colleagues: I am very happy to attend today's summit. On the 70th anniversary of the founding of the United Nations, it is of great significance for leaders of all countries to gather in New York to discuss development plans. For the people of all countries, development depends on survival and hope, and symbolizes dignity and rights. It is with this wish that 15 years ago, we formulated the Millennium Development Goals, hoping to help hundreds of millions of people live a better life. , Looking back, we have experienced sustained global economic growth and also suffered severely from the international financial crisis. We have witnessed the rise of developing countries and are also facing the reality of unbalanced development between North and South. We are deeply encouraged not only for 1.1 billion people out of poverty, but also for more than 800 million people still starving. , Looking around the world, peace and development remain the two major themes of our times. To solve various global challenges, including the recent refugee crisis in Europe, the fundamental way out is to seek peace and achieve development. Facing many challenges and difficulties, we must hold on to this key. Only development can eliminate the root causes of conflict. Only development can guarantee the basic rights of the people. Only development can satisfy people's longing for a better life. , Mr. Chairman, colleagues! , The post-2015 development agenda adopted by this summit portrays a new vision for global development and provides new opportunities for international development cooperation. We should take this as a new starting point and jointly embark on a fair, open, comprehensive and innovative development road, and strive to achieve common development of all countries. -We must strive for fair development and make development opportunities more equal. All countries should become participants, contributors and beneficiaries of global development. It is impossible for one country to develop, other countries not to develop, some countries to develop, and other countries to not develop. Countries have different capabilities and levels. Under the same goal, they should bear common but differentiated responsibilities. It is necessary to improve global economic governance, increase the representativeness and voice of developing countries, and give countries the right to participate equally in the formulation of rules. -We must adhere to the development of openness, so that the fruits of development benefit all parties. In the era of economic globalization, countries must open the door for construction and promote the free and convenient flow of production factors around the world. All countries should jointly safeguard the multilateral trading system, build an open economy, and realize mutual consultation, joint construction, and sharing. We must respect each other's development choices, learn from each other's development experience, let different development paths converge on the other side of success, and let development achievements be shared by people of all countries. , ——We must pursue comprehensive development and make the foundation of development more solid. The ultimate goal of development is for the people. While eradicating poverty and guaranteeing people's livelihood, it is necessary to maintain social fairness and justice and ensure that everyone enjoys development opportunities and development results. Efforts should be made to achieve coordinated economic, social, and environmental development, and to achieve harmony between man and society, and man and nature. ——We must promote the development of innovation and let the development potential be fully released. Innovation brings vitality, and innovation produces motivation. Problems in development can only be solved through development. Countries should use reform and innovation to stimulate development potential, enhance growth momentum, and cultivate new core competitiveness. , Mr. Chairman, colleagues! , The post-2015 development agenda is a high standard task list and a heavy commitment letter. "One deployment, nine implementations." I propose that the international community strengthen cooperation, jointly implement the post-2015 development agenda, and strive to achieve win-win cooperation. , First, enhance the development capabilities of all countries. In the final analysis, development depends on the efforts of the country itself. The Chinese say: "Measure yourselves and suit your needs." All countries should formulate development strategies that suit their own national conditions based on their own endowment characteristics. The international community should help developing countries strengthen their capacity-building and provide targeted support and assistance based on their actual needs. Second, improve the international development environment. Peace and development complement each other. All countries should jointly safeguard international peace, promote development with peace, and consolidate peace with development. Development also requires a good external institutional environment, international financial institutions must accelerate governance reform, and multilateral development institutions must increase development resources. , Third, optimize the development of partnerships. Developed countries should honor their commitments and fulfill their obligations in a timely manner. The international community should maintain the status of the main channel for North-South cooperation, deepen South-South cooperation and tripartite cooperation, and support the private sector and other stakeholders to play a greater role in partnerships. Fourth, improve the development coordination mechanism. Countries should strengthen macroeconomic policy coordination to avoid negative spillover effects. Regional organizations should speed up the integration process and enhance their overall competitiveness through complementary advantages within the region. The United Nations should continue to play a leading role. , Mr. Chairman, colleagues! Over the past 30 years of reform and opening up, China has developed a development with Chinese characteristics based on its own national conditionsUse leadership. , Mr. Chairman, colleagues! For more than 30 years of reform and opening up, China has embarked on a development path with Chinese characteristics based on its own national conditions. China has basically achieved the Millennium Development Goals, reduced the number of poor people by 439 million, and made remarkable achievements in the fields of education, health, and women. China's development has not only enhanced the well-being of more than 1.3 billion Chinese, but has also effectively promoted the cause of global development. For more than 60 years, China has actively participated in international development cooperation, providing nearly 400 billion yuan in assistance to 166 countries and international organizations, and dispatching more than 600,000 aid personnel, of which more than 700 good children from China have contributed valuables to the development of other countries. life. Facing the future, China will continue to uphold the principle of righteousness and benefit, and prioritize justice, and work with other countries to achieve the post-2015 development agenda. To this end, I announced: ——China will set up a “South-South Cooperation Assistance Fund”, which will provide US$ 2 billion in the first phase to support developing countries in implementing the post-2015 development agenda. -China will continue to increase investment in the least developed countries and strive to reach US$12 billion by 2030. ——China will forgive the interest-free intergovernmental loan debts due to the least developed countries, landlocked developing countries, and small island developing states as of the end of 2015. ——China will set up an international development knowledge center to study and exchange development theories and development practices that suit their national conditions together with other countries. -China proposes to explore the construction of a global energy internet and promote clean and green ways to meet global power demand. , China is also willing to work with relevant parties to continue to advance the construction of the “Belt and Road”, promote the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank and the BRICS New Development Bank to put into operation and play a role as soon as possible, and contribute to the economic growth and livelihood improvement of developing countries. , Mr. Chairman, colleagues! , China solemnly promises to take the implementation of the post-2015 development agenda as its mission, unite and cooperate, and advance the global development cause! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, New York, September 26), "People's Daily" (September 27, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: seek common and sustainable development, be a win-win cooperation partner
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-09-27
text: [, 主席先生，各位同事：, 　　很高兴出席今天的峰会。在联合国成立70周年之际，各国领导人齐聚纽约，共商发展大计，具有重要意义。, 　　对各国人民而言，发展寄托着生存和希望，象征着尊严和权利。正是带着这个愿望，15年前，我们制定了千年发展目标，希望帮助亿万人民过上更好生活。, 　　回首过去，我们经历了全球经济持续增长，也承受了国际金融危机严重冲击。我们见证了发展中国家的崛起，也面对着南北发展失衡的现实。我们既为11亿人民脱贫而深受鼓舞，也为8亿多人仍在挨饿而深为担忧。, 　　环顾世界，和平与发展仍然是当今时代两大主题。要解决好各种全球性挑战，包括最近发生在欧洲的难民危机，根本出路在于谋求和平、实现发展。面对重重挑战和道道难关，我们必须攥紧发展这把钥匙。唯有发展，才能消除冲突的根源。唯有发展，才能保障人民的基本权利。唯有发展，才能满足人民对美好生活的热切向往。, 　　主席先生、各位同事！, 　　本次峰会通过的2015年后发展议程，为全球发展描绘了新愿景，为国际发展合作提供了新机遇。我们应该以此为新起点，共同走出一条公平、开放、全面、创新的发展之路，努力实现各国共同发展。, 　　——我们要争取公平的发展，让发展机会更加均等。各国都应成为全球发展的参与者、贡献者、受益者。不能一个国家发展、其他国家不发展，一部分国家发展、另一部分国家不发展。各国能力和水平有差异，在同一目标下，应该承担共同但有区别的责任。要完善全球经济治理，提高发展中国家代表性和发言权，给予各国平等参与规则制定的权利。, 　　——我们要坚持开放的发展，让发展成果惠及各方。在经济全球化时代，各国要打开大门搞建设，促进生产要素在全球范围更加自由便捷地流动。各国要共同维护多边贸易体制，构建开放型经济，实现共商、共建、共享。要尊重彼此的发展选择，相互借鉴发展经验，让不同发展道路交汇在成功的彼岸，让发展成果为各国人民共享。, 　　——我们要追求全面的发展，让发展基础更加坚实。发展的最终目的是为了人民。在消除贫困、保障民生的同时，要维护社会公平正义，保证人人享有发展机遇、享有发展成果。要努力实现经济、社会、环境协调发展，实现人与社会、人与自然和谐相处。, 　　——我们要促进创新的发展，让发展潜力充分释放。创新带来生机，创新产生动力。发展中的问题只有通过发展才能解决。各国要以改革创新激发发展潜力、增强增长动力，培育新的核心竞争力。, 　　主席先生、各位同事！, 　　2015年后发展议程是一份高标准的任务单，也是一份沉甸甸的承诺书。“一分部署，九分落实。”我倡议，国际社会加强合作，共同落实2015年后发展议程，努力实现合作共赢。, 　　第一，增强各国发展能力。发展归根到底要靠本国自身努力。中国人讲：“量腹而受，量身而衣。”各国要根据自身禀赋特点，制定适合本国国情的发展战略。国际社会要帮助发展中国家加强能力建设，根据他们的实际需求，有针对性地提供支持和帮助。, 　　第二，改善国际发展环境。和平与发展相辅相成。各国要共同维护国际和平，以和平促进发展，以发展巩固和平。发展还需要良好外部制度环境，国际金融机构要加快治理改革，多边开发机构要增加发展资源。, 　　第三，优化发展伙伴关系。发达国家应该及时兑现承诺、履行义务，国际社会应该坚持南北合作主渠道地位，深化南南合作和三方合作，支持私营部门等利益攸关方在伙伴关系中发挥更大作用。, 　　第四，健全发展协调机制。各国要加强宏观经济政策协调，避免负面溢出效应。区域组织要加快一体化进程，通过域内优势互补提升整体竞争力。联合国要继续发挥领导作用。, 　　主席先生、各位同事！, 　　改革开放30多年来，中国立足自身国情，走出了一条中国特色发展道路。中国基本实现了千年发展目标，贫困人口减少了4.39亿，在教育、卫生、妇女等领域取得显著成就。中国发展不仅增进了13亿多中国人的福祉，也有力促进了全球发展事业。, 　　60多年来，中国积极参与国际发展合作，共向166个国家和国际组织提供了近4000亿元人民币援助，派遣60多万援助人员，其中700多名中国好儿女为他国发展献出了宝贵生命。, 　　面向未来，中国将继续秉持义利相兼、以义为先的原则，同各国一道为实现2015年后发展议程作出努力。为此，我宣布：, 　　——中国将设立“南南合作援助基金”，首期提供20亿美元，支持发展中国家落实2015年后发展议程。, 　　——中国将继续增加对最不发达国家投资，力争2030年达到120亿美元。, 　　——中国将免除对有关最不发达国家、内陆发展中国家、小岛屿发展中国家截至2015年底到期未还的政府间无息贷款债务。, 　　——中国将设立国际发展知识中心，同各国一道研究和交流适合各自国情的发展理论和发展实践。, 　　——中国倡议探讨构建全球能源互联网，推动以清洁和绿色方式满足全球电力需求。, 　　中国也愿意同有关各方一道，继续推进“一带一路”建设，推动亚洲基础设施投资银行和金砖国家新开发银行早日投入运营、发挥作用，为发展中国家经济增长和民生改善贡献力量。, 　　主席先生、各位同事！, 　　中国郑重承诺，以落实2015年后发展议程为己任，团结协作，推动全球发展事业不断向前！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社纽约9月26日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年09月27日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：谋共同永续发展 做合作共赢伙伴

eng: [, fellow citizens:, everyone! "The fellow saw tears in his eyes when seeing his fellow." It was a pleasure to be reunited with fellow compatriots in beautiful Seattle. It will be Mid-Autumn Festival in a few days. Think of family during the festive season. I know that everyone here misses the motherland and relatives who are thousands of miles away, and the motherland and relatives also care about every overseas tourist. Here, on behalf of the motherland and more than 1.3 billion compatriots, I extend my sincere greetings and best wishes to all of you here, and through you, to all the compatriots who work and live in the United States! Everyone has worked hard for our visit, and I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to you! , My current state visit to the United States at the invitation of President Obama is to deepen the friendship between the peoples of the two countries, promote pragmatic cooperation in various fields, and promote new and greater development of the relationship between China and the United States as a new type of major power. And the people of the world. Seattle is my first stop on my visit to the United States. Next I will go to Washington for state activities, and then I will also go to New York to attend the 70th anniversary of the founding of the United Nations. In the past two days, in contact with people from all walks of life in the United States, I have deeply felt the friendly sentiment of the American people to the Chinese people, and have experienced the broad prospects for the development of Sino-US cooperation. I look forward to discussing with President Obama a plan for Sino-US cooperation and jointly creating the future of Sino-US relations. The compatriots here today come from all aspects of the United States. You represent all the overseas Chinese in the United States. For a long time, the vast number of overseas Chinese in the United States have inherited the traditional virtues of the Chinese nation. They have worked hard and worked hard. While realizing their dreams in life, they have also contributed to the development and prosperity of the United States and won the respect of the American people. This year marks the 150th anniversary of the construction of the US Pacific Railway. 150 years ago, tens of thousands of Chinese laborers crossed the ocean and came to the United States to participate in the construction of this railway across the east and west of the United States. They used simple tools to open roads and bridges in the mountains and the deep valleys, paving the way to the western United States with their flesh and blood, creating an engineering miracle at that time and driving the development of the western United States. It has become a monument to the hard work, dedication and dedication of overseas Chinese in the United States. The overseas Chinese in the United States have the excellent quality of diligence and dedication, as well as the excellent tradition of patriotism and love for the hometown. You are in love with Sangzi and care about the future and destiny of the motherland. More than 70 years ago, overseas Chinese in the United States actively supported the motherland’s struggle against Japanese militarism through donations and other means, leaving a strong mark in the history of the Chinese nation’s struggle for independence and liberation. Since the founding of New China, especially since the reform and opening up, the overseas Chinese compatriots in the United States have actively supported the construction of the motherland, actively promoted the peaceful development of cross-strait relations, and made important contributions to the development, reunification and national rejuvenation of the motherland. The overseas Chinese in the United States are participants, builders, and promoters of Sino-US relations. In the course of the development of Sino-U.S. relations, overseas Chinese in the United States have used their unique advantages to travel across the Pacific, actively promoting exchanges and cooperation in the fields of economy, science, technology, and humanities between China and the United States, and building friendship and cooperation between the two countries and their peoples. Bridge. It can be said that the achievements made in the development of Sino-US relations over the past 30 years are inseparable from the tireless efforts of the vast number of overseas Chinese in the United States. , Fellows! The vast majority of overseas Chinese are concerned about the development of the motherland, and the strong development of the motherland is the common aspiration of everyone. I would like to take this opportunity to give you a brief introduction. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, in order to realize the goal of "two hundred years" and the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, we proceeded from the reality of China's development and clearly proposed to build a well-off society in an all-round way, deepen reforms in an all-round way, and rule the country in accordance with law. The "four comprehensive" strategic layout of comprehensively and strictly governing the party. Building a well-off society in an all-round way is the first and crucial step in our struggle. When this goal is achieved, China's economic aggregate will reach nearly US$17 trillion, and people's living standards will be significantly improved. In order to achieve our goal of struggle, we must comprehensively deepen reforms and advance the modernization of the national governance system and governance capabilities. Now the reforms are steadily advancing. Deepening reform will inevitably further promote opening up, provide a more open, relaxed, and transparent environment for foreign investment to enter China, and open up a wider space for us to cooperate with countries around the world, including the United States. At the same time, we are comprehensively advancing the rule of law, so that together with the comprehensive deepening of reforms, we will form the two wings and the two wheels for building a well-off society in an all-round way. The Communist Party of China is a political party that serves the people wholeheartedly, and it must always maintain flesh-and-blood ties with the people, so governing the country must govern the party first, and governing the party must be strict. The unhealthy tendencies and corruption within the party must be dealt with resolutely, insisting that "tigers" and "flies" fight together and be welcomed by the people. We will continue to strengthen anti-corruption according to law and anti-corruption system, and vigorously create a rule of law environment that does not dare to corrupt, cannot corrupt, or does not want to corrupt.Playing together is welcomed by the people. We will continue to strengthen anti-corruption in accordance with the law and anti-corruption in accordance with the law, and vigorously create a legal environment and political atmosphere that does not dare, cannot, or do not want to corrupt. At present, the fundamentals of China's economic development are good, the development prospects are bright, the growth is maintained at a medium to high speed, and the development is moving towards the middle and high end. In the face of the difficult and tortuous world economic recovery and the domestic economy facing significant downward pressure, we launched a series of major measures to stabilize growth, promote reform, adjust structure, benefit people's livelihood, and prevent risks, and achieved overall stability in economic and social development. In the first half of the year, the GDP grew by 7%, which means that we have grown by 780 billion US dollars a year, which is equivalent to the total economic volume of a medium-sized country. In the future, China's economy will continue to improve with a foundation, conditions and motivation. We are vigorously promoting economic restructuring and implementing innovation-driven development strategies. China has a large population and a huge market potential. There are many sources of economic growth momentum in China, and its development potential is strong. We are confident and able to cope with various risk challenges, maintain the stability of the financial market, and promote sustained and healthy economic development. The realization of the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation requires a peaceful and stable international environment. We will unswervingly adhere to the path of peaceful development, unswervingly pursue an open strategy of mutual benefit and win-win, and firmly commit to developing friendly relations with all countries in the world, and promote the establishment of a new type of international relations with cooperation and win-win as the core. Sino-US relations are one of the most important bilateral relations in the world today, and occupy a particularly important position in China's diplomatic layout. China has always viewed and grasped Sino-US relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, and is committed to developing long-term healthy and stable Sino-US relations. In the summer of 2013, I reached an important consensus with President Obama at the Annaberg Estate to build a new relationship between China and the United States. Over the past two years or so, with the joint efforts of both sides, China-US new-type relations between major powers have achieved fruitful results. The high-level exchanges between the two countries are frequent, cooperation in various fields has continuously made new progress, and close communication and coordination have been maintained on international, regional, and global issues. Facts have proved that the stable development of Sino-US relations not only benefits the two countries, but also benefits the world. Under the new situation, we will firmly grasp the correct direction of the relations between the two countries, continue to make the cake of common interests of the two countries, and work together to meet the common challenges of the 21st century, bringing more well-being to the peoples of the two countries and the people of the world. , Fellows! Since modern times, achieving the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation has been the common dream of Chinese children at home and abroad. Today, we are closer to achieving the goal of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation than any period in history. I believe that as an important member of the big family of the Chinese nation, the vast number of overseas Chinese compatriots in the United States will definitely be able to make unique contributions in this great process. Here, I would like to offer you some hopes. First, I hope you can actively integrate into the mainstream US society and promote local economic and social development. We must carry forward the traditional virtue of the Chinese nation's diligence and kindness, and realize the value of life through our own efforts. We must abide by the laws of the country of residence, respect local customs, live in harmony with people of all ethnic groups, develop together, and contribute wisdom and strength to local economic and social development. Secondly, I hope you can take advantage of learning from China and the West and blending China and the United States to match the mutually beneficial cooperation between China and the United States. It is necessary to seize the opportunities of China's economic development, use its own capital, technology, management, contacts and other favorable conditions to promote pragmatic exchanges and cooperation in various fields between China and the United States, add positive energy to Sino-US relations, and contribute to the building of Sino-US friendship. Third, I hope you can proactively introduce Chinese culture and tell Chinese stories. Every overseas Chinese compatriot in the United States is an emissary of Chinese culture. I hope you can show the charm of Chinese culture by yourself, introduce a real China, enhance the understanding of the American people about China, promote the friendship between the people of China and the United States, and consolidate the foundation of public opinion on China-US relations. , "Yu Youtian Yukang, sincerely nostalgic for his hometown." We came to the United States this time to bring you some moon cakes from your hometown. This is a little bit of the motherland’s wishes. , Finally, I wish you all a happy Mid-Autumn Festival, good health and happy family! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Seattle, United States, September 23rd), "People's Daily" (September 25, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech when attending the welcome reception held by overseas Chinese in Seattle
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-09-25
text: [, 同胞们：, 大家好！“老乡见老乡，两眼泪汪汪。”很高兴在美丽的西雅图同各位同胞团聚。再过几天就是中秋佳节了。每逢佳节倍思亲。我知道，在座各位都很思念万里之遥的祖国和亲人，祖国和亲人也牵挂着每一位海外游子。在这里，我代表祖国和13亿多同胞，向在座各位，并通过你们，向在美国工作和生活的全体同胞，致以诚挚的问候和良好的祝愿！大家为我们这次访问付出了辛勤劳动，我向你们表示衷心的感谢！, 我这次应奥巴马总统邀请对美国进行国事访问，目的是加深两国人民友谊，促进各领域务实合作，推动中美新型大国关系建设得到新的更大发展，更多更好造福两国人民和世界人民。西雅图是我这次访美第一站，接下来我将去华盛顿进行国事活动，之后我还将去纽约出席联合国成立70周年系列峰会。, 两天来，在同美国各界人士接触中，我深深感受到美国人民对中国人民的友好情谊，也切身体会到中美合作拥有广阔发展前景。我期待着同奥巴马总统共商中美合作大计，共创中美关系未来。, 今天在座的同胞来自美国各个方面，你们代表着全体旅美侨胞。长期以来，广大旅美侨胞秉承中华民族传统美德，顽强拼搏、艰苦创业，在实现人生梦想的同时，也为美国发展繁荣作出了贡献，赢得了美国人民尊重。, 今年是美国太平洋铁路修建150周年。150年前，数以万计的华工漂洋过海来到美国，参与建设这条横跨美国东西部的铁路。他们拿着简陋的工具，在崇山峻岭和绝壁深谷中逢山开路、遇水搭桥，以血肉之躯铺就了通往美国西部的战略大通道，创造了当时的工程奇迹，带动了美国西部大开发，成为旅美侨胞奋斗、进取、奉献精神的一座丰碑。, 旅美侨胞有着勤奋敬业的优秀品质，也有着爱国爱乡的优良传统，你们情系桑梓，关心祖国前途命运。70多年前，旅美侨胞通过捐款捐物等多种方式，积极支援祖国抗击日本军国主义侵略的斗争，在中华民族争取独立解放的历史上留下浓墨重彩的一笔。新中国成立以来特别是改革开放以来，旅美侨胞踊跃支持祖国建设，积极推动两岸关系和平发展，为祖国发展、统一和民族复兴作出了重要贡献。, 旅美侨胞是中美关系的参与者、建设者、推动者。在中美关系发展历程中，旅美侨胞发挥自己独特优势，奔走于太平洋两岸，积极促进中美经济、科技、人文等各领域交流合作，在中美两国和两国人民间架起友谊和合作的桥梁。可以说，中美关系30多年发展所取得的成绩，同广大旅美侨胞不懈努力密不可分。, 同胞们！, 广大海外侨胞心系祖国发展，祖国发展强大是大家共同的心声。我愿借此机会向大家做些简要介绍。, 中共十八大以来，为了实现“两个一百年”奋斗目标、实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦，我们从中国发展实际出发，明确提出全面建成小康社会、全面深化改革、全面依法治国、全面从严治党的“四个全面”战略布局。全面建成小康社会，是我们奋斗目标的第一步，也是关键一步。这个目标实现之时，中国经济总量将达到近17万亿美元，人民生活水平将明显提高。, 为了实现我们的奋斗目标，必须全面深化改革，推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化，现在改革正在稳步向前推进。深化改革必然进一步促进对外开放，为外资进入中国提供更为开放、宽松、透明的环境，为我们同包括美国在内的世界各国开展合作开辟更广阔的空间。同时，我们正在全面推进依法治国，让它同全面深化改革一起构成全面建成小康社会的两个翅膀、两个轮子。中国共产党是全心全意为人民服务的政党，必须始终保持同人民群众的血肉联系，所以治国必先治党、治党务必从严。对党内的不正之风和腐败现象，必须坚决处理，坚持“老虎”、“苍蝇”一起打，受到人民群众欢迎。我们将继续加强依法反腐、制度反腐，大力营造不敢腐、不能腐、不想腐的法治环境和政治氛围。, 当前，中国经济发展基本面良好，发展前景光明，增长保持中高速，发展迈向中高端。在世界经济复苏艰难曲折、国内经济面临较大下行压力情况下，我们推出一系列稳增长、促改革、调结构、惠民生、防风险的重大举措，实现了经济社会发展总体平稳。上半年国内生产总值增长7%，这意味着我们一年就增长七八千亿美元，相当于一个中等国家的经济总量。未来中国经济持续向好有基础有条件有动力。我们正在大力推进经济结构调整，实施创新驱动发展战略。中国人口众多，市场潜力巨大，中国经济增长动力源很多，发展后劲很足。我们有信心、有能力应对各种风险挑战，保持金融市场稳定，推动经济持续健康发展。, 实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦，需要和平稳定的国际环境。我们将始终不渝坚持走和平发展道路，始终不渝奉行互利共赢的开放战略，坚定致力于同世界各国发展友好关系，推动构建以合作共赢为核心的新型国际关系。, 中美关系是当今世界最重要的双边关系之一，在中国外交布局中占有特殊重要位置。中国始终从战略高度和长远角度看待和把握中美关系，致力于发展长期健康稳定的中美关系。2013年夏天，我在安纳伯格庄园同奥巴马总统达成了构建中美新型大国关系的重要共识。两年多来，在双方共同努力下，中美新型大国关系建设取得了丰硕成果。两国高层交往频繁，各领域合作不断取得新进展，在国际、地区、全球性问题上保持密切沟通和协调。事实证明，中美关系保持稳定发展，不仅有利于两国，也惠及世界。新形势下，我们将牢牢把握两国关系正确方向，不断做大两国共同利益的蛋糕，携手应对21世纪的共同挑战，为两国人民乃至世界人民带来更多福祉。, 同胞们！, 近代以来，实现中华民族伟大复兴是海内外中华儿女的共同梦想。今天，我们比历史上任何时期都更加接近实现中华民族伟大复兴的目标。我相信，作为中华民族大家庭的重要成员，广大旅美侨胞一定能够在这一伟大进程中作出独特贡献。在这里，我愿向大家提出几点希望。, 一是希望大家积极融入美国主流社会，推动当地经济社会发展。要发扬中华民族勤劳善良的传统美德，通过自身努力实现人生价值。要遵守驻在国法律，尊重当地习俗，同各族裔人民和睦相处，共同发展，为当地经济社会发展贡献智慧和力量。, 二是希望大家发挥学贯中西、融通中美的优势，为中美互利合作牵线搭桥。要抓住中国经济发展的机遇，利用自身资金、技术、管理、人脉等有利条件，促进中美各领域务实交流合作，为中美关系增加正能量，为中美友谊的大厦添砖加瓦。, 三是希望大家积极主动宣介中华文化，讲好中国故事。每一位旅美侨胞都是中华文化的使者，希望你们身体力行展示中华文化魅力，介绍一个真实的中国，增进美国人民对中国的了解，促进中美两国人民友谊，夯实中美关系民意基础。, “悠悠天宇旷，切切故乡情。”欢迎大家常回家看看。我们这次来美国，给大家带来一些家乡的月饼，这是祖国人民的一点心意。, 最后，祝大家中秋愉快、身体健康、阖家幸福！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社美国西雅图9月23日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年09月25日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在西雅图出席侨界举行的欢迎招待会时的讲话

eng: [, Dear Governor Brown, California, Dear Governor Insley, Washington, Dear Governor Branstad, Iowa, Dear Governor Snyder, Michigan, Dear Governor Brown, Oregon ,, Responsible comrades of Chinese provinces and cities,, Ladies and gentlemen, friends:, It is a pleasure to attend the third China-US Governors Forum. First of all, I express my warm congratulations on the success of the forum! I highly appreciate the proactive efforts made by the responsible persons of the provinces and states to promote the development of Sino-US relations for a long time! , Just now, I listened to your speech carefully, and everyone spoke very well. Every time I communicate with local leaders in China and the United States, I am very inspired. In 2012, when I visited the United States, I attended the meeting between the governors of the Central American Province in Los Angeles. In 2013, I met representatives from both parties who participated in the second provincial governor forum in Beijing. Everyone talked about local cooperation and offered suggestions for the development of relations between the two countries. I have worked in the local area for a long time. I know the importance of local leaders’ responsibilities and hard work. I also know that local cooperation plays an important role in the development of national relations. In the final analysis, state-to-state relations require the support of the people and ultimately serve the people. The place is closest to the people. Whether local cooperation is good or not depends on whether the cooperation at the national level can take root. For this reason, I have always attached great importance to Sino-US local cooperation. Over the past 30 years, the development of Sino-US relations has benefited from the support of the localities and peoples of the two countries. In the future, we still have to rely on and benefit localities. , I am glad to see that in recent years, China-US local exchanges and cooperation have shown a new trend of vigorous development. China’s 31 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities have established 43 pairs of friendly provinces and states and 200 pairs of friendly cities with 50 US states. Over the past 10 years, 42 US states' exports to China have increased by three digits. According to US statistics, China has invested more than US$8 billion annually in the past five years, and the growth rate is still accelerating. The five states in the United States that come today, China are your top four export markets and the main source of foreign students. Among the six provinces and cities in China that participated in the conference, some took the United States as the largest trading partner, and some attracted thousands of U.S. companies to invest. In one year, the trade volume with the United States increased by more than 40%. These exchanges and cooperation have benefited the two peoples. At present, China-US relations have generally maintained stable development, and pragmatic cooperation in various fields has been comprehensively deepened. I am here this time and hope to have in-depth exchanges with President Obama and all sectors of the American society and plan a blueprint for the development of relations between the two countries. From an international perspective, economic globalization continues to develop in depth, new breakthroughs are brewing in industrial upgrading, and various production factors are accelerating in the world. Under the above background, there is a broader world for local exchanges and cooperation between the two countries. , First of all, the two sides should make effective use of the opportunities brought about by the huge economies of the two countries. Scale is business opportunity. China and the United States have the status of the top two economies in the world, which is itself a huge treasure for cooperation between provinces and states. As the world's largest economy, the United States has a vast market space and is extremely capable of absorbing external commodities, investment, and talents. From the perspective of China, we have a population of more than 1.3 billion. The populations of Shandong and Sichuan are close to 100 million. The total population of the six provinces and cities here is equivalent to the total population of the United States. We are vigorously promoting new industrialization, informatization, urbanization, agricultural modernization, and implementing innovation-driven development strategies. This process will generate massive demand for external commodities, technologies, and services. In the next five years, China is expected to import US$10 trillion in commodities, foreign investment will exceed US$500 billion, and the number of outbound tourists will exceed 500 million. We welcome US states to strengthen cooperation with China. Second, the two sides should share the favorable policies of reform and development between China and the United States. Change is the trend of today's world. China will continue to reform and open up unswervingly, and various areas of China are exploring reform and opening up in various fields. The United States has made efforts to adjust its economic structure, adopted policies such as "re-industrialization" and manufacturing return, and formulated many strategic plans to encourage technological innovation and industrial upgrading to promote sustained economic recovery. Some states have introduced a number of ways to attract investment, and the conditions are even more favorable than ours in the 1980s. This will create opportunities for cooperation. We encourage more Chinese places to go to the United States to carry out higher-level exchanges and cooperation to achieve our own development and further benefit local society. , China is formulating economic and social development plans for the "13th Five-Year Plan" period. We will strive to implement a new round of high-level opening to the outside world and accelerate the establishment of a new open economic system. In this regard, we encourage some qualified areas to try first. For example, we set up four free trade pilot zones in Shanghai, Guangdong, Tianjin, and Fujian, and adopted a pre-entry national treatment plus negative list management model; launched six services in finance, tourism, and medical care in BeijingSet up four free trade pilot zones and adopt the management model of pre-access national treatment plus a negative list; conduct pilot projects in Beijing to open foreign investment in six service sectors including finance, tourism, and medical services, etc. We will take effective measures to promote the coordinated development of domestic regions, coordinated development of urban and rural areas, and accelerate the development of less developed regions. We will accelerate the construction of the “Belt and Road” and build a platform for expanding domestic cooperation in various regions of the country. For example, Xinjiang is the "core area" of the Silk Road Economic Belt, and Yunnan is the "bridgehead" of the "Belt and Road" opening to the southwest. The “Belt and Road” initiative welcomes the active participation of all countries in the world, including the United States. These measures will create opportunities for Sino-US local cooperation. Thirdly, both sides should work hard to explore the potential of complementarity between China and the United States. Exerting advantages is the key to successful cooperation. Each of China and the United States has unique characteristics in its superior areas and is highly complementary. Both sides should adapt to local conditions, "Eight immortals cross the sea, each showing their magical powers." For example, Iowa is known as the “American Granary”, and Oregon is also an important agricultural area in the United States. It can strengthen cooperation with major agricultural provinces such as Shaanxi, Hebei, and Heilongjiang. Hewlett-Packard of California has established a global computer production base in Chongqing, and both parties can deepen cooperation around the information industry. Michigan is the largest producer of motor vehicles in the United States. The six provinces and cities in which China is present are actively developing the automobile industry. The two sides can discuss more cooperative projects.
