Both parties can also actively explore and open up third-party markets. , China is vigorously promoting the construction of ecological civilization. This is also a key direction of our "13th Five-Year Plan". Roughly calculated, our annual investment in environmental protection has been close to US$200 billion per year, and environmental protection investment in various regions has been growing rapidly. In this regard, China has needs and markets, and the United States has technology and experience. Washington State has advantages in environmental protection and coastal protection, and can strengthen cooperation with some major provinces or coastal provinces that invest in environmental protection in China. The first China-U.S. Climate Smart/Low-Carbon City Summit held in Los Angeles not long ago has also been very effective. Many local provinces and states have taken the lead in national emission reduction goals and played a leading role. Such efforts deserve recognition and encouragement. The exchange and cooperation in the field of environmental protection between the two countries should become an important aspect of the joint efforts of China and the United States to respond to climate change and promote sustainable development. , I attach great importance to Sino-American cultural exchanges. "Relatives are getting closer and closer, and friends are getting closer and closer." The more frequent the people's exchanges between China and the United States, the stronger the foundation for friendship between the two countries, and the more prosperous the cooperation will be. Provinces and states should conduct exchanges and cooperation in a wide range of fields such as education, tourism, sports, and youth, and support all walks of life and people from all walks of life. , Employment is a matter of great concern to the governors of all provinces. We must carry out these cooperations to promote growth, create employment, and benefit the people. Every province or city in China today has dozens or hundreds of colleges and universities, and some provinces have more than one million students. In 2006, when I was working in Zhejiang, I attended the signing ceremony of Wenzhou University and Kane University co-founding Wenzhou Kean University. After years of hard work, Wenzhou Kenn University was formally established last year and is currently functioning well. There are also nearly 100 primary and secondary schools in Zhejiang Province that have sister relationships with schools across the United States and have active contacts. Both sides should explore various forms of educational cooperation and jointly cultivate future-oriented high-quality talents. China will fund a total of 50,000 international students from the two countries to study in the other country in the next three years. The United States will also strive to achieve millions of American students to learn Chinese by 2020. The two countries will hold a tourism year in 2016. These measures will provide more platforms for the two provinces and states to strengthen cultural exchanges. I hope everyone will work together to build a wider and stronger bridge of Sino-US folk friendship. , The Chinese often say "just fight for the day and night." Westerners pay attention to "take advantage of opportunities when acting." It is the right time for China-US local cooperation. I hope you will actively promote the two provinces and states to seize the opportunity and take advantage of the momentum to jointly write a new chapter of Sino-US local cooperation. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Seattle, United States, September 22nd), "People's Daily" (September 24, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the China-US Governors Forum
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-09-24
text: [, 尊敬的加利福尼亚州布朗州长，, 尊敬的华盛顿州英斯利州长，, 尊敬的艾奥瓦州布兰斯塔德州长，, 尊敬的密歇根州斯奈德州长，, 尊敬的俄勒冈州布朗州长，, 中方各位省市负责同志，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 很高兴出席第三届中美省州长论坛。首先，我对论坛的成功举办，表示热烈的祝贺！对各位省州负责人长期以来为促进中美关系发展作出的积极努力，表示高度的赞赏！, 刚才，我认真听了你们的发言，大家讲得都很好。每次同中美地方负责人交流，我都很受启发。2012年，我访美时曾在洛杉矶出席中美省州长见面会。2013年，我在北京会见了参加第二届省州长论坛的双方代表。大家畅谈地方合作，为发展两国关系献计献策，我至今记忆犹新。, 我曾长期在地方工作，深知地方领导责任之重、工作之不易，也深知地方合作对发展国家关系有着重要作用。国与国关系归根结底需要人民支持，最终也服务于人民。地方是最贴近老百姓的。地方合作搞得好不好，关系国家层面的合作能否落地生根。为此，我一直高度重视中美地方合作。过去30多年，中美关系发展得益于两国地方和人民支持，未来仍然要依靠地方、造福地方。, 我高兴地看到，近年来，中美地方交流合作呈现新的蓬勃发展态势。中国31个省区市同美国50个州建立了43对友好省州、200对友好城市。过去10年，美国42个州对华出口增幅达到3位数。据美方统计，中国过去5年对美投资年均超过80多亿美元，增速还在加快。今天来的美国5个州，中国都是你们位列前四位的出口市场和主要留学生来源国。与会的中国6个省市，有的以美国为第一大贸易伙伴，有的吸引数以千计的美国企业投资，有的一年对美国贸易额增幅就超过40%。这些交流合作造福了两国人民。, 当前，中美关系总体保持稳定发展，各领域务实合作全面深化。我这次来，希望同奥巴马总统和美国社会各界深入交流，规划两国关系发展蓝图。从国际上看，经济全球化继续深入发展，产业升级酝酿新突破，各种生产要素在世界范围内加快流动。在上述背景下，两国地方交流合作有着更加广阔的天地。, 首先，双方要有效利用中美两国经济巨大体量带来的机遇。规模就是商机。中美坐拥世界前两大经济体地位，这本身就是省州开展合作的巨大宝藏。美国作为世界第一大经济体，拥有广大的市场空间，吸纳外部商品、投资、人才的能力极强。从中国看，我们有13亿多人口，山东、四川两省人口都接近一个亿，在座6省市人口加起来相当于全美国人口的总数。我们正在大力推进新型工业化、信息化、城镇化、农业现代化，实施创新驱动发展战略，这一进程将对外部商品、技术、服务产生海量需求。未来5年，预计中国将进口10万亿美元商品，对外投资将超过5000亿美元，出境旅游人数将超过5亿人次。我们欢迎美国各州同中国地方加强合作。, 第二，双方要共同分享中美两国改革发展的政策利好。变革是当今世界的潮流。中国将坚定不移继续改革开放，中国各地正在进行各方面改革开放的探索。美国努力调整经济结构，采取“再工业化”、制造业回流等政策，制定了很多鼓励科技创新、产业升级的战略规划，推动经济持续复苏。一些州出台了不少招商引资的办法，条件甚至比我们上世纪80年代还优惠。这都会创造合作机遇。我们鼓励更多中国地方到美国开展更高水平的交流合作，实现自身发展，也进一步造福当地社会。, 中国正在制定“十三五”时期经济社会发展规划。我们将着力实行新一轮高水平对外开放，加快建立开放型经济新体制。这方面，我们鼓励一些有条件的地区先行先试。比如，我们在上海、广东、天津、福建设立4个自由贸易试验区，采取准入前国民待遇加负面清单的管理模式；在北京市开展金融、旅游、医疗等6个服务业领域对外资开放试点，等等。我们将采取有力措施促进国内区域协调发展、城乡协调发展，加快欠发达地区发展。我们将加快推进“一带一路”建设，为国内各地区拓展对外合作搭建平台。比如，新疆是丝绸之路经济带“核心区域”，云南是“一带一路”向西南开放的“桥头堡”。“一带一路”欢迎包括美国在内的世界各国积极参与。这些措施将为中美地方合作创造机遇。, 第三，双方要努力发掘中美地方优势互补的潜能。发挥优势是合作成功的关键。中美各地优势领域各具特色，互补性很强。双方应该因地制宜，“八仙过海，各显神通”。比如，艾奥瓦州有“美国粮仓”之称，俄勒冈州也是美国的重要农业区，可以同陕西、河北、黑龙江等中国农业大省加强合作。加利福尼亚州的惠普公司在重庆建有全球电脑生产基地，双方可以围绕信息产业深化合作。密歇根州是美国最大的机动车生产地，中方在座的六省市都在积极发展汽车工业，双方可以探讨开展更多合作项目。双方还可以积极探索开辟第三方市场。, 中国正在大力推进生态文明建设。这也是我们“十三五”规划的一个重点方向。粗略计算，我们这些年每年环保投入近2000亿美元，各地环保投入都在快速增长。这方面中国有需要、有市场，美国有技术、有经验。华盛顿州在环保、海岸带保护等方面有优势，就可以同中国一些环保投入大省或沿海省份加强合作。前不久在洛杉矶举办的首届中美气候智慧型/低碳城市峰会效果也很好，很多地方省州减排目标走在了国家目标的前头，发挥着率先引领作用。这种努力值得肯定和鼓励。两国地方环保领域交流合作理应成为中美合力应对气候变化、推进可持续发展的一个重要方面。, 我高度重视中美人文交流。“亲戚越走越近，朋友越走越亲。”中美民众往来越频繁，两国友好的基础就越坚实，务实合作就越红火。各省州应该在教育、旅游、体育、青年等广泛领域开展交流合作，支持社会各界和民众多走动、常来往。, 就业是各位省州长高度关注的问题，我们要通过开展这些合作，促进增长，创造就业，使人民受益。, 今天来的中国省市，每家都有几十、上百所高等院校，有的省在校生数量超过百万。2006年，我在浙江工作时，出席了温州大学和美国肯恩大学合作创办温州肯恩大学的签字仪式。经过多年努力，温州肯恩大学去年正式设立，目前运转良好。浙江省还有近百所中小学同美国各地学校结成姐妹关系，往来活跃。双方应该探索形式多样的教育合作，共同培养面向未来的高素质人才。中方将在未来3年内资助两国共5万名留学生到对方国家学习，美国也将努力在2020年前实现百万名美国学生学中文，两国将在2016年举办旅游年。这些举措将为两国各省州加强人文交流提供更多平台。希望大家一道努力，把中美民间友好的桥梁筑得更宽、更牢。, 中国人常说“只争朝夕”。西方人则讲究“行事要趁机会好”。中美地方合作正当其时。希望各位积极推动两国各省州抓住机遇、乘势而上，共同谱写中美地方合作新篇章。, 谢谢大家。, （新华社美国西雅图9月22日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年09月24日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在中美省州长论坛上的讲话

eng: [, Dear President Putin, Dear Prime Minister Modi, Dear President Zuma, Dear President Rousseff, Ladies and Gentlemen, Friends:, Glad to be with you again in beautiful Ufa meeting. Thank you President Putin and the Russian government for their thoughtful arrangements. This Ufa meeting is the BRICS leaders' meeting that came to Russia again six years after the meeting, and is of great significance to the BRICS cooperation process. Over the past six years, BRICS cooperation has gone through an extraordinary course. , ——We uphold international fairness and justice and promote the democratization of international relations. On many major international and regional issues, we stand together from the standpoint of emerging market countries and developing countries, calling for compliance with the purposes and principles of the UN Charter and international law and international relations. Basic guidelines for peaceful settlement of international disputes through political and diplomatic means. -We promote world economic growth, improve global economic governance, strengthen the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries in international economic and financial affairs, and enable traditional international financial institutions such as the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund to obtain new Progress made new energy. , ——We expand the cooperation field from scratch, from small to large, covering many fields such as politics, economy, finance, trade, society, humanities, etc., forming a multi-level and all-round cooperation structure. The preparation for the establishment of the BRICS New Development Bank is in full swing, and the emergency reserve arrangement is officially launched, which fully proves the effectiveness and action of the BRICS cooperation. At present, the world economy is still in a period of deep adjustment after the international financial crisis, and unstable and uncertain factors have increased. The risks and challenges of emerging market countries and developing countries are constantly gathering, the economic growth rate is generally slowing down, and the development of BRICS countries is also facing many difficulties and challenges. , The more difficult it is, the more confidence you must have. It should be noted that any progress is not linear, and there are twists and turns. Despite these difficulties, the BRICS countries have abundant natural and human resources, a broad domestic market, huge development potential, and ample policy space. The upward trend will not change. , Colleagues! At present, the international situation is complicated and the opportunities and challenges of the BRICS countries coexist. We should strengthen cooperation, go hand in hand, and continue to be a leader in promoting global development. Last year in Fortaleza, Brazil, we unanimously decided to deepen the BRICS partnership in a spirit of openness, tolerance, cooperation and mutual benefit. This year’s host country, Russia, also adopted the “BRICS Partnership” as the theme of the meeting, indicating that this concept has been deeply rooted in the hearts of the people. Now, I would like to make a few comments on strengthening the BRICS partnership. First, build a partnership to maintain world peace. At present, the trend of the era of peaceful development is stronger, but the world is still very uneven. Partial turbulence is one after another, and non-traditional security challenges such as terrorism, drug threats, major epidemics, and natural disasters are endless. The BRICS countries should advocate a common, comprehensive, cooperative, and sustainable security concept, coordinate actions, support each other, and work together to address these global issues. We must jointly prevent and combat all forms of terrorism and cooperate in the areas of counter-terrorism experience exchange, intelligence sharing, clue verification, and law enforcement cooperation. China supports accelerating the institutionalization of drug control cooperation among BRICS countries, and will work with other member states to promote regional and global drug problems. , Forgetting history means betrayal. This year marks the 70th anniversary of the victory of the World Anti-Fascist War and the founding of the United Nations. The BRICS countries should work with all peace-loving countries and peoples of the world to resolutely oppose denials, distortions and tampering with the plots and actions of the history of World War II, and jointly safeguard the victory of World War II and international fairness and justice. At the same time, we should use history as a mirror, abandon the Cold War mentality, reject the zero-sum game, and jointly maintain regional and world peace and stability. , We must continue to work to promote the democratization of international relations. Frequent sanctions or threats of sanctions in international relations will not help solve the problem. It is necessary to advocate peaceful and political resolution of differences through dialogue and negotiation. Second, build partnerships that promote common development. For the BRICS cooperation to flourish, it is necessary to strengthen the foundation and build a community of BRICS interests. With the goal of building a value chain for benefit sharing and a large market where benefits are integrated, we should jointly build a closer economic partnership, give play to the complementary advantages of member countries in terms of resource endowments and industrial structure, and work together to expand more room for development. It is necessary to advance the construction of the headquarters of the New Development Bank of the BRICS and the regional center in Africa, and strive to put into operation as soon as possible and obtain early gains. Implement the BRICS economic partnership strategy and explore new cooperation highlights. , We must continue to work to promote the common development and prosperity of developing countries. This year is internationalMake good use of BRICS economic partnership strategies and discover new highlights of cooperation. , We must continue to work to promote the common development and prosperity of developing countries. This year is the International Year of Development and the year of climate change. The BRICS countries should strengthen coordination and cooperation to safeguard the common interests of emerging market countries and developing countries on major international development issues such as the post-2015 development agenda and climate change, and guide post-2015 The Development Agenda negotiations focused on solving the difficulties and challenges facing developing countries, especially African countries and LDCs. , Third, build a partnership that promotes multiple civilizations. The success of the BRICS cooperation fully proves that different social systems can tolerate each other, different development models can cooperate with each other, and different values ​​and cultures can communicate with each other. We must adhere to openness and tolerance, learn from each other's strengths in exchanges and learn from each other, and advance together while seeking common ground while reserving differences. The BRICS countries are located on four continents and across the northern and southern hemispheres. They have a unique geographical advantage. We must make good use of this advantage to actively carry out dialogue and exchanges with other countries and international organizations to share the results of cooperation. We must strengthen unity and cooperation with other emerging market countries and developing countries, continue to strengthen our strength, and expand the representativeness and influence of the BRICS countries. , Fourth, build a partnership to strengthen global economic governance. International economic rules need to be constantly reformed to adapt to new changes in the global growth pattern and to match responsibilities and capabilities. We must work together to improve the status and role of the BRICS countries in the global governance system and promote the international economic order to conform to the historical trend of rising power in emerging market countries and developing countries. Promote the reform of the governance structure of the International Monetary Fund, increase the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries. Advocate the construction of an open world economy, support the multilateral trading system, promote the Doha Round negotiations to safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of emerging market countries and developing countries, and ensure that countries have equal opportunities, rules and rights in international economic and trade activities. The BRICS countries should strengthen cooperation in information security and Internet management, jointly build a peaceful, secure, open, and cooperative cyberspace, and strive for equal rights to participate in Internet governance. The immigration issue is closely related to the economic development and social stability of the BRICS countries. We should also strengthen exchanges and cooperation in this field. , Colleagues! As I just mentioned, our respective countries face new opportunities and challenges in their development. The BRIC countries have similar stages of development, and the opportunities and challenges they face are also similar. We should strengthen the exchange of experience in governing the country, enhance mutual understanding, strengthen learning and reference, and jointly explore solutions to problems. At present, China is coordinating and advancing the building of a well-off society in an all-round way, comprehensively deepening reforms, comprehensively governing the country according to law, and comprehensively administering the party strictly, and has planned strategic goals and strategic measures to govern the country under the new situation. , Building a well-off society in an all-round way is our strategic goal at this stage, and also a key step in realizing the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. We will continue to focus on economic construction, and strive to build a moderately prosperous society in which the fruits of reform and development will truly benefit the people, and the economy, politics, culture, society, and ecological civilization will develop in an all-round way. We will unswervingly deepen reforms, advance the modernization of the national governance system and governance capabilities, and promote sustained and healthy economic and social development. We will adhere to the common advancement of governing the country by law, ruling by law, and administration by law, uphold the integration of the rule of law, the rule of law, and the society of the rule of law, and achieve scientific legislation, strict law enforcement, fair justice, and law enforcement by all people. We will comprehensively promote the Chinese Communist Party's self-improvement, improve the Party's self-improvement, self-innovation, and self-improvement capabilities, maintain a high-pressure trend of zero tolerance for corruption, improve system and mechanism construction, and continuously enhance the ability to govern. , Colleagues! , Our efforts today are related to the well-being of the people of the 3 billion BRIC countries, but also to the future and future of the entire world and all mankind. There is a proverb in Russia: "The road to success is always bumpy." Let us embark on a journey to join hands in building a closer partnership among the BRICS countries and jointly create a better future for the BRICS countries! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Ufa, Russia, July 9th), "People's Daily" (July 10, 2015, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Speech at the seventh meeting of leaders of the BRICS countries
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-07-10
text: [, 尊敬的普京总统，, 尊敬的莫迪总理，, 尊敬的祖马总统，, 尊敬的罗塞夫总统，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　很高兴在美丽的乌法同大家再次会晤。感谢普京总统和俄罗斯政府所做的周到安排。, 　　这次乌法会晤是金砖国家领导人会晤时隔6年再次来到俄罗斯，对金砖国家合作进程具有重要意义。6年来，金砖国家合作走过了一段不平凡的历程。, 　　——我们秉持国际公平正义，推动国际关系民主化，在许多重大国际和地区问题上，站在新兴市场国家和发展中国家的立场共同发声，呼吁遵守联合国宪章宗旨和原则以及国际法和国际关系基本准则，通过政治和外交手段和平解决国际争端。, 　　——我们推动世界经济增长，完善全球经济治理，加强新兴市场国家和发展中国家在国际经济金融事务中的代表性和话语权，让世界银行、国际货币基金组织等传统国际金融机构取得新进展，焕发新活力。, 　　——我们拓展合作领域，从无到有，从小到大，涵盖政治、经济、金融、贸易、社会、人文等多个领域，形成多层次、全方位合作架构。金砖国家新开发银行筹建工作全面展开，应急储备安排正式启动，充分证明了金砖国家合作的有效性和行动力。, 　　当前，世界经济仍然处于国际金融危机后的深度调整期，不稳定不确定因素增多。新兴市场国家和发展中国家风险和挑战不断集聚，经济增速普遍放缓，金砖国家各国发展也面临不少困难和挑战。, 　　越是在困难的时候，越要坚定信心。应该看到，任何进步都不是直线的，有曲折也有反复。尽管会有这样那样的困难，但金砖国家拥有丰富自然和人力资源、广阔国内市场、巨大发展潜力、充裕政策空间，上升趋势不会改变。, 　　各位同事！, 　　当前，国际形势错综复杂，金砖国家机遇和挑战并存，我们应该加强合作、携手并进，继续做推动全球发展的领跑者。去年在巴西福塔莱萨，我们一致决定本着开放、包容、合作、共赢精神，深化金砖国家伙伴关系。今年的东道国俄罗斯也将“金砖国家伙伴关系”作为会晤主题，说明这一理念已经深入人心。, 　　下面，我愿就加强金砖国家伙伴关系谈几点看法。, 　　第一，构建维护世界和平的伙伴关系。当前，和平发展的时代潮流更加强劲，但世界仍然很不太平，局部动荡此起彼伏，恐怖主义、毒品威胁、重大疫情、自然灾害等非传统安全挑战层出不穷。金砖国家应该倡导共同、综合、合作、可持续的安全观，协调行动，相互支援，携手应对这些全球性问题。我们要共同防范和打击一切形式的恐怖主义，在反恐经验交流、情报分享、线索核查、执法合作等领域开展合作。中方支持加快金砖国家禁毒合作机制化进程，将同其他成员国携手推动解决地区和全球毒品问题。, 　　忘记历史就意味着背叛。今年是世界反法西斯战争胜利暨联合国成立70周年。金砖国家应该同世界上所有热爱和平的国家和人民一道，坚决反对否认、歪曲、篡改第二次世界大战历史的图谋和行径，共同维护第二次世界大战胜利成果和国际公平正义。同时，要以史为鉴，摒弃冷战思维，拒绝零和博弈，共同维护地区和世界和平稳定。, 　　我们要继续致力于推动国际关系民主化。在国际关系中动辄制裁或以制裁相威胁，无助于解决问题。要倡导通过对话和谈判，以和平和政治方式解决分歧。, 　　第二，构建促进共同发展的伙伴关系。金砖国家合作事业要繁荣昌盛，就要强本固基，打造金砖国家利益共同体。我们要以建设利益共享的价值链和利益融合的大市场为目标，共同构建更紧密经济伙伴关系，发挥各成员国在资源禀赋、产业结构上的互补优势，合力拓展更大发展空间。要同步推进金砖国家新开发银行总部和非洲区域中心建设，争取尽早投入运作，取得早期收获。落实好金砖国家经济伙伴战略，发掘新的合作亮点。, 　　我们要继续致力于促进发展中国家共同发展繁荣。今年是国际发展年和气候变化年，金砖国家应该加强协调和配合，在2015年后发展议程、气候变化等重大国际发展议题上，维护新兴市场国家和发展中国家共同利益，引导2015年后发展议程谈判重点关注解决发展中国家特别是非洲国家和最不发达国家面临的困难和挑战。, 　　第三，构建弘扬多元文明的伙伴关系。金砖国家合作的成功充分证明，不同社会制度可以相互包容，不同发展模式可以相互合作，不同价值文化可以相互交流。我们要坚持开放包容，在交流互鉴中取长补短，在求同存异中共同前进。, 　　金砖国家分处四大洲、地跨南北半球，具有独特地理优势，我们要利用好这一优势，积极开展同其他国家和国际组织对话和交流，分享合作成果。要加强同其他新兴市场国家和发展中国家团结合作，不断壮大我们的力量，扩大金砖国家代表性和影响力。, 　　第四，构建加强全球经济治理的伙伴关系。国际经济规则需要不断革故鼎新，以适应全球增长格局新变化，让责任和能力相匹配。我们要共同致力于提高金砖国家在全球治理体系中的地位和作用，推动国际经济秩序顺应新兴市场国家和发展中国家力量上升的历史趋势。推动改革国际货币基金组织治理结构，增加新兴市场国家和发展中国家代表性和发言权。倡导建设开放型世界经济，支持多边贸易体制，推动多哈回合谈判维护新兴市场国家和发展中国家的正当权益，确保各国在国际经贸活动中机会平等、规则平等、权利平等。, 　　金砖国家要加强在信息安全和互联网管理方面合作，共同构建和平、安全、开放、合作的网络空间，争取平等参与互联网治理权利。移民问题同金砖各国经济发展和社会稳定密切相关，我们也应该加强这一领域交流合作。, 　　各位同事！, 　　正如我刚才提到的，我们各自国家发展都面临新的机遇和挑战。金砖国家发展阶段相似，所面临的机遇和挑战也有一定相通之处。我们应该加强治国理政经验交流，增进彼此了解，加强学习借鉴，共同探索解决问题的办法。, 　　当前，中国正在协调推进全面建成小康社会、全面深化改革、全面依法治国、全面从严治党，规划了在新形势下治国理政的战略目标和战略举措。, 　　全面建成小康社会是我们现阶段战略目标，也是实现中华民族伟大复兴中国梦关键一步。我们将继续坚持以经济建设为中心，致力于建设改革发展成果真正惠及人民，经济、政治、文化、社会、生态文明全面发展的小康社会。我们将坚定不移深化改革，推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化，推动经济社会持续健康发展。我们将坚持依法治国、依法执政、依法行政共同推进，坚持法治国家、法治政府、法治社会一体建设，实现科学立法、严格执法、公正司法、全民守法。我们将全面推进中国共产党自身建设，提高党的自我完善、自我革新、自我提高能力，保持对腐败零容忍的高压态势，完善体制机制建设，不断增强执政能力。, 　　各位同事！, 　　我们今天的努力，关系30亿金砖国家人民的福祉，也关系整个世界和全人类的前途和未来。俄罗斯有句谚语：“通向成功的道路永远都是曲折坎坷的。”让我们踏上征程，携手建设金砖国家更紧密的伙伴关系，共同开创金砖国家更美好未来！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社俄罗斯乌法7月9日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年07月10日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平：在金砖国家领导人第七次会晤上的讲话

eng: [, Dear guests and friends: Hello everyone! More than 2,000 years ago, Confucius, a great thinker in China, said that it would be great to have friends come from afar. Today, more than 3,000 people from all walks of life in Japan came from afar to gather in the Great Hall of the People in Beijing to hold the China-Japan Friendly Exchange Conference together with China. This is a great event for non-governmental exchanges between the two countries in recent years, and it also makes us very happy. , First of all, on behalf of the Chinese government and people, and in my own name, I warmly welcome all Japanese friends to visit! Through you, I would also like to extend my sincere regards and best wishes to the Japanese people! China and Japan have been brought under water. For more than 2000 years, peace and friendship have been the main theme in the hearts of the two peoples. The two peoples have learned from each other, promoted their respective developments, and made important contributions to the progress of human civilization. , More than a week ago, Indian Prime Minister Mr. Modi visited my hometown of Shaanxi Province, and I traced the history of ancient cultural exchanges between China and India in Xi'an with him. During the Sui and Tang Dynasties, Xi'an was also an important gateway for Sino-Japanese friendly exchanges. Many envoys, foreign students, and monks from Japan studied and lived there. The representative of them, Abe Nakamaro, formed a profound friendship with Li Tang and Wang Wei, the great poets of the Tang Dynasty in China, and left a touching story. , When I was working in Fujian Province, I knew the story of the 17th-century Chinese monk Yinyuan Master traveling to Japan. During his time in Japan, Master Yin Yuan not only spread Buddhist sutras, but also brought advanced culture and science and technology, which had an important impact on the economic and social development of Japan during the Edo period. In 2009, when I visited Japan, I visited Kitakyushu and other places, and directly experienced the continuous cultural origins and historical connections between the people of both countries. After modern times, as Japan embarked on the path of foreign aggression and expansion, China and Japan have experienced a painful history, which has caused a profound disaster to the Chinese people. In the 1970s, Chairman Mao Zedong, Premier Zhou Enlai, Mr. Deng Xiaoping, Mr. Tanaka Kakuei, Mr. Daping Zhengfang and other leaders of the older generation of the two countries, with a high degree of political wisdom, made important political decisions, overcome many difficulties, and achieved diplomatic relations between China and Japan. Normalization and the conclusion of peace and friendship treaties opened a new era of relations between the two countries. A group of people of insight, such as Mr. Liao Chengzhi, Mr. Gao Jieda Zhisuke, Mr. Okazaki Kaheita, etc., ran actively and did a lot of work. History has proved that the cause of Sino-Japanese friendship is beneficial to the two countries and peoples, and to Asia and the world. It deserves our cherishment and careful maintenance, and we will continue to make unremitting efforts. , Guests and friends! , Neighbors can choose, but neighboring countries cannot. "Germany is not alone, there must be neighbors." As long as the people of China and Japan are sincere and friendly, with virtue as their neighbors, they will surely achieve friendship from generation to generation. Both China and Japan are important countries in Asia and the world. The people of the two countries are hardworking, kind, and wise. Peace, friendship and cooperation between China and Japan is the trend of the people and the general trend. China attaches great importance to the development of Sino-Japanese relations. Although Sino-Japanese relations have gone through ups and downs, China’s basic policy has not changed and will not change in the future. We are willing to work with Japan to promote good-neighborly and friendly cooperation between the two countries on the basis of four political documents between China and Japan. This year marks the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Chinese People's Anti-Japanese War and the World Anti-Fascist War. At that time, the crime of aggression committed by Japanese militarism could not be covered up, and the historical truth could not be distorted. The Chinese people and the people of the victimized countries of Asia will not agree to any words and deeds that attempt to distort and beautify the history of Japanese militarism, and I believe that the Japanese people with justice and conscience will not agree. Past experience guide for the future. Remembering history is to create the future; never forgetting war is to maintain peace. , We believe that the Japanese people were also the victims of that war. After the end of the Anti-Japanese War, the Chinese people complained with virtue, helped millions of Japanese return to their homes, and raised thousands of Japanese orphans in the war to bring them up, demonstrating the Chinese people’s broad-mindedness and boundless love. Today, both China and Japan should, in the spirit of taking history as a mirror and facing the future, jointly promote peace and development, seek common friendship from generation to generation, and jointly create a better future for the development of the two countries, and contribute to peace in Asia and the world. , Guests and friends! The foundation of Sino-Japanese friendship lies in the people, and the future of Sino-Japanese relations lies in the hands of the two peoples. The more irregular the development of relations between the two countries, the more active the people from all walks of life in the two countries are required, and the greater the need for the two sides to strengthen non-governmental exchanges and create conditions and environments for the improvement of the development of bilateral relations. , "Youth prosperity is national prosperity." There are many young friends here today. The Chinese government supports non-governmental exchanges between the two countries and encourages people from all walks of life in the two countries, especially the younger generation, to actively join in the cause of Sino-Japanese friendship, enhance understanding, establish mutual trust, and develop friendship in exchanges and cooperation. , The predecessors planted trees, the descendants took the cool. I sincerely look forward to the two countriesEngage in the cause of Sino-Japanese friendship, enhance understanding, build mutual trust, and develop friendship in exchanges and cooperation. , The predecessors planted trees, the descendants took the cool. I sincerely hope that the youth of the two countries will strengthen their friendship and faith, take active actions, and continue to sow the seeds of friendship, so that the friendship between China and Japan will grow into a tree and a dense forest, and the friendship between the people of China and Japan will continue from generation to generation! , Finally, I wish this China-Japan friendly exchange meeting a complete success, and wish all Japanese friends a pleasant stay in China! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, May 23), "People's Daily" (May 24, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Speech at the China-Japan Friendship Exchange Conference
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-05-25
text: [, 各位来宾，各位朋友：, 大家好！2000多年前，中国的大思想家孔子就说，有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎。今天，3000多位日本各界人士自远方来，齐聚北京人民大会堂，同中方一道举办中日友好交流大会。这是近年来两国民间交往的一件盛事，也让我们感到十分高兴。, 首先，我代表中国政府和人民，并以我个人的名义，对各位日本朋友来访，表示热烈的欢迎！我还要通过你们，向广大日本人民，致以诚挚的问候和良好的祝愿！, 中日一衣带水，2000多年来，和平友好是两国人民心中的主旋律，两国人民互学互鉴，促进了各自发展，也为人类文明进步作出了重要贡献。, 一个多星期前，印度总理莫迪先生访问了我的家乡陕西省，我在西安同他一道追溯了中印古代文化交流的历史。隋唐时期，西安也是中日友好往来的重要门户，当年很多来自日本的使节、留学生、僧人在那里学习和生活。他们中的代表人物阿倍仲麻吕，同中国唐代大诗人李白、王维结下深厚友谊，留下了一段动人佳话。, 我在福建省工作时，就知道17世纪中国名僧隐元大师东渡日本的故事。在日本期间，隐元大师不仅传播了佛学经义，还带去了先进文化和科学技术，对日本江户时期经济社会发展产生了重要影响。2009年，我访问日本时，到访了北九州等地，直接体会到了两国人民割舍不断的文化渊源和历史联系。, 近代以后，由于日本走上对外侵略扩张道路，中日两国经历了一段惨痛历史，给中国人民带来了深重灾难。上世纪70年代，毛泽东主席、周恩来总理、邓小平先生和田中角荣先生、大平正芳先生等两国老一代领导人，以高度的政治智慧，作出重要政治决断，克服重重困难，实现了中日邦交正常化，并缔结了和平友好条约，开启了两国关系新纪元。廖承志先生和高碕达之助先生、冈崎嘉平太先生等一批有识之士积极奔走，做了大量工作。, 历史证明，中日友好事业对两国和两国人民有利，对亚洲和世界有利，值得我们倍加珍惜和精心维护，继续付出不懈努力。, 各位来宾、各位朋友！, 邻居可以选择，邻国不能选择。“德不孤，必有邻。”只要中日两国人民真诚友好、以德为邻，就一定能实现世代友好。中日两国都是亚洲和世界的重要国家，两国人民勤劳、善良、富有智慧。中日和平、友好、合作，是人心所向、大势所趋。, 中国高度重视发展中日关系，尽管中日关系历经风雨，但中方这一基本方针始终没有改变，今后也不会改变。我们愿同日方一道，在中日四个政治文件基础上，推进两国睦邻友好合作。, 今年是中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利70周年。当年，日本军国主义犯下的侵略罪行不容掩盖，历史真相不容歪曲。对任何企图歪曲美化日本军国主义侵略历史的言行，中国人民和亚洲受害国人民不答应，相信有正义和良知的日本人民也不会答应。前事不忘，后事之师。牢记历史，是为了开创未来；不忘战争，是为了维护和平。, 我们认为，日本人民也是那场战争的受害者。抗日战争结束后，中国人民以德报怨，帮助百万日侨重返家园，把数千名日本战争遗孤抚养成人，显示了中国人民的博大胸怀和无疆大爱。, 今天，中日双方应该本着以史为鉴、面向未来的精神，共促和平发展，共谋世代友好，共创两国发展的美好未来，为亚洲和世界和平作出贡献。, 各位来宾、各位朋友！, 中日友好的根基在民间，中日关系前途掌握在两国人民手里。越是两国关系发展不顺时，越需要两国各界人士积极作为，越需要双方加强民间交流，为两国关系改善发展创造条件和环境。, “青年兴则国家兴。”今天在座有不少青年朋友。中国政府支持两国民间交流，鼓励两国各界人士特别是年轻一代踊跃投身中日友好事业，在交流合作中增进理解、建立互信、发展友谊。, 前人栽树，后人乘凉。我真诚期待，两国青年坚定友好信念，积极采取行动，不断播撒友谊的种子，让中日友好长成大树、长成茂密的森林，让中日两国人民友好世世代代延续下去！, 最后，预祝本次中日友好交流大会取得圆满成功，祝各位日本朋友在华期间过得愉快！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社北京5月23日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年05月24日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：在中日友好交流大会上的讲话

eng: [, On May 8th, on the eve of a state visit to Belarus, President Xi Jinping published a signed article in the Belarusian "Soviet Belarusian Newspaper" entitled "Let the Movement of China-Belarus Friendship and Cooperation Excite". The article is as follows: Let the movement of Sino-Belarusian friendship and cooperation be in full swing. President Xi Jinping of the People's Republic of China, five years ago, I visited Belarus for the first time in a country known as the "land of thousands of lakes". The beautiful scenery and friendly people left a deep impression on me. Today, five years later, with friendly feelings towards the people of Belarus, I will soon set foot on this beautiful land again for my first state visit to Belarus since I assumed the presidency of the People’s Republic of China. Today’s Belarus maintains political stability, sustained economic development, social stability and solidarity, people’s lives are becoming richer, and its international status is constantly improving. President Lukashenko is leading the industrious and wise Belarusian people to continuously achieve new glories in the great journey of national construction. As a good friend of the Belarusian people, I am very happy for this. There is a famous saying in Belarus: "Friendship and brotherhood trump all wealth." Both the Chinese people and the Belarusian people have a strong sense of sentiment, and they have brotherhood formed by blood in the world anti-fascist war 70 years ago. In the world war of justice over evil and light over darkness, the Chinese people’s anti-Japanese war broke out the earliest and lasted the longest. The Belarusian people fired the first shot against the German fascist aggression in the Great Patriotic War. The people of China and Belarus fought against the enemy and fought side by side. They made great sacrifices for the final victory of the world anti-fascist war and made great contributions to the history. In the Nazi concentration camp in Minsk, Zhu Min, the daughter of Marshal Zhu De, founder of the founding father of New China, and the Belarusian buddies fought against the German fascists. General Tang Duo took the opportunity to participate in the battle to liberate Minsk. Belarusian soldiers of the Soviet Red Army went to China to participate in the air battle against the Japanese invaders and important battles for the liberation of Northeast China. The "Soviet Heroes" Lieutenant General Blagoveshchensky Air Force, Lieutenant General Nikolayanko Air Force, I Major General Danovic and others are outstanding representatives among them. In the 23 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Belarus, the bilateral relations have developed greatly. The two countries have established a comprehensive strategic partnership, formulated a five-year plan for the development of China-Belarus relations, and established an intergovernmental cooperation committee. The political mutual trust between the two sides has been increasingly consolidated, mutual support has been continuously strengthened, and cooperation in various fields has been deepened to become veritable friends and partners. China has become the largest trading partner of Belarus in the Asia-Pacific region. The bilateral trade volume has continued to grow, and it rose by 27.3% against the backdrop of the global economic downturn last year. Belarus has become one of the countries with the most extensive large-scale cooperation projects in Europe and Asia. Both sides have carried out dozens of major projects in the fields of communications, transportation, energy, and infrastructure construction, which have produced good economic and social benefits. Among them, the products of Geely Automobile Assembly Factory realized Belarus' "car dream"; the first Beijing hotel named after the Chinese capital was completed and operated in Minsk to provide services for the Belarusian guests from all over the world; Minsk 2, 5 and Lukomr The successful implementation of power station renovation projects such as Berezov and Belarus has provided electric power support for the development of the economy of Belarus; the three cement production lines built by China for Belarus have greatly improved the level and scale of Belarusian cement production; China provides modern electric locomotives for Belarus In the vast Belarusian plain; the Sino-Belarus Industrial Park project, which bears the common dream of the two countries' development and revitalization, is gradually starting substantial progress. , Belarus has now opened three Confucius Institutes, and the cultural day activities held by the two sides have become cultural events of the two countries. Last year, 200 teenagers from the disaster area of ​​the Chernobyl nuclear accident in Belarus went to China to convalesce, and they have increased mutual understanding and formed deep friendship with Chinese children. , China-Belarus relations have achieved today thanks to the fact that the two sides have always viewed the development of bilateral relations from a strategic height and a long-term perspective, thanks to their firm support for each other to follow the development path of their own national conditions, and close cooperation in international and regional affairs , Thanks to the two sides' adherence to friendship as the starting point and goal of all cooperation. At present, both China and Belarus are at a critical stage of development. China is committed to achieving the goal of "two hundred years" and realizing the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Belarus is also accelerating economic restructuring and industrial upgrading, and making unremitting efforts to achieve the strategic goals of economic and social development by 2030. The two sides should connect with the strategic vision, build a community of interests and destiny, and strive to move forward on the road to a common dream. Taking this opportunity, I would like to put forward the following suggestions for developing and deepening China-Belarus relationsCreate a community of interests and destiny, and strive to advance on the road to a common dream. Taking this opportunity, I would like to put forward the following suggestions for developing and deepening China-Belarus relations. , ——Enhance political mutual trust and increase mutual support. Supporting each other firmly on issues such as national sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity, security, and development interests that involve the core interests and major concerns of both sides is the cornerstone and core content of China-Belarus comprehensive strategic partnership. China is willing to increase mutual support with Belarus, support each other's measures and actions taken to safeguard national interests, support each other's development and revitalization, and jointly safeguard the fundamental interests of the two countries. ,-Deepen pragmatic cooperation and strengthen the blending of interests China advocates the construction of the Silk Road Economic Belt, will share development experience with Belarus, and strive to make its own development better for the Belarusian people. China welcomes Belarus to play its unique geographical advantages and participate in the construction of the Silk Road Economic Belt. It will encourage more powerful Chinese enterprises to invest in Belarus and continue to provide Belarus with economic support and assistance within its ability. The two countries should tap the potential for cooperation, enrich the forms of cooperation, broaden the channels of cooperation, enhance the level of cooperation, and constantly strengthen the material foundation of the comprehensive strategic partnership between China and Belarus. , —— Close humanistic exchanges and strengthen traditional friendship China is willing to set up a Chinese cultural center in Belarus, increase investment in the Confucius Institute, welcome more Belarusian friends to study, do business, and exchange in China. Taking the direct flights between the capitals of the two countries as a good opportunity to encourage more Chinese tourists to visit Belarus, Welcome more Belarusian friends to visit China. China is willing to continue to expand friendly exchanges and cooperation with Belarus in sports, news media, cultural groups, youth organizations, and to deepen mutual understanding and friendship between the two peoples. -Strengthen international cooperation and jointly safeguard the victory of the Second World War and international fairness and justice. The people of China and Belarus, who made great sacrifices in the Second World War, must unswervingly defend the fruits of victory in exchange for blood and life. As a founding member of the United Nations, China and Belarus should strengthen coordination and cooperation in the United Nations and other international organizations, and promote the development of the international order and international system in a more just and reasonable direction. The Belarussian people often say: "A strong friendship is hard to break." The Chinese people also have a famous saying: "Able to do the right thing, be as good as a thousand miles, sturdy in glue, strong in gold." To make it more exciting, this is my expectation for the development of China-Belarus relations. We are willing to work hand in hand with our Belarusian partners and make unremitting efforts to achieve our common goal. , (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, May 8th), "People's Daily" (May 01, 2015 version 01),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes a signed article in the Belarusian media: Let the movement of Sino-Belarusian friendship and cooperation intensify.
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-05-09
text: [, 　　5月8日，在对白俄罗斯进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在白俄罗斯《苏维埃白俄罗斯报》发表题为《让中白友好合作的乐章激越昂扬》的署名文章。文章如下：, 　　让中白友好合作的乐章激越昂扬, 　　中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 　　5年前，我第一次访问了白俄罗斯这个素有“万湖之国”美誉的国度。那里美丽的风光、友好的人民给我留下深刻印象。, 　　5年后的今天，带着对白俄罗斯人民的友好感情，我即将再次踏上这片秀丽的土地，进行我担任中华人民共和国主席以来对白俄罗斯的首次国事访问。今天的白俄罗斯，政治保持稳定，经济持续发展，社会安定团结，人民生活日益富足，国际地位不断提升。卢卡申科总统正在带领勤劳智慧的白俄罗斯人民，在国家建设的伟大征程中，不断取得新的辉煌。作为白俄罗斯人民的好朋友，我为此深感高兴。, 　　白俄罗斯有句名言：“友谊和兄弟之情胜过所有的财富。”中国人民和白俄罗斯人民都尚情重义，更有着在70年前世界反法西斯战争中用鲜血凝结而成的兄弟情谊。在那场正义战胜邪恶、光明战胜黑暗的世界大战中，中国人民抗日战争爆发最早、历时最长，白俄罗斯人民则打响了卫国战争中抗击德国法西斯侵略的第一枪。中白两国人民同仇敌忾、并肩作战，为世界反法西斯战争的最后胜利付出了巨大牺牲，作出了彪炳史册的伟大贡献。在明斯克的纳粹集中营里，新中国开国元勋朱德元帅的女儿朱敏曾同白俄罗斯小伙伴共抗德国法西斯，唐铎将军曾驾机参加解放明斯克的战役。苏联红军中白俄罗斯籍将士曾远赴中国参加打击日本侵略者的空战和解放中国东北的重要战役，“苏联英雄”布拉戈维申斯基空军中将、尼古拉延科空军中将、兹达诺维奇少将等就是他们中的杰出代表。, 　　中白建交23年来，双边关系得到长足发展。两国建立了全面战略伙伴关系，制定了中白关系发展5年规划，建立了政府间合作委员会。双方政治互信日益巩固，相互支持不断加强，各领域合作深入开展，成为名副其实的好朋友和好伙伴。中国已经成为白俄罗斯在亚太地区最大的贸易伙伴，双边贸易额持续增长，在去年全球经济不景气背景下逆势上扬27.3%。, 　　白俄罗斯已经成为中国在欧亚地区开展大型合作项目最为广泛的国家之一，双方在通信、交通、能源、基础设施建设等领域执行了数十个重大项目，产生了良好经济和社会效益。其中，吉利汽车组装厂的产品实现了白俄罗斯的“轿车梦”；首座以中国首都命名的北京饭店在明斯克竣工运营，为白俄罗斯四海宾朋提供服务；明斯克2号、5号、卢科姆尔和别列佐夫等电站改造项目成功实施，为白俄罗斯发展经济提供了电力支持；中国为白俄罗斯建造的3条水泥生产线极大提高了白俄罗斯水泥生产水平和规模；中国为白俄罗斯提供的现代化电力机车奔驰在广袤的白俄罗斯平原；承载着两国发展振兴共同梦想的中白工业园项目正逐步开启实质性进展。, 　　白俄罗斯现在已经开办了3所孔子学院，双方互办的文化日活动成为两国文化盛事。去年，白俄罗斯切尔诺贝利核事故灾区200名青少年赴中国疗养，同中国小朋友增进了相互了解，结下了深厚友谊。, 　　中白关系取得今天的成就，得益于双方始终从战略高度和长远角度看待两国关系发展，得益于双方坚定支持彼此走符合本国国情的发展道路，在国际和地区事务中密切相互协作，得益于双方坚持以友谊为一切合作的出发点和落脚点。, 　　当前，中国和白俄罗斯都处在发展的关键阶段。中国致力于实现“两个一百年”奋斗目标，实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦。白俄罗斯同样在加快经济结构调整和产业升级，为实现到2030年经济社会发展战略目标而不懈努力。双方应该对接战略构想，打造利益和命运共同体，在共同圆梦的道路上奋力前行。借此机会，我愿提出以下几点发展和深化中白关系的建议。, 　　——增强政治互信，加大相互支持。在国家主权、独立、领土完整、安全、发展利益等涉及双方核心利益和重大关切问题上相互坚定支持，是中白全面战略伙伴关系的基石和核心内容。中方愿同白方加大相互支持力度，支持对方为维护国家利益所采取的措施和行动，支持对方发展振兴，共同维护两国根本利益。, 　　——深化务实合作，加强利益交融。中方倡导建设丝绸之路经济带，将同白方分享发展经验，并努力使自身发展更好惠及白俄罗斯人民。中方欢迎白方发挥得天独厚的区位优势，参与丝绸之路经济带建设，将鼓励更多有实力的中国企业赴白俄罗斯投资兴业，将在力所能及范围内继续给予白方经济支持和援助。两国要挖掘合作潜力，丰富合作形式，拓宽合作渠道，提升合作水平，不断夯实中白全面战略伙伴关系的物质基础。, 　　——密切人文交流，加固传统友谊。中方愿在白俄罗斯设立中国文化中心，加大对孔子学院的投入，欢迎更多白俄罗斯朋友到中国留学、经商、交流，以两国首都开通直航为良好契机，鼓励更多中国游客赴白俄罗斯观光，欢迎更多白俄罗斯朋友来华游览。中方愿同白方不断扩大体育、新闻媒体、文艺团体、青年组织友好交往和合作，加深两国人民的相互了解和友谊。, 　　——加强国际协作，共同维护第二次世界大战胜利成果和国际公平正义。在第二次世界大战中付出了巨大牺牲的中白人民，要坚定不移捍卫用鲜血和生命换来的胜利果实。中白作为联合国创始会员国，要加强在联合国和其他国际组织中的协调和配合，推动国际秩序和国际体系朝着更加公正合理的方向发展。, 　　白俄罗斯人民常说：“牢固的友谊利斧难破。”中国人民也有句名言：“交得其道，千里同好，固于胶漆，坚于金石。”奏响中白友好合作的乐章，使之更加激越昂扬，这是我对中白关系发展的期待。我们愿同白方伙伴携手并肩，为实现我们共同的目标而不懈努力。,     （新华社北京5月8日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2015年05月09日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在白俄罗斯媒体发表署名文章：让中白友好合作的乐章激越昂扬

eng: [, On May 7th, on the eve of Russia’s celebration of the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Great Patriotic War and his visit to Russia, President Xi Jinping published a signed article entitled "Remembering History and Creating the Future" in the Russian newspaper "Russia." The article is as follows: Remembering history and creating the future, President Xi Jinping of the People’s Republic of China, on May 9th, when the World Anti-Fascist War Victory Day comes, I will go to Moscow at the invitation of President Putin of the Russian Federation to attend the victory of the Great Patriotic War 70 Anniversary celebration and visit Russia to celebrate this sacred holiday with the Russian people and the people of the world. Looking back at history, the war of aggression launched by fascism and militarism has brought unprecedented disasters and catastrophes in human history to many countries and peoples in Europe, Asia, and other regions in China and Russia. In that desperate battle of justice and evil, light and darkness, freedom and slavery, the people of more than 50 countries such as China and Russia united, and all the peace-loving peoples of the world united to form a broad international reaction. Fascists and the anti-militarist united front fought bloody battles, fighting side by side, and finally defeated the barbaric invaders and won world peace. , Russia is the main battlefield of Europe in World War II. In order to win the Patriotic War, the Russian people and other fraternal peoples have paid a heavy price at the expense of 27 million people, and almost every family has suffered casualties. A large number of heroes and children, such as 28 brave men, Matlosov, Zoya, and so on, defended the independence and dignity of the motherland and defended world peace and justice. , In March 2013, I paid my first state visit to Russia and presented a wreath to the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier outside the red wall of the Kremlin. There, a steel helmet, a red flag, a cluster of flames that never extinguished, symbolized the tenacious and unyielding life, and symbolized the spirit of the martyr who never bowed to the aggressor. "No one knows your name, your merits will last forever." The Russian people will never forget, the Chinese people will never forget, and the people of the world will never forget. , China is the main battlefield of Asia in World War II. The Chinese people's war of resistance against Japan was the earliest and lasted the longest, the conditions were the most difficult, and the sacrifices they made were the heaviest as the Russian people. The indomitable and arduous struggle of the Japanese military and civilians eliminated and contained a large amount of the Japanese invaders’ military strength, and sacrificed 35 million people with huge national sacrifices. They finally won a great victory in the War of Resistance Against Japan and made great contributions to the victory of the world’s anti-fascist war. Like the Russian people, the chapter of history written by the Chinese people for the victory of the War of Resistance Against Japan will always be etched in history. The Chinese people and the Russian people supported each other in the fight against fascism and militarism, aided each other, fought side by side, and formed a fighting friendship with blood and life. At the most difficult time of the Great Patriotic War, many passionate children of the Chinese nation resolutely joined the heroic ranks of the anti-fascist army. Mao Anying, the eldest son of Chairman Mao Zedong, as an instructor of the Belarusian first military tank company, fought thousands of miles until he captured Berlin. As the deputy commander of the Soviet Air Shooting Regiment, Chinese pilot Tang Duo fought against the sky and repeatedly made achievements in the air battle with the fascist army. The leaders of the Communist Party of China and descendants of revolutionary martyrs who studied at the Ivanovo International Children’s Hospital in Moscow, young, volunteered to dig trenches, manufacture "Molotov" burning flasks, produce military uniforms, food, logging, dig potatoes, and take care of injuries in hospitals Sicks, many people also donate 430 milliliters of blood to frontline soldiers every month. Chinese female reporter Hu Jibang went through the Great Patriotic War with a weak body, braved the artillery fire to report the loyalty of the Soviet people, the brutality of the fascist army, and the joy of the victory of the Russian military and civilians. Among the Chinese who contributed to the Russian Patriotic War, there are many unknown heroes. The Russian people gave precious political and moral support to the Chinese people in the War of Resistance Against Japan and supported a large number of materials and equipment. More than 2,000 Soviet pilots participated in the volunteer flying squad for aid to China to help China fight against Japanese invaders, and more than 200 people died on the Chinese battlefield. In the late period of the Chinese Anti-Japanese War, the Soviet Red Army went to the battlefield in Northeast China to fight against Japan with the Chinese military and civilians, providing important support for the Chinese people to win the final victory of the Anti-Japanese War. The Chinese people will always miss those Russian soldiers and civilians who bravely died for the cause of independent liberation of the Chinese nation. , A famous Russian historian Klyuchevsky said, "If we lose the memory of history, our hearts will be lost in the dark." Forgetting history means betrayal. The people of China and Russia will work with all determination in the worldOur hearts will be lost in the dark." Forgetting history means betrayal. The people of China and Russia will work with firm determination and efforts, together with all peace-loving countries and peoples of the world, to firmly oppose denial, distortion, and tampering. The plots and actions of the history of the Second World War., China and Russia will host a series of celebrations and commemorations of the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Second World War this year. The United Nations and other international and regional organizations have also or will hold a series of celebrations And commemorative activities. The purpose of our celebrations and commemorative activities is to demonstrate our determination to jointly safeguard the victory of the Second World War and international fairness and justice, and to warn the world to cherish and maintain hard-won peace., The second time The painful lessons of world wars tell people that weak meat and strong food and the law of the jungle are not the way of human coexistence. Poor soldiers and military domination are not strategies for human peace. Winners take all, zero-sum game is not the path of human development. Peace is not war, cooperation is not Confrontation and win-win rather than zero-sum is the eternal theme of human society’s peace, progress and development. Today’s human beings are more than ever able to move towards peace and development goals, and should strive to build a win-win cooperation The core of new international relations. "Cooperation is strong, and loneliness is weak. "Cooperation and win-win should become the basic policy orientation of all countries in dealing with international affairs. We should combine our national interests with the common interests of all countries, strive to expand the meeting point of common interests of all parties, establish a new concept of win-win, multi-win, and win-win, adhere to the same boat, Responsibility and responsibility, work together to cope with the increasing global issues such as climate change, energy and resource security, network security, and major natural disasters, and work together to care for the earth's homeland on which humanity depends. Both the Chinese nation and the Russian nation are great nations. At that time, we shared our troubles and used blood to form an indestructible friendship of friendship. Today, the people of China and Russia will go hand in hand, protect peace and promote development together, and continue to make their own contributions to consolidating lasting peace in the world and common progress of mankind. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, May 7th), "People's Daily" (01 May 2015 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in Russian media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-05-08
text: [, 5月7日，在出席俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利70周年庆典并访问俄罗斯前夕，国家主席习近平在俄罗斯《俄罗斯报》发表题为《铭记历史，开创未来》的署名文章。文章如下：, 铭记历史，开创未来, 中华人民共和国主席  习近平, 在5月9日，即世界反法西斯战争胜利日到来之际，我将应俄罗斯联邦总统普京邀请，赴莫斯科出席卫国战争胜利70周年庆典并访问俄罗斯，同俄罗斯人民和世界人民一道庆祝这个神圣的节日。, 回顾历史，法西斯主义和军国主义发动的侵略战争，给中国、俄罗斯等欧亚地区及其他地区的许多国家和人民带来人类历史上空前灾难和浩劫。在那场正义与邪恶、光明与黑暗、自由与奴役的殊死战斗中，中国、俄罗斯等50多个国家的人民联合在一起，世界上所有爱好和平的人民联合在一起，结成广泛的国际反法西斯和反军国主义统一战线，浴血奋战，并肩战斗，终于打败了野蛮侵略者，赢得了世界和平。, 俄罗斯是第二次世界大战欧洲主战场。俄罗斯人民和其他兄弟民族为赢得卫国战争胜利，付出了牺牲2700万人的惨重代价，几乎每个家庭都有人员伤亡。潘菲洛夫师二十八壮士、马特洛索夫、卓娅等一大批英雄儿女，为捍卫祖国独立和尊严，为捍卫世界和平和正义，谱写了感天动地的战斗诗篇。, 2013年3月，我首次对俄罗斯进行国事访问，向位于克里姆林宫红墙外的无名烈士墓敬献了花圈。在那里，一顶钢盔，一面红旗，一簇永不熄灭的火焰，象征着顽强不屈的生命，象征着永不向侵略者低头的烈士精神。“你的名字无人知晓，你的功勋永世长存。”俄罗斯人民永远不会忘记，中国人民永远不会忘记，世界人民也永远不会忘记。, 中国是第二次世界大战亚洲主战场。中国人民抗日战争起始最早，持续时间最长，条件最艰苦，付出的牺牲也同俄罗斯人民一样是最惨重的。中国军民不屈不挠、艰苦卓绝的抗日斗争，消灭并牵制了日本侵略者大量兵力，以伤亡3500万人的巨大民族牺牲，最终赢得了抗日战争的伟大胜利，为世界反法西斯战争胜利作出了巨大贡献。同俄罗斯人民一样，中国人民为抗战胜利谱写的历史篇章也永远铭刻在历史上。, 中国人民和俄罗斯人民在反法西斯和军国主义的战斗中相互支持，相互援助，并肩战斗，用鲜血和生命凝成了战斗友谊。在卫国战争最艰苦的时刻，中华民族许多热血儿女毅然投身到抗击法西斯德军的英勇行列中。毛泽东主席的长子毛岸英作为白俄罗斯第一方面军坦克连指导员，转战千里，直至攻克柏林。中国飞行员唐铎作为苏军空中射击团副团长，鹰击长空，在同法西斯军队的空战中屡建战功。在莫斯科伊万诺沃国际儿童院学习的中国共产党领导人和革命先烈后代，年龄幼小，自告奋勇挖战壕、制造“莫洛托夫”燃烧瓶、生产军服、食品、伐木、挖土豆、在医院照料伤病员，许多人还每月都为前线战士献出430毫升鲜血。中国女记者胡济邦以柔弱之躯全程经历卫国战争，冒着炮火报道了苏联人民的坚贞不屈、法西斯军队的残暴、俄罗斯军民胜利的喜悦，鼓舞了中俄两国军民抗战到底的决心。在为俄罗斯卫国战争作出贡献的中国人中，还有许许多多无名英雄。, 俄罗斯人民给予了中国人民抗日战争宝贵的政治和道义支持，支援了大批物资、装备。2000多名苏联飞行员参加了援华志愿飞行队，帮助中国抗击日本侵略者，有200多人牺牲在中国战场。在中国抗日战争后期，苏联红军开赴中国东北战场，同中国军民一道对日作战，为中国人民赢得抗日战争的最终胜利提供了重要支援。中国人民永远怀念那些为中华民族独立解放事业而英勇捐躯的俄罗斯军民。, 俄罗斯著名历史学家克柳切夫斯基说过，“如果丧失对历史的记忆，我们的心灵就会在黑暗中迷失”。忘记历史就意味着背叛。中俄两国人民将以坚定的决心和努力，同世界上所有热爱和平的国家和人民一道，坚决反对否认、歪曲、篡改第二次世界大战历史的图谋和行径。, 中俄两国今年将举办一系列第二次世界大战胜利70周年庆祝和纪念活动。联合国和其他国际及地区组织也已经或还将举办一系列庆祝和纪念活动。我们举办这些庆祝和纪念活动的目的，是要展现共同维护第二次世界大战胜利成果和国际公平正义的决心，是要警示世人珍惜和维护来之不易的和平。, 第二次世界大战的惨痛教训告诉人们，弱肉强食、丛林法则不是人类共存之道。穷兵黩武、强权独霸不是人类和平之策。赢者通吃、零和博弈不是人类发展之路。和平而不是战争，合作而不是对抗，共赢而不是零和，才是人类社会和平、进步、发展的永恒主题。, 今天的人类比以往任何时候都更有条件朝和平与发展目标迈进，更应该努力构建以合作共赢为核心的新型国际关系。“合则强，孤则弱。”合作共赢应该成为各国处理国际事务的基本政策取向。我们应该把本国利益同各国共同利益结合起来，努力扩大各方共同利益汇合点，树立双赢、多赢、共赢新理念，坚持同舟共济、权责共担，携手应对气候变化、能源资源安全、网络安全、重大自然灾害等日益增多的全球性问题，共同呵护人类赖以生存的地球家园。, 中华民族和俄罗斯民族都是伟大的民族。当年，我们患难与共，用鲜血凝成了坚不可摧的战斗友谊。今天，中俄两国人民更将携手前进，同护和平，共促发展，继续为巩固世界持久和平和人类共同进步作出自己的贡献。（新华社北京5月7日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年05月08日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在俄罗斯媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, April 19, on the eve of a state visit to Pakistan, President Xi Jinping published a signed article entitled "Long Live the Friendship between the People of China and Pakistan" in Pakistan’s "Battle" and "Daily News". The article is as follows: Long live the friendship between the people of China and Pakistan, Xi Jinping, President of the People's Republic of China, in Pakistan, there is such a Urdu poetry: "The beautiful image of a friend is in the mirror of my heart. Just lower your head and you will see "In my mind, Pakistan is such a good friend. When I was young, I often heard touching stories about the friendship between Pakistan and China, such as the Pakistani people building their beautiful homes with diligent hands, Pakistan provided China with an air corridor to connect with the world, and supported China’s restoration of the United Nations legal seat, etc. Wait. These stories left a deep impression on me. I look forward to the upcoming state visit to Pakistan. This is my first visit to Pakistan, but I feel like visiting my brother’s house. For a long time, under the careful cultivation of leaders of the two countries and people from all walks of life, China-Pakistan friendship is like a vigorous tree with deep roots. No matter how the international and regional situation and the domestic situation of the two countries change, China-Pakistan relations have been developing steadily and healthily. The two countries always respect, understand and support each other on issues involving each other's core interests. In Pakistan, people praise the Sino-Pakistani friendship with poetic language such as "higher than the mountains, deeper than the sea, and sweeter than the honey." In China, people call Pakistan "a sincere and reliable friend". The friendship between China and Pakistan is becoming more and more deeply rooted in the hearts of the two peoples. For a long time, China and Pakistan have carried out all-round mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields, bearing fruitful results and bringing tangible benefits to the people of both countries. Currently, the two countries are steadily advancing the construction of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor and are committed to building a community of shared future for China and Pakistan. The starting point and foothold of China-Pakistan cooperation is to deepen the integration of the interests of the two countries and work together for common development, bring more well-being to the people of the two countries, and draw a better blueprint for development. The Pakistani government and people are committed to developing the economy and improving people's livelihood, while resolutely combating terrorism and extremism, safeguarding national security and social stability, and achieving remarkable results. As good friends and brothers, China is heartily happy for every progress and achievement made by Pakistan. I believe that as long as the Pakistani people work together and work hard together, they will surely find a development path that suits their national conditions, achieve greater achievements in national construction, and realize their dream of becoming an "Asian Tiger" at an early date. The Chinese people are working hard to realize the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. The Chinese dream is a dream of peace, development, cooperation and win-win. We pursue the well-being of the Chinese people and the common well-being of people of all countries. China is willing to live in harmony with South Asian countries including Pakistan and is willing to contribute to the development of South Asia. China’s proposal for the Silk Road Economic Belt and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road is to achieve common development by strengthening interconnection among countries along the route. , My current state visit to Pakistan is the first leg of my first visit this year. During the visit, I will meet with Pakistani leaders such as President Hussein and Prime Minister Sharif, have extensive contacts with people from all walks of life, and exchange in-depth views with them on bilateral relations and issues of common concern. I look forward to this visit to work with Pakistani leaders to plan the overall framework for cooperation between the two countries, to promote substantial progress in the construction of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor and practical cooperation in other fields, and to advance China-Pakistan relations at a higher level. ——We must integrate the development strategies of the two countries more closely and realize the dream of the people. China and Pakistan shoulder the historic task of developing the economy and improving people's livelihood. We must strengthen strategic coordination, deepen pragmatic cooperation, work together for common development, and build China-Pakistan Community of Destiny into a model for China and neighboring countries to build a community of destiny. ---We should closely link the economic and trade strategies of the two countries and deepen economic integration. The China-Pakistan Economic Corridor, located at the intersection of the Silk Road Economic Belt and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road, is a major project of the “Belt and Road” initiative. The two sides should focus on the construction of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor, with Gwadar Port, energy, infrastructure construction, and industrial cooperation as the four key points, forming a "1+4" cooperation layout to drive the development of various regions of Pakistan and benefit the Pakistani people. ---We must integrate the security concerns of the two countries more closely and strengthen security cooperation. The security interests of China and Pakistan are closely related. Security cooperation and economic cooperation complement each other and promote each other. The two wheels must be turned together. We must deepen defense cooperation and strengthen coordination and cooperation on regional hot issues. , ——We want to exchange humanities between the two countriesThe wheels must turn together. We must deepen defense cooperation and strengthen coordination and cooperation on regional hot issues. ——We want to bring the two countries' humanities exchanges closer together and promote dialogues between civilizations. The two countries should transform good political relations into the driving force for cultural exchanges, and create a model for exchanges and mutual learning and friendly cooperation between different civilizations. This year is the year of China-Pakistan friendly exchanges. The two sides should carefully organize and cooperate closely to hold a series of celebration activities. Both sides should expand cooperation in personnel exchanges, language training, youth exchanges, local friendship cities, media and think tanks, so that China-Pakistan friendship can take root at the grassroots level and bring the hearts of the two peoples closer. -We need to more closely coordinate the diplomatic strategies of the two countries and build a harmonious periphery. China and Pakistan have the same or similar positions on major international and regional issues. It is necessary to maintain close communication and coordination, safeguard the common interests of the two countries, and jointly create a peaceful and stable surrounding environment. , Let us join hands and work together to create a better future for China-Pakistan relations! Long live the friendship between the people of China and Pakistan! (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, April 19), "People's Daily" (April 20, 2015 version 01), related news, Xi Jinping's state visit to Pakistan from Beijing, what are the highlights of Xi Jinping's first visit in 2015, China and Pakistan Where is the "iron" relationship-Interview with Chinese Ambassador to Pakistan,]
eng_title: Xi Jinping published a signed article in Pakistani media: Long live the friendship between the Chinese and Pakistani people
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-04-20
text: [, 4月19日，在对巴基斯坦进行国事访问前夕，国家主席习近平在巴基斯坦《战斗报》和《每日新闻报》同时发表题为《中巴人民友谊万岁》的署名文章。文章如下：, 中巴人民友谊万岁, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 在巴基斯坦，有这样一句乌尔都语诗歌：“朋友的美好形象，就在我心的明镜之中，稍一低头，就能看见。”在我心目中，巴基斯坦就是这样一位好朋友。我年轻时就经常听说关于巴基斯坦和中巴友好的动人故事，如巴基斯坦人民用勤劳的双手建设着自己美丽的家园，巴基斯坦为中国提供同世界联系的空中走廊，支持中国恢复联合国合法席位，等等。这些故事给我留下深刻印象。我期待着即将对巴基斯坦进行国事访问。这是我首次访问巴基斯坦，但我感觉就像到自己兄弟家中探访一样。, 长期以来，在两国历代领导人和各界人士精心培育下，中巴友谊像一棵茁壮成长的大树，根深叶茂。无论国际和地区形势及两国国内情况如何变化，中巴关系一直健康稳定发展，两国在涉及彼此核心利益问题上始终相互尊重、相互理解、相互支持。在巴基斯坦，人们用“比山高、比海深、比蜜甜”这样诗歌般的语言来赞颂中巴友谊。在中国，人们都把巴基斯坦称作“真诚可靠的朋友”。中巴友谊正日益深深植根于两国人民心中。, 长期以来，中巴两国在各领域开展了全方位互利合作，结出了累累硕果，给两国人民带来实实在在的利益。当前，两国正在稳步推进中巴经济走廊建设，致力于打造中巴命运共同体。中巴合作的出发点和立足点是深化两国利益融合，携手共谋发展，为两国人民带来更多福祉，绘制更加美好的发展蓝图。, 巴基斯坦政府和人民致力于发展经济、改善民生，同时坚决打击恐怖主义和极端主义，维护国家安全和社会稳定，取得了显著成效。作为好朋友、好兄弟，中方为巴方取得的每一点进步、每一项成就感到由衷高兴。我相信，只要巴基斯坦人民齐心协力、团结奋进，就一定能够找到符合自身国情的发展道路，在国家建设事业中取得更大成就，早日实现成为“亚洲之虎”的梦想。, 中国人民正在努力实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦。中国梦是和平、发展、合作、共赢的梦，我们追求中国人民的福祉，也追求各国人民共同的福祉。中国愿同包括巴基斯坦在内的南亚各国和睦相处，愿为南亚发展添砖加瓦。中国提出丝绸之路经济带和21世纪海上丝绸之路倡议，就是要通过加强沿线国家互联互通，实现共同发展。, 我这次对巴基斯坦进行国事访问，是我今年首次出访的第一站。访问期间，我将会见侯赛因总统、谢里夫总理等巴基斯坦领导人，广泛接触各界人士，同他们就两国关系和共同关心的问题深入交换意见。我期待着通过这次访问，同巴基斯坦领导人一道谋划两国合作总体框架，推动中巴经济走廊建设和其他各领域务实合作取得实质性进展，使中巴关系在更高水平上向前发展。, ——我们要把两国发展战略更紧密结合起来，共圆人民梦想。中巴两国肩负着发展经济和改善民生的历史重任。我们要加强战略协调，深化务实合作，携手共谋发展，将中巴命运共同体打造成为中国同周边国家构建命运共同体的典范。, ——我们要把两国经贸战略更紧密对接起来，深化经济融合。中巴经济走廊位于丝绸之路经济带和21世纪海上丝绸之路交汇处，是“一带一路”倡议的重大项目。双方要以中巴经济走廊建设为中心，瓜达尔港、能源、基础设施建设、产业合作为四大重点，形成“1+4”合作布局，带动巴基斯坦各地区发展，让巴基斯坦广大民众得到实惠。, ——我们要把两国安全关切更紧密结合起来，加强安全合作。中巴两国安全利益息息相关。安全合作和经济合作相辅相成，相互促进，两个轮子要一起转。我们要深化防务领域合作，加强在地区热点问题上的协调和配合。, ——我们要把两国人文交流更紧密联通起来，推动文明对话。两国应该把良好政治关系转化为人文交流的动力，打造不同文明交流互鉴、友好合作的样板。今年是中巴友好交流年，双方要精心组织、密切配合，办好系列庆祝活动。双方要扩大人员往来、语言培训、青年交流、地方友城、传媒和智库合作，让中巴友好扎根基层，让两国人民的心灵更加贴近。, ——我们要把两国外交战略更紧密协调起来，建设和谐周边。中巴两国在重大国际和地区问题上拥有相同或相似立场，要保持密切沟通和协调，维护两国共同利益，共同营造和平稳定的周边环境。, 让我们携手并肩，共同努力，开创中巴关系更加美好的未来！, 中巴人民友谊万岁！（新华社北京4月19日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2015年04月20日 01 版）, 相关新闻, 习近平离京对巴基斯坦进行国事访问, 习近平2015年首次出访有哪些看点, 中巴关系“铁”在哪儿——访中国驻巴基斯坦大使, ]
title: 习近平在巴基斯坦媒体发表署名文章:中巴人民友谊万岁

eng: [, Dear President Zuma, Dear President of the African Union, President Mugabe, Dear Heads of State and Government, Dear Chairman of the African Union Commission Ms. Zuma, Dear colleagues, distinguished guests, Ladies and gentlemen, friends:, 　　 is very happy to be here with so many African brothers, old and new friends in the beautiful "Rainbow Country" South Africa. As the co-chair of the meeting, I also warmly welcome everyone to attend the Johannesburg Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, and sincerely thank the host country South Africa for the meticulous preparation and thoughtful arrangements for this meeting. , 　　 This is my seventh time to set foot on the African continent, and it is also my second visit to Africa after being the Chinese President. Every time I come to Africa, I can see new developments and changes in Africa. , 　　 Today's Africa presents a new scene of vigorous development, which is inspiring and encouraging. Africa actively explores a development path that is in line with its own reality, insists on resolving African problems in an African way, and the momentum of independence and independence is unreasonable. Africa actively promotes industrialization, seeks independent and sustainable development, and the rapid development momentum is unreasonable. Africa is accelerating the integration process, insisting on speaking with one voice on the international stage, and the momentum of unity and self-improvement is unreasonable. , 　　 I appreciate the words said by the former President of South Africa, Mr. Mandela, "We are standing at the dawn of the African century. In this century, Africa will occupy its place in the world's national forest." I believe that Africa The country and the people are ushering in a new era that truly belongs to them! , 　　 The Chinese government and people are sincerely happy and proud of the development achievements made in Africa, and sincerely wish African countries and people to continue to achieve greater achievements and a better future on the road of development and progress! , 　　Dear colleagues, ladies and gentlemen! , 　　 China and Africa have always been a community of destiny. The common historical experience and common struggle have made the Chinese and African peoples form a profound friendship. , 　　 For a long time, we have always been in the same boat and supported each other. The Tanzania-Zambia Railway and the AU Conference Center, aided by China, have become a monument of China-Africa friendship. The Chinese government and people took the lead in the aid to Africa to fight against Ebola, leading the international community to aid Africa in the fight against epidemic disease and interpreting the brotherhood between China and Africa. African countries selflessly support China’s return to the United Nations, and donated to China after the severe earthquake disasters in Wenchuan and Yushu, China. The Chinese people remember this. The fundamental reason for China-Africa friendship to stay strong and stay alive for so long is that the two sides have always adhered to equality, sincere friendship, win-win cooperation and common development. China and Africa will always be good friends, good partners and good brothers. , 　　 At present, both China and Africa shoulder the mission of developing the country and improving people's livelihood. Africa is rich in natural and human resources, and is in the rise of industrialization. After more than 30 years of reform and opening-up, China has the material advantages in technology, equipment, talents, and capital that have helped Africa achieve independent and sustainable development. It also has strong political advantages in supporting Africa’s development. The development of China-Africa cooperation has mutual needs and complementary advantages, and has ushered in a rare historic opportunity. , 　　 Under the new situation, we must inherit and carry forward the traditional friendship between China and Africa, and we must turn the advantages of traditional friendship between China and Africa into a driving force for unity, cooperation and development, create more tangible results for the people of China and Africa, and promote the world. Make more balanced, fair and inclusive development, and make greater contributions to building a new type of international relations centered on win-win cooperation. , 　　Dear colleagues, ladies and gentlemen!　　 At present, the world pattern is undergoing profound evolution. Economic globalization and social informatization have greatly liberated and developed social productive forces. We are facing unprecedented opportunities for development. At the same time, issues such as hegemonism, terrorism, financial turmoil, and environmental crises have become increasingly prominent, bringing us unprecedented challenges. , 　　 China will uphold the true and sincere policy concept of Africa and the correct view of justice and benefit, and work with African friends to move towards a new era of win-win cooperation and common development. To this end, I propose to upgrade the new type of China-Africa strategic partnership to a comprehensive strategic partnership, and to strengthen and consolidate the "five pillars" for this purpose. , 　　 First, adhere to political equality and mutual trust. High political mutual trust is the cornerstone of China-Africa friendship. We must respect the development path we have chosen and do not impose our will on each other. In matters concerning the core interests and major concerns of both parties, we must adhere to mutual understanding and mutual support, and jointly safeguard fairness and justice. China has always maintained that Africa is Africa for Africans, and that Africans should be in the final position. , 　　 Second, insist on economic cooperation for a win-win situation. The Chinese pay attention to "combining righteousness with benefit, giving priority to righteousness". The biggest "righteousness" of China-Africa relations is to use China's development to help Africa's developmentEconomic win-win cooperation. The Chinese pay attention to "combining righteousness with benefit, giving priority to righteousness". The biggest "righteousness" of China-Africa relations is to use China's development to help Africa's development and ultimately achieve mutual benefit, win-win and common development. We must give full play to the advantages of China-Africa political mutual trust and economic complementarity, take cooperation in production capacity and three networks as one starting point, comprehensively deepen China-Africa cooperation in various fields, and allow the people of China and Africa to share the results of cooperation and development. , 　　 Third, insist on mutual exchanges and mutual learning in civilization. The world is beautiful because it is colorful. We are proud that both China and Africa have a long and splendid civilization. We must strengthen exchanges and mutual learning between the two civilizations of China and Africa, and strive to strengthen exchanges between people from all walks of life, such as youth, women, think tanks, media, and universities, to promote cultural integration, policy cohesion, and people-to-people connections, to promote common progress, and to make the people of China and Africa friendly from generation to generation. , 　　 Fourth, insist on security and help each other. Poverty is the source of turmoil, peace is the guarantee of development, and development is the master key to solving all problems. China supports Africans in resolving African problems in an African way, and advocates solving both the symptoms and the root causes and comprehensive measures to solve security problems. China is willing to actively participate in strengthening Africa’s ability to maintain peace and security, support Africa’s accelerated development, eliminate poverty, and achieve lasting peace. , 　　 Fifth, insist on unity and cooperation in international affairs. China and Africa share a wide range of common languages ​​and common interests in international affairs. We must strengthen consultation and cooperation, promote the development of the global governance system in a more just and reasonable direction, and safeguard common interests. China will continue to speak for justice and justice for Africa at the United Nations and other occasions, and support Africa to play a greater role on the international stage. , 　　Dear colleagues, ladies and gentlemen! , 　　 In order to promote the construction of China-Africa comprehensive strategic partnership, China is willing to focus on implementing the “Top Ten Cooperation Plans” with the African side in the next three years, adhere to the principles of government guidance, business entities, market operation, and win-win cooperation, and strive to support Africa’s crackdown. The three major development bottlenecks of lagging infrastructure, inadequate talents and shortage of funds accelerate the process of industrialization and agricultural modernization and achieve independent and sustainable development. , 　　 One is the China-Africa Industrialization Cooperation Program. China will actively promote China-Africa industrial docking and capacity cooperation, encourage and support Chinese enterprises to invest in Africa, cooperate to build or upgrade a batch of industrial parks, and dispatch senior government consultants to African countries. A number of regional vocational education centers and a number of capacity-building colleges were established to train 200,000 vocational and technical personnel in Africa and provide 40,000 training places in China. , 　　 Second is China-Africa agricultural modernization cooperation plan. China will share its agricultural development experience with Africa, transfer agricultural applicable technologies, encourage Chinese enterprises to carry out large-scale cultivation, animal husbandry, grain storage and processing in Africa, and increase local employment and farmers' income. China will implement the "Agricultural Rich People Project" in 100 rural villages in Africa, send 30 batches of agricultural experts to Africa, and establish a "10+10" cooperation mechanism for China-Africa agricultural research institutions. China is highly concerned that many African countries are affected by the El Niño phenomenon, resulting in poor food harvests, and will provide 1 billion yuan in emergency food assistance to the affected countries. , 　　 Third is China-Africa Infrastructure Cooperation Program. China will strengthen mutually beneficial cooperation with Africa in infrastructure planning, design, construction, operation, maintenance, etc., and support Chinese enterprises to actively participate in the construction of African railways, highways, regional aviation, ports, power, telecommunications and other infrastructure to enhance Africa's sustainable development Capacity; support African countries to build 5 Jiaotong University. , 　　 Fourth, China-Africa Financial Cooperation Program. China will expand the scale of RMB settlement and local currency swap business with African countries, encourage Chinese financial institutions to set up more branches in Africa, expand investment and financing cooperation in Africa in various ways, and provide financial support and services for African industrialization and modernization.　　Five is China-Africa Green Development Cooperation Program. China will support Africa in enhancing green, low-carbon, and sustainable development capabilities, and support Africa in implementing 100 clean energy and wildlife protection projects, environmentally friendly agriculture projects, and smart city construction projects. China-Africa cooperation will never come at the expense of Africa's ecological environment and long-term interests. , 　　 Six is ​​the China-Africa Trade and Investment Facilitation Cooperation Program. China will implement 50 aid-for-trade projects to support Africa in improving domestic and foreign trade and investment in hard and soft conditions, and is willing to negotiate with African countries and regional organizations on comprehensive free trade agreements including trade in goods, trade in services, and investment cooperation to expand the scale of African products exported to China . Support African countries to improve customs, quality inspection, taxation and other law enforcement capabilities, and carry out cooperation in standardization, certification and accreditation, e-commerce and other fields. , 　　 Seven is the China-Africa Poverty Alleviation and Cooperation Program. While strengthening its own poverty reduction efforts, China will increase aid to Africa and implement 200 “Happy Life Projects” and poverty reduction projects mainly benefiting women and children in Africa; exemption from Africa’s least developed countries by the end of 2015 Interest-free”And poverty reduction projects with women and children as the main beneficiaries; forgiveness of the interest-free loans of intergovernmental interest-free loans due to the least developed countries in Africa as of the end of 2015. 　　Eight is the China-Africa Public Health Cooperation Program. China will participate African CDC and other public health prevention and control systems and capacity building; support 20 hospitals in China and Africa to carry out demonstration cooperation, strengthen the construction of professional departments, continue to send medical team members, carry out "bright travel", medical assistance including maternal and child health, for Africa provides a batch of compound artemisinin antimalarial drugs; encourages and supports Chinese companies to go to Africa to carry out localized production of drugs to improve the accessibility of drugs in Africa. 　　Nine is the China-Africa Humanities Cooperation Program. China will assist in the construction of 5 cultural centers in Africa, Implemented satellite TV project for 10,000 villages in Africa; provided Africa with 2,000 academic degrees and 30,000 government scholarships; organized 200 African scholars to visit China and 500 African youths for training each year; trained 1,000 African journalists every year Practitioners in the field; support the opening of more direct flights between China and Africa and promote China-Africa tourism cooperation. 　　 Ten is the China-Africa Peace and Security Cooperation Program. China will provide $60 million in free assistance to the African Union to support the African Standing Army and rapid crisis response Response force construction and operation. China will continue to participate in United Nations peacekeeping operations in Africa; support African countries to strengthen national defense, anti-terrorism, riot control, customs supervision, immigration control and other aspects., 　　To ensure the smooth implementation of the "Top Ten Cooperation Plan", China has decided Provide a total of US$60 billion in financial support, including: providing US$5 billion in unpaid aid and interest-free loans; providing US$35 billion in preferential loans and export credit lines, and increasing the preferential loan concessions; for the China-Africa Development Fund and Africa The SME development special loans each increased by US$5 billion; the first batch of US$10 billion "China-Africa Capacity Cooperation Fund" was established. 　　Dear colleagues, ladies and gentlemen!, 　　This year is the 15th anniversary of the establishment of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum. Over the past 15 years, China-Africa has achieved fruitful cooperation in various fields. In 2014, China-Africa trade volume and China’s non-financial investment stocks in Africa were 22 times and 60 times that of 2000 respectively, and China’s contribution to Africa’s economic development has grown significantly. The Cooperation Forum has become a banner leading China-Africa cooperation, setting an example for South-South cooperation and becoming a pioneer in driving the international community to increase its attention and investment in Africa. 　　Currently, China-Africa relations are at the best period in history. We should Ascending the horizon and striding forward. Let us work together to bring together the wisdom and power of the 2.4 billion people of China and Africa, and jointly open a new era of win-win cooperation and common development for China-Africa cooperation!, 　　 Thank you all., 　　4th), 　　 "People's Daily" (December 05, 2015, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Opening a new era of win-win and common development for China-Africa cooperation
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2015-12-05
